story:
La nostra storia

Il mio nome è Ylenia e sono la fondatrice di Osmotica, un nuovissimo studio indipendente italiano focalizzato sulla narrazione di storie attraverso diversi format innovativi. Sono specializzata in storytelling e story-editing e ho aperto Osmotica dopo aver lavorato per molti anni come web content manager e docente per adulti, con l’obiettivo “di trasformare un sogno in realtà”: ossia dedicarmi a raccontare storie coinvolgenti e a creare storyworld in cui le persone possano immergersi.

La prima idea di Kubos è nata alcuni anni fa (sì, anni!): ho lavorato a questa idea in modo maniacale, sviluppando concetti, trame, luoghi e personaggi. Infine, Kubos ha assunto la forma di un progetto transmediale, composto da diverse trame, più formati e piattaforme multimediali.

Come immaginare il mondo di Kubos? Non voglio fare spoiler, quindi mi limito a darti alcune parole chiave: #post-apocalittico, #inquietante, #steampunk, #gotico, #misterioso, qualcosa tra naturale e #innaturale.

Questo mondo è per te se ami: storie poliziesche, giochi narrativi, atmosfere gotiche, mondi post-apocalittici, misteri, avventura, personaggi forti, amori maledetti, filosofia, scienza e forse pseudoscienza. Oggi Kubos è pronto per venire alla luce e mi piacerebbe condividere questo mondo con persone affascinate dalle stesse cose strane, dalle teorie stupefacenti e dalle tinte cupe che affascinano la mia mente.

Kubos è un grande progetto, che richiede molte risorse, ma finirò la costruzione di questo mondo comunque vada questa campagna di prevendita/crowdfunding: Kubos, con i suoi paesaggi, abitanti, storie e segreti, non può più essere fermato. Ma non pensare che il tuo supporto non sia importante! Invece è essenziale per arricchire questo mondo utilizzando servizi professionali per creare video, grafiche e meccaniche di gioco più coinvolgenti.

Grazie per permettere che Kubos diventi realtà e per far parte del suo mondo!

Dentro il gioco

In questa campagna di crowdfunding puoi acquistare le prime due parti dello storyworld di Kubos: una mobile web app, dove scoprire e giocare la storia principale di Kubos, e un gioco da tavolo, in cui seguire una trama parallela. Il gioco da tavolo è in versione Print&Play: puoi scaricarlo tramite l’app e stamparlo in modo autonomo. In pratica, supportando questa campagna, riceverai: 1 app, 2 giochi e più storie.

LA MOBILE WEB APP: KUBOS · GOD PLAYS DICE

Kubos · God Plays Dice è un gioco narrativo dark per gli amanti delle detective stories e dei mondi post-apocalittici. Assumi il ruolo della profiler Nena Kaos e risolvi il cold case di una delle morti più misteriose nella storia di Kubos. Ma assicurati di voler giocare: se segui questa strada, arriverai a verità da cui non potrai tornare indietro. Sei pronto a mettere in discussione tutto ciò in cui credi?

Come giocare

Per risolvere il cold case, è necessario completare una serie di missioni. Come? Esamina teorie e prove, risolvi codici segreti, interroga persone e guadagna punti. Svela i segreti di Kubos, dove il tempo corre contro le leggi della fisica.

Un gioco multipiattaforma

Sei un amante dei giochi per PC o dei browser game? O preferisci i giochi per mobile? Non importa: gioca con Kubos su qualsiasi dispositivo e continua la tua avventura ovunque tu vada. Kubos è una mobile web app: un mix tra un sito web e un’app nativa, in modo che tu possa giocare sia sul tuo PC, sia sul tuo tablet o smartphone.

IL GIOCO DA TAVOLO: KUBOS GPD · CREEPY CASES

Kubos GPD · Creepy Cases è un gioco da tavolo Print & Play che puoi scaricare e stampare da un’area dedicata nella mobile web app Kubos · God Plays Dice.
Vesti i panni di un agente che deve aiutare la profiler Nena Kaos a risolvere alcuni conturbanti casi accaduti prima degli eventi narrati dalla trama principale nella web app.

Come giocare

Kubos GPD · Creepy Cases è un gioco investigativo narrativo da giocare da solo o in collaborazione con i tuoi amici.
Con l’aiuto di Nena Kaos devi esplorare luoghi, esaminare indizi, parlare con le persone e tirare i dadi per risolvere i casi che stanno sconvolgendo il mondo di Kubos. Sei pronto, Agente?

La versione fisica

Al momento, il gioco da tavolo è ufficialmente un gioco Print & Play. Ma se acquisti il ​​gioco adesso, durante la campagna pre-vendita, puoi anche ottenere due “edizioni speciali in scatola”. Un’edizione limitata, che ti invierò in una versione “in box” con una nota di ringraziamento scritta a mano, e un’edizione Deluxe, in cui ogni scatola è davvero speciale, unica e numerata. In futuro, potrebbero verificarsi ulteriori opportunità di ottenere una versione in scatola del gioco, ma le scatole vendute durante la prevendita non verranno replicate.

N.B. Kubos è in costruzione: la grafica e i mockup del gioco digitale e del gioco da tavolo che vedi in questa pagina potrebbero cambiare.

Ciò che ci serve

Quando un prodotto è ancora in costruzione, la trasparenza è essenziale: è per questo che voglio spiegarti come userò il budget acquisito attraverso questa campagna di prevendita. Il costo per creare lo storyworld di Kubos è piuttosto alto, ma posso fare gran parte del lavoro in modo autonomo. Inoltre, sto già sostenendo la maggior parte delle spese in modo indipendente, investendo il profitto guadagnato con la mia ditta Osmotica. Ma, come detto nella mia presentazione, il tuo supporto è essenziale! Il tuo aiuto sarà molto importante per arricchire il gioco, coinvolgendo altri creativi, artisti, professionisti e servizi per rendere Kubos un’esperienza migliore per i giocatori … e un vero gioiello!
Ecco le principali voci di costo per creare lo storyworld di Kubos:

- diversi software, hosting e altri costi tecnici

- costi logistici (tasse, piattaforma di crowdfunding, servizi per processare i pagamenti)

- collaborazione con musicisti, grafici, video editor e altri professionisti, per rendere Kubos un gioco davvero avvincente

- traduttori (inizialmente Kubos uscirà in 2 lingue: inglese e italiano)

- spese di promozione

Cosa ottieni

Con la prevendita, puoi acquistare a un prezzo promozionale l'accesso alla mobile web app con il doppio gioco digitale "Kubos · God Plays Dice" e "Kubos GPD · Creepy Cases". Ma ci sono molte altre offerte esclusive, gadget e prodotti speciali!

I bundle disponibili per supportare Kubos acquistandolo in prevendita sono:

I like Kubos – € 5

I play Kubos – € 15

I spread Kubos – € 25

I love Kubos – € 35

I’m addicted to Kubos – € 50

I cheer on Kubos – € 90

I share Kubos – Limited in Bundle Box Edition – € 180

I fight for Kubos – € 250

I live in Kubos – € 500

I live for Kubos – € 800

Altri modi per partecipare

Se non puoi contribuire, ciò non significa che non puoi aiutare Kubos a venire alla luce! Il tuo aiuto può essere davvero importante. Se ti piace Kubos, per favore:

Spargi la voce a proposito di questa campagna.

Condividi questa campagna sui tuoi canali social.

Grazie!

 

Osmotica e Kubos sul web: 
osmoticastudio.com
Facebook
Instagram
Linkedin (Ylenia Cafaro, autrice di Osmotica e owner of Osmotica)
story_txt:
La nostra storia
Il mio nome è Ylenia e sono la fondatrice di Osmotica, un nuovissimo studio indipendente italiano focalizzato sulla narrazione di storie attraverso diversi format innovativi. Sono specializzata in storytelling e story-editing e ho aperto Osmotica dopo aver lavorato per molti anni come web content manager e docente per adulti, con l’obiettivo “di trasformare un sogno in realtà”: ossia dedicarmi a raccontare storie coinvolgenti e a creare storyworld in cui le persone possano immergersi.
La prima idea di Kubos è nata alcuni anni fa (sì, anni!): ho lavorato a questa idea in modo maniacale, sviluppando concetti, trame, luoghi e personaggi. Infine, Kubos ha assunto la forma di un progetto transmediale, composto da diverse trame, più formati e piattaforme multimediali.
Come immaginare il mondo di Kubos? Non voglio fare spoiler, quindi mi limito a darti alcune parole chiave: #post-apocalittico, #inquietante, #steampunk, #gotico, #misterioso, qualcosa tra naturale e #innaturale.
Questo mondo è per te se ami: storie poliziesche, giochi narrativi, atmosfere gotiche, mondi post-apocalittici, misteri, avventura, personaggi forti, amori maledetti, filosofia, scienza e forse pseudoscienza. Oggi Kubos è pronto per venire alla luce e mi piacerebbe condividere questo mondo con persone affascinate dalle stesse cose strane, dalle teorie stupefacenti e dalle tinte cupe che affascinano la mia mente.
Kubos è un grande progetto, che richiede molte risorse, ma finirò la costruzione di questo mondo comunque vada questa campagna di prevendita/crowdfunding: Kubos, con i suoi paesaggi, abitanti, storie e segreti, non può più essere fermato. Ma non pensare che il tuo supporto non sia importante! Invece è essenziale per arricchire questo mondo utilizzando servizi professionali per creare video, grafiche e meccaniche di gioco più coinvolgenti.
Grazie per permettere che Kubos diventi realtà e per far parte del suo mondo!
Dentro il gioco
In questa campagna di crowdfunding puoi acquistare le prime due parti dello storyworld di Kubos: una mobile web app, dove scoprire e giocare la storia principale di Kubos, e un gioco da tavolo, in cui seguire una trama parallela. Il gioco da tavolo è in versione Print&Play: puoi scaricarlo tramite l’app e stamparlo in modo autonomo. In pratica, supportando questa campagna, riceverai: 1 app, 2 giochi e più storie.
LA MOBILE WEB APP: KUBOS · GOD PLAYS DICE

Kubos · God Plays Dice è un gioco narrativo dark per gli amanti delle detective stories e dei mondi post-apocalittici. Assumi il ruolo della profiler Nena Kaos e risolvi il cold case di una delle morti più misteriose nella storia di Kubos. Ma assicurati di voler giocare: se segui questa strada, arriverai a verità da cui non potrai tornare indietro. Sei pronto a mettere in discussione tutto ciò in cui credi?
Come giocare
Per risolvere il cold case, è necessario completare una serie di missioni. Come? Esamina teorie e prove, risolvi codici segreti, interroga persone e guadagna punti. Svela i segreti di Kubos, dove il tempo corre contro le leggi della fisica.
Un gioco multipiattaforma
Sei un amante dei giochi per PC o dei browser game? O preferisci i giochi per mobile? Non importa: gioca con Kubos su qualsiasi dispositivo e continua la tua avventura ovunque tu vada. Kubos è una mobile web app: un mix tra un sito web e un’app nativa, in modo che tu possa giocare sia sul tuo PC, sia sul tuo tablet o smartphone.
IL GIOCO DA TAVOLO: KUBOS GPD · CREEPY CASES

Kubos GPD · Creepy Cases è un gioco da tavolo Print & Play che puoi scaricare e stampare da un’area dedicata nella mobile web app Kubos · God Plays Dice.Vesti i panni di un agente che deve aiutare la profiler Nena Kaos a risolvere alcuni conturbanti casi accaduti prima degli eventi narrati dalla trama principale nella web app.
Come giocare
Kubos GPD · Creepy Cases è un gioco investigativo narrativo da giocare da solo o in collaborazione con i tuoi amici.Con l’aiuto di Nena Kaos devi esplorare luoghi, esaminare indizi, parlare con le persone e tirare i dadi per risolvere i casi che stanno sconvolgendo il mondo di Kubos. Sei pronto, Agente?

Al momento, il gioco da tavolo è ufficialmente un gioco Print & Play. Ma se acquisti il ​​gioco adesso, durante la campagna pre-vendita, puoi anche ottenere due “edizioni speciali in scatola”. Un’edizione limitata, che ti invierò in una versione “in box” con una nota di ringraziamento scritta a mano, e un’edizione Deluxe, in cui ogni scatola è davvero speciale, unica e numerata. In futuro, potrebbero verificarsi ulteriori opportunità di ottenere una versione in scatola del gioco, ma le scatole vendute durante la prevendita non verranno replicate.
N.B. Kubos è in costruzione: la grafica e i mockup del gioco digitale e del gioco da tavolo che vedi in questa pagina potrebbero cambiare.

Quando un prodotto è ancora in costruzione, la trasparenza è essenziale: è per questo che voglio spiegarti come userò il budget acquisito attraverso questa campagna di prevendita. Il costo per creare lo storyworld di Kubos è piuttosto alto, ma posso fare gran parte del lavoro in modo autonomo. Inoltre, sto già sostenendo la maggior parte delle spese in modo indipendente, investendo il profitto guadagnato con la mia ditta Osmotica. story:
Dolfans NYC, the New York City Miami Dolphins fan club, needs your help!

In what might be the dumbest crowd funding campaign since the NoPhone, Dolfans NYC wants to raise $500 to buy 96 inflatable palm trees to take to the Jets/Dolphins game in New Jersey on December 1st for Monday Night Football.

Last year when planning our 750 person trip to the Jets/Dolphins game (aka the #MetLifeTakeover) someone said that the only thing missing to make it a Dolphins home game was the palm trees. I of course went out and bought a bunch of inflatable ones.

I had a bunch of small ones in my pocket heading into the game and every time the Dolphins scored I would pull one out, blow it up, and throw it into the crowd. The security guards kept taking them away but were laughing about how many I had on me.

This year we have nearly 1000 Dolphins fans sitting in the upper decks for this years #MetLifeTakeover. We already have printed up hundreds of rally towels but this is Monday Night Football! We need to step up our game.

I found a place that sells small inflatable palm trees in bulk but the minimum order is 96 so it costs nearly $300. I want to get at LEAST 96 for the game and pass them out in our sections so that on the Dolphins first touchdown palm trees rain from the sky!

Help make my incredibly stupid dream a reality!

Indigogo's minimum amount is $500 but we only need $300. Any money raised over $300 (unless we hit $600 and can buy another case!) will be donated to charity. 

If we raise less than $300 all the money will still be used to buy inflatable palm trees... just maybe not 96 of them.

story:
Are there still any fans of 3D space sims out there?
With the ongoing nostalgia for games like Wing Commander and a new wave of big PC titles like Star Citizen, we'd think so!
But there is a serious lack of this type of game on smartphones and tablets. For a few minutes of space action on the train, bus or the doctor's waiting room. Or a few hours at home.
That's why we at Ironman project have started our biggest game yet, Armada.

After two years of hard work, the game is nearing completion. But to finish it and make it the best game it can be, we need your help!


User interface graphics are not final



They came to eradicate our species.
They came to take our planets.
We will not give them up.
Not without a good fight.
Commander Nadjarev, Black Knight Squadron

A hundred years ago, thousands of human settlers that were fleeing a devasted earth reached a habitable solar system. They named it's planets after the Titans, mythological gods of the golden era. Life and technological advancement prospered on the ten planets of the system, mankind's new home.
Until the original inhabitants returned.
The Acari are a species that evolved from highly intelligent insects. It is unknown why they had left the system hundreds of years ago. But fact is that they have returned, and demand it back. We have nowhere else to go, so our only option is to fight.
You are part of the Black Knight elite squadron. Each of you will stand against a thousand ships of the Acari Armada.


   

Don't let the fact that this game runs an a smartphone fool you - this is a "real" 3D space combat game like Wing Commander (not quite as story-driven though). You will need skill, a little bit of strategy and ideally some experience with other space games.
There is no restricted movement, auto-aim or enemies that only act as cannon-fodder (well, most of them don't). This game is not too easy. But the harder the mission, the greater the satisfaction when you succeed!


 

Based on four different hull types, you can equip your ship with ten different weapons and a variety of shields, boosters and special modules. Create an agile interceptor or a bulky bomber.


   

Virtual joysticks have a bad reputation among players of mobile games. Many developers go with gyro controls instead. But they have their own disadvantages and wouldn't fit a game like Armada.
Our solution: Virtual sticks, done the right way. Flexible, configurable, crazy precise while also allowing fast maneuvers. Think of the advantages of a mouse and stick combined (except the sensory feedback of course).
Our testers usually begin to really appreciate the controls after 5-10 minutes of playing.

If you still prefer physical controls, of course you can use a gamepad or even a flightstick. (Additional hard- and/or software may be needed - if your pad works with any Android game at all, it will work with Armada.)

 

You are playing with pilots all over the world in a shared solar system. Every victory takes the human settlers closer to freedom - every defeat does the opposite.


  

A skilled wingman on your side will make any mission a lot easier. Their ship will be controlled by the computer, but their equipment and skills will match the ones of the real player.



 

We know that mobile players often only have a few minutes for their game. Therefore, the missions in Armada can be finished in 3 to 10 minutes. But don't worry - should the Armada addiction hit you (as it happens to our coder quite frequently), the next mission is ready within a few seconds. Play for five minutes or two hours - it's up to you.

Missions are generated out of 13 different types with up to 10 levels of difficulty. Escort missions, capital ship battles or pure fighter combat - the choice is yours. You will face tougher enemies and need new strategies at higher difficulty levels.


  

Don't let the IAPs in Armada deceive you. What you can buy with real money can be earned through gameplay as well. The better you are playing, the faster you will gain resources. Still, anyone willing to spend some of their hard earned money can build their dream ship for a very reasonable price.

As there is no player vs. player combat, it's also not pay-to-win. Additional items will help you against your common foe - the Acari - instead of other players.


 

At this time, the game is designed for Android systems only - sorry to all Apple users!
You will need a pretty potent device, preferable with a display of 4.5 inches or larger (the bigger the better).
For example, Samsung Galaxy S3 or higher, Note 1-3 or Sony Xperia Z (phone and tablet) work great. But the game will run on a lot of devices, it may just be not as playable or pretty on old, weak or small ones.



Let me introduce Commander Nadjarew. We have given her the difficult task of explaining why we dare to ask for money before the game is even finished.
At this state, Armada is already very playable, even if there are a lot of little things left to do. We could probably finish the game without any financial aid. But that would show in the final product, and we want Armada to be the best mobile space combat game available. We want it to rock.

Thanks a lot, Commander. You can now return to your day job of blasting aliens.

The most important thing right now is audio. Having fitting music makes a game so much cooler. But even stock music is not cheap. One piece is around 30-200 Euros. And we'd like to have at least 10 more songs for variety.
A voice actress posing as wingwoman would also be nice.  We have a good male one already, but no female one.

There are also a lot of smaller things. Little gifts for our brave testers. Additional art ressources to make to GUI prettier. Maybe a few more used test devices. 2000 Euros should be enough to cover the audio department and various small things. But like every campaign, this one also has

3000 €
Dressing up
With this sum, we could afford additional art assets and manpower to really polish the game up and help it get the attention we believe it deserves.

4000 €
Advanced flight system and enemy AI
The enemies are challenging enough as they are. But their behaviour and AI patterns are rather simple.  We would like to implement squad tactics and advanced flight maneuvers, which in the end means better AI.
The first version would probably be released without this advanced AI, so the release date (summer) is not in danger. But when we reach the stretch goal, we could start working on a big update right away, without having to wait for money to come in.

5000 €
Dynamic mission system
Armada's missions are generated on the fly. But we would like less randomness, and more dynamicness (is this a word?)
Imagine an actual war being played out on a server, and you having an important role in leading mankind to victory. Sounds cool?
Like before, this would probably be realized in a big update after the game's release.

6000 €
PC version
As the graphics engine we are using (JPCT) is also available on PC, a version for this system should be doable within reasonable time. PC users could play in the same universe as the Android guys.

10000 €
Ouya version
Maybe there are enough fans of the system that are longing for a space combat game...?


What if I like the things I've seen so far, but cannot give any money?

Tell people about it! And please guide them to this page.

story:
Who am I?

I’m Victor Popa, a 30-ish Game Developer. I started working as a professional Level Designer back in the days of PS2 and the original Xbox, having roles such as Lead Level Designer, Technical Director for Level Design and Producer; here are some of the projects I’ve worked on:

FIFA 17 | Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands | Watch_Dogs 2 | Watch_Dogs (WiiU) | Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier | Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X 2 | Rabbids Go Home | Harley-Davidson: Race to the Rally | Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2 


While everyone is busy programming, why should you learn design?

This is a course that will teach a novice (or an already experienced Game-Dev) how to design the experience for the users playing their game, using Unreal Engine 4, the most powerful and commonly-used engine in the AAA games industry.

In the current games market, your product will retain users only if they’re engaged and “comfortably challenged”.

Finding the balance in a complex game system is never easy, but I’m here to show you all the industry-standard techniques used to transform any game into a memorable experience.

The course will be entirely project based, so you will start by sketching your intentions and building “graybox” levels for an isometric adventure game. You’ll learn the basic rules of guiding the player through Level Design, difficulty progression and balancing. For each completed chapter, you’ll have to polish the Level and – if we reach our stretch goals – add Art and Sound to it.

As you’ll gather more knowledge, we’ll move up to First Person Levels, where you’ll practice all the finesse involved with Level Design – architectural and spatial hints, lighting cues, interactive moments and beat-per-beat timing and tweaking of the game experience.

Ultimately, you’ll have all the knowledge and skills to evoke emotional responses from your players – you’ll know how to amuse, scare or comfort them!

The full price of the course will be US$199.99 when finished, so this is your chance to get it at considerable discount!

 

How is this course different to others?

Well… there aren’t many courses like this, in the first place! Level Design has been the mysterious member of the Game-Dev family – as a job family, there are few industry specialists, and even fewer that have created courses about it.

What makes this course unique is that all the Levels you will create as practice assignments will be linked together and they will have to “tell an interactive story”. You’ll learn how to use Unreal Engine 4, the basic concepts of Level Design but also putting it all together in a playable (and enjoyable!) experience crafted entirely by yourself!

You’ll have plenty of talking-head videos, diagrams and reference material. Collaborating with the other students will be encouraged – be it for brainstorming or peer-review of your work.

I have over a dozen years of experience as a professional game developer, and I have spent most of them studying and practicing the art of Level Design. I have taught workshops, classes and co-workers about Level Design so I will be able to explain all the concepts from this course clearly.

We will focus on content tools within Unreal Engine 4 – brushes, materials and lights, but we’ll also dig around the blueprint system as well as the data structures and general project guidelines.

Although we’ll have a strong focus on the single-player aspect of video-games, most of the concepts here can be applied on multiplayer games as well.

This course will be as comprehensive as possible, ensuring that upon your successful completion you’ll be able to join any project built with Unreal Engine 4 knowing what to use and how to collaborate with artists, designers or programmers.

 

Who is this course for?

Any enthusiast that wants to learn how video-game experiences are created! You might be just starting out, or maybe you’re already an Environment Artist, Programmer or Game Designer – discover the techniques you can use to entertain players with your creations!

 

What’s the estimated course length?

At this early stage – I estimate we’ll have about 40-50 hours of video and a lot of slides and documents that you’ll be able to re-use on any project.

 

More about me:

 

I am currently a Guest Lecturer on video-game courses at the best private University here in Zagreb – Algebra.

Originally from Romania, I now live in beautiful Zagreb, Croatia. I started working in the video-game industry at 21, directly as a Level Designer – mainly because I already had a solid 3d Art portfolio since high-school.

Feel free to check out my LinkedIn or my credited work!

 

FAQ

1. When is the course going to start?

May 1st 2018 on Udemy.

2. What if you don't reach your target? Will you still produce this course?

YES! The course is set-up to start on May 1st no matter what. This Indiegogo campaign is a way for us to get in touch with our first wave of students and for our first students to get the exclusive discounts and perks.

3. What do I need to know to attend this course? Any prerequisites or tools?

Anyone can attend this course, you don't need any prior knowledge. Just your passion for video  games and how they're made.

4. Is this course suitable for me if I already work as a Level Designer?

This course takes you from beginner level and all the way up to working in an actual professional environment. It contains industry standard techniques used throughout my 12 years experience as a game developer on AAA games. Also, it's very hands-on as you'll practice directly in Unreal Engine, creating your own levels (check out the course content plan in the Updates tab).

If you're already started with Level Design, but want to round-up your knowledge, this is the course for you. 

5. What tools will we use?

 Pen & paper and Unreal Engine 4 (we'll install it together).

6. What are the minimum system requirements to use Unreal Engine 4?

Desktop PC or Mac.

Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.

Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.

NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

8 GB RAM.
**If you get any secret perk - the MinSpecs might change - please check with us in advance**

story:
After a fantastic Kickstarter campaign with more than 760 backers ($35.000), we believe that we must offer the opportunity to the Indiegogo community to be part of this awesome project.

'Make a Mess’ is a highly convivial and mischievous board game to play with family and friends, based on the original comic character ‘Catsass’. Created by French illustrator Claude Combacau, Catsass won a Golden Blog Awards 2015 in the “Best Comic” category. First book to be released in spring 2016 by Planeta (publisher in Spain of the comics Game of Thrones®,Star Wars® and The Walking Dead Chronicles®).

Developed by board game designer Delphin Druelle at Eclosion Games, ‘Make a Mess’ features the comic’s perfectly irreverent cat making an uncontrollable mess in the house – while trying not to get caught.

Support our Indiegogo campaign today to turn ‘Make a Mess’ into reality. This is a game eager to conquer the world with cat craziness. We need YOU to make a mess!


Cats can be crazy: loving and tender one second, then scratching your face the moment after. And that’s the way we love them! Inspired by our feline friends, we’ve decided to go berserk and offer you the choice between 2 different editions, with very distinct flavours:

 To have a look at some 'Bite Me B**** edition' illustrations, click here! 


The development process included +60 blind playtests and +250 individual playtesters, as well as an unreasonable amount of French wine and cheese.

A HUGE thank you to all of those who have been part of this incredible journey. Thank you for your encouragements to bring this crazy game to life. Our special thanks go to the managers of tabletop game shops who have very kindly hosted all the playtests parties.

Here are the top 5 game features that our playtesters have liked the most:

  • The players’ jokes triggered thanks to the Catsass comic art illustrations 
  • The level of adrenaline which quickly grows exponentially during the game 
  • The possibility to play tricks at the worst possible time (for the opponent) 
  • The duration (15min max) which allows for successive games (revenge!) 
  • The fact that no cat was harmed in the making of this game (only humans)


Support our campaign with the hashtag #makeamessgame and help spread the fun!

We are proud to have negotiated for you some outstanding worldwide shipping conditions (with customs fees & VAT). Games delivered to backers in the USA and EU are shipped within those two regions.




PRECAUTION

We’ve prepared our campaign with the objective of making sure that you enjoy ‘Make a Mess’ as soon as possible, with the highest quality standards possible.

The core content (comic art illustrations, rule book, tokens, etc.) is almost fully designed and ready to print. Time has been planned with the extended team after the campaign, to make sure that all additional content is at the same cutting edge level of product quality as the core content.

Key risks with board game production and delivery generally include printing and shipping delays. To mitigate these risks, we have decided to partner with two leaders in the industry:

- Whatz Games, manufacturer of choice for popular board games such as Fief (Asyncron Games), King of Tokyo (Iello), Shadow of Normandie (Devil Pig Games) and a lot more. Whatz Games has been guiding us with the requirements to create ‘Make a Mess’ with state-of-the-art quality.

- Ideaspatcher, global shipping experts specializing in postal distribution solutions for the USA, Europe and the rest of the world. Leading board game creators currently working with Ideaspatcher include Michael Mindes (TMG: Coin Age, Harbour, Thief’s Market) and Jamey Stegmeier (Stonemaier Games: Scythe, Tuscany, Viticulture).

Thanks to our outstanding production and shipping partners, who have been extremely supportive in helping us plan the best game delivery possible, ‘Make a Mess’ is expected to be delivered to all backers in autumn 2016.

story:
FAQ

Q:Does the operating system need to pay to activate?

A:No,Cause for the device that below 10.1 inches can be free to use the latest Windows and Office.GDP Win use the genuine Windows 10 system,It will be automatically activated after installation.

Q: Is it possible to upgrade Z8700 into Z8750?

A:Of course.We also want to upgrade Z8700 into Z8750.Due to Z8750 is just listed recently. So it is hard for us to find a stable supplier immediately.We also will try our best to solve this problem.When mass production,If we can find a suitable supply for Z8750, we will use Z8750.If not,we will use Z8700.

Q:What kind of games can you play?

A: All of PC games and other kind of games that you can play with Windows 10 system,You can even use VMware Workstion install the Windows 98 or Windows XP play the retro game

Q:Why flexible goal?

A:We are a company specialized in the design and manufacture of video games consoles.And we all have a dream to make a portable handheld PC/Gaming consoles based on Windows system.so we make GPD WIN.About the flexible goal ,No matter the found raise is succeed or not.we will be surely complete this perfect device!!!Of cause,we all hope you can help us to make this campaign success.So we will have more confidence for GPD WIN!!!

Q:When does GPD WIN ship? 

A:We expect GPD WIN to begin shipping worldwide in October 2016, and hope it arrives in your hands in November2016! As an early backer, you will get GPD WIN before anyone else in the world.

Q: Are shipping fees included in the prices?

A: Yes, shipping fees are included. And all will shipping by DHL.It may just take 6-8 day then you can receive it.If it is not available by DHL,shipping by Postal Parcel.

story:
The Save Ferris Project, in a nutshell:

Who IS Ferris, and why does he need to be saved? Imagine you have lost your job.  That’s not an uncommon occurrence, but during the subsequent job search, your health starts to fail.  You have a wife and 4 children who depend on you, but your health is so poor that you are no longer physically able to do the tasks at the job that supported them for 10 years.  What do you do?  You might start feel adrift and directionless.

I imagine if your friends came to you with a solution to your dilemma – a way to start over in a new field so you could support your family again, you might jump at the chance. 

And that is The Save Ferris Project:  giving Ferris a chance for a new focus for life, through on the job education.  Oh, and building some really cool video games, too!

Along the way we're going to have a lot of fun - see, we're not doing things quite like a normal crowd sourced fundraiser.  That would be boring.  Instead, there's real-world meet and greet at places like the Great Plains Reniassance Festival on September 22nd & 23rd, where you can meet the founder of the fundraiser in person.  And contests & giveaways, like two free tickets to Midwest Beerfest - nothing like wining free beer for just helping spread the word.

What We Need & What You Get

We'll be raising funds to handle a few basic things:

1) Funding to pay Ferris a paycheck for two years.  Only a portion on the fundraiser goes towards that - part of the cost is handled by my company (Midnight Ryder Technologies) and as game sales begin, the long term costs of his employment are further defrayed until we reach the break even point on sales.

2) Equipment.  Ferris has a fairly old computer, none of the software necessary, and not even a comfy chair in my office to work from.

3) Various business support bits - taxes, the percentages that go to IndieGoGo and PayPal, that sort of thing.

4) Engine and content licensing - that way, the time between breaking ground on development of each of the games and profiting from release is reduced to as short as possible.

A complete breakdown of all the funds distribution (including what the plan becomes if funding exceeds the planned amount) is available online.

This will allow for Ferris's training and the release of FIVE new games from Midnight Ryder Technologies over the next two years.  Curious what's on the menu?  We've put our list of planned games online, too!

And there is a huge list of perks for helping us reach our goal, along with the cool giveaways happening during the 90 day fundraising period!

Other Ways You Can Help

Also, be sure to check on the website for ways you can help us spread the word!  We don't JUST need money - we need money and exposure!  And check back often - we'll be throwing out tons of updates as we work towards our goal!

story:
Update 18/09/2015:  

Many users asked us  if the material of cards is safe. AR Magic Cards are made of  enviroment-friendly papers and ink. Most importantly,  all cards have passed safety testing and quality certification. So, you may rest assure that it's absolutely SAFE to children.

Update 15/09/2015:

Can't wait for the final version? Try the trial.

Update 14/09/2015: 

We will offer you global free shipping service, if you can share our campaign to your Facebook, Twitter, Google+. (Please check out the details on the page.) It is also good to share good stuff with your friends!

Augmented reality (AR) is a live direct view of a physical, real-world environment whose elements are augmented (or supplemented) by computer-generated sensory input such as video, graphics or GPS data. 

Wait a minute, too complex to understand? Watch this video?


Do you want to have a try?

Here is the Trial Version of AR Magic Cards ?, you can click the below link to download it, and feel the wonder in advance.

http://en.armagicschool.com/special/special.html

Yes, this is AR technology. You see, AR Magic Cards is the easiest way to know what AR technology is.

We are featured on:

?      

  




We work with strong partners:



Using advanced data compression technique, AR Magic Cards software can hold more markers and digital content and quicker recognition than ordinary AR products.

AR Magic Cards uses the most advanced AR technique. 3D cartoon character is suspended on reality environment. The 3D character can response when user touch it. It can still be tracked and work even only 50% of the card is available in the camera view region.


Eight  languages supported, including English, Chinese, French, German, Spanish, Russion, Japanese, and Korean?


There are 3 character cards. Find the cards with the same mark of character cards, you can make the character change to new character and background, so funny!


Do you like word hunting game? Try these special AR games!


This is not a paper card. It contains many words and 3D cartoons! Wow, Can any other cards be more interesting than AR magic cards?

 

John Zhao, a Chinese computer-based designer who works in AR (Augmented Reality), is the father of a five-year-old girl. He loves his daughter, but his work used to take so much of his time that he could rarely be with her. He wanted to change this situation.

Two years ago it occurred to him to use his talents to make her a special gift. He took two weeks to write an iPad program featuring two virtual 3D characters, a dinosaur and a rabbit. He drew the two animals on paper cards, then used the iPad to scan each one. Bang! The dinosaur and rabbit popped up on the screen! They were almost lifelike, and could say hello if you touched them. His daughter loved them so much that she showed them to all her friends, and more and more kids came to love his invention. They called the pictures AR Magic Cards.

To develop more cards, John dropped the work that he was doing, and began to explore the potential of his new idea with his team. The first version they developed is called AR Magic Cards I, which is already very popular in China. However, this version is only available in Chinese, and John's dream is to give every kid a chance to play with his cards and experience AR. He needs an opportunity to attention to his invention, and also money to develop an English version - AR Magic Cards II, which has more interesting functions and games.


In China, AR Magic Cards have brought happiness to hundreds of thousands children. Now, we would like to bring this unique technology to indiegogo, and share it with people all over the world. We need your great idea and suggestions. Your supports will make AR Magic Cards ?  fly to all over the world sooner! Your supports will make more people to know and enjoy AR technology. Let’s change the world together!

Here’s a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign. All perks include the free mobile App?for smart phones & tablets?except Wonder the Dino doll.

Wonder the Dino is the mascot of AR School, we hope you’ll like it. Otherwise, we provide you AR Magic Cards? and AR Magic Cards?. There is no 2-card-interaction in AR Magic Cards?, but it  also have many interesting animations and games.Now, you can enjoy amazing reading with your children or friends in an easy way.

Reference program 1

Please help us to share AR magic cards with your friends! IAll the items can be free shipping if you share our project on one of your social network site, like Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc. Otherwise, you may need to back us $10 international shipping fee. Here is some steps for you to follow:

Reference program 2

If you friend back our project due to your referral, we will give you a special cartoom sticker as a gift. The more people you refer, the more stickers you’ll get. The more times you share our campaign, the more chance you can get more stickers.



Q: What is AR?

A: AR is short for Augment Reality technology which is a new technique based on virtual reality which could modify a virtual image displayed in a reality scene on the screen of cell phone, tablet PC etc to express impressively to the audiences.

Q: I have a smart phone/ tablet PC (hereinafter referred to as mobile terminal); can I use AR Magic Cards on my mobile terminal?

A: AR Magic Cards are new type of interactive educational product special designed to be sued at mobile terminals such as cell phone, tablet PC etc for a convenient user experience. Any mobile terminal can apply it if the models match.

Q: I am sure that my mobile terminal matches all conditions, how could I see the AR effect?

A: Purchase AR Magic Cards and download the AR Magic Cards App and get installed; hit the run button and follow the guide then you will see the amazing AR effect.

Q: What should I do before starting to use the apps?

A: For the effect of using, please check the model and parameter of your mobile terminal and make sure it matches. Minimum 2GB RAM required. Before you play it please turn off all the background apps.

Q: How to turn off the other APPs which are still in processing?

A:  for IOS – double click the HOME button and slide up the apps you want them to be turned off.

For Android – long click the HOME button and slide the apps you want them to be turned off toward right until vanished.

Q: How to download the AR Magic Cards APP (referred as APP)?

A: You can scan the QR code inside the package to download; and go to search at the Apple APP Store or Google Play.

Q: Why it can’t be downloaded?

A: Please make sure the mobile data connected or download at the WIFI environment. For the processes please look for the users guide.

Q: Why I can’t get it installed? How to deal with that?

A: Look at the RAM left in your mobile terminal makes sure you have a minimum of 2GB. The download file might be damaged at some point, please download again and then install. 

Q: I have more than one mobile terminal can all of them install AR Magic Cards APP?

A: the genuine APP purchased could be downloaded and installed at any mobile terminals through the identifying code.

Q: Can I still have the AR effect if I don’t have physical cards?

A: AR technology need recognition to be displayed and the books and cards are. So AR technology needs to read these recognitions for the best user experience.

Q: Can AR Magic Cards still work without mobile terminal?

A: Certainly. AR Magic Cards provides multiple user experiences; which also draw the kids by AR magic books, cards, painting and the contents not only just on the mobile terminal but which would definitely add more fun and more real experience.

Q: Can the AR Magic Cards APP be used at the traditional PC?

A: You can connect your mobile terminal with the PC for a bigger image. Mobile apps are becoming the main stream which has brought a lot more convenience and it’s the advantage of AR Magic Cards distinguished from the early AR products. 

Q: I have some other cards and can those be recognized by AR Magic Cards APP?

A: AR Magic Cards APP is something designed for the AR customize cards only.
story_txt:
Update 18/09/2015:  

Many users asked us  if the material of cards is safe. AR Magic Cards are made of  enviroment-friendly papers and ink. Most importantly,  all cards have passed safety testing and quality certification. So, you may rest assure that it's absolutely SAFE to children.

Update 

15/09/2015:

Can't wait for the final version? Try the trial.


Update 14/09/2015: 


We will offer you global free shipping service, if you can share our campaign to your Facebook, Twitter, Google+. (Please check out the details on the page.) It is also good to share good stuff with your friends!


Augmented reality (AR) is a live
direct view of a physical, real-world environment whose elements are augmented (or
supplemented) by computer-generated sensory input such as video, graphics or GPS data. 



Wait a minute, too complex to
understand? Watch this video?






Do you want to have a try?
Here is the Trial Version of AR Magic Cards ?, you can click the below link to download it, and feel the wonder in advance.

http://en.armagicschool.com/special/special.html
Yes, this is AR technology. You see, AR
Magic Cards is the easiest way to know what AR technology is.








We are featured on:

?      



  








We work with strong partners:
















Using 

advanced data compression technique, AR Magic Cards software can hold more markers and digital content and quicker recognition than ordinary AR products.

AR Magic Cards uses the most advanced AR
technique. 3D cartoon character is suspended on reality environment. The 3D
character can response when user touch it. It can still be tracked and work
even only 50% of the card is available in the camera view region.

Eight  languages supported,
including English, Chinese, French, German, Spanish, Russion, Japanese, and
Korean?


There are 3 

character cards. Find the cards
with the same mark of character cards, you can make the character change to new
character and background, so funny!


Do 

you like word hunting game? Try these
special AR games!


This is not a 

paper card. It contains many
words and 3D cartoons! Wow, Can any other cards be more interesting than AR
magic cards?
 







John Zhao, a Chinese computer-based designer who works in AR (Augmented Reality), is the father of a five-year-old girl. He loves 

his daughter, but his work used to take so much of his time that he could rarely be with her. He wanted to change this situation.
Two years ago it occurred to him to use his talents to make her a special gift. He took two weeks to 

write an iPad program featuring two virtual 3D characters, a dinosaur and a rabbit. He drew the two animals on paper cards, then used the iPad to scan each one. Bang! The dinosaur and rabbit popped up on the screen! They were almost 

lifelike, and could say hello if you touched them. His daughter loved them so much that she showed them to all her friends, and more and more kids came to love his invention. They called the pictures AR Magic Cards.
To develop more 

cards, John dropped the work that he was doing, and began to explore the potential of his new idea with his team. The first version they developed is called AR Magic Cards I, which is already very popular in China. However, this version 

is only available in Chinese, and John's dream is to give every kid a chance to play with his cards and experience AR. He needs an opportunity to attention to his invention, and also money to develop an English version - AR Magic Cards 

II, which has more interesting functions and games.





In China, AR Magic Cards have brought 

happiness to hundreds of thousands children. Now,
we would like to bring this unique technology to indiegogo, and share it with
people all over the world. We need your great idea and suggestions. Your supports
will make AR Magic Cards ? 
fly to all over the world sooner! Your supports will make more people to know
and enjoy AR technology. Let’s change the world together!







Here’s a breakdown of the 

perks you can choose from when you support this campaign. All perks include the free mobile App?for smart phones & tablets?except Wonder the Dino doll.
Wonder the Dino is the mascot of AR School, we hope you’ll like it. 

Otherwise, we provide you AR Magic Cards? and AR Magic Cards?. There is no 2-card-interaction in AR Magic Cards?, but it  also have many interesting animations and games.Now, you can enjoy amazing reading with your children or 

friends in an easy way.

story:
Quidditch is a co-ed, full-contact sport based on the magical game played in J. K. Rowling's Harry Potter series. The sport was invented in 2005, and is played today by over five hundred teams in Canada, the US, Mexico, Britain, Italy, France, Finland, China, Argentina and Australia.

The IQA Summer Games (July 8-9) are fast approaching and so far there are confirmed teams from the United States, the United Kingdom, France, and Australia. However, Canada does not have a team - yet! It is last minute, but there is a group of us trying to make a team to represent Canada for this international event.

Who can be on the team? Any Canadian Quidditch players are welcome, including Canadians who have been playing on American teams or any international teams. Anybody who plays for a Canadian team but is not Canadian is also welcome if you are happy to represent Canada at the games!

As you can imagine, gathering players from across the country is no mean feat, especially when it comes to money. Round trip plane tickets alone are in excess of $1000 and giving our players somewhere to sleep and something to eat can be pricey too. Given that nearly everyone on the team is still in university it will be a huge sacrifice to make sure Canada is represented. But, we don't have to do it alone!

Your donation will go directly towards the players, ensuring that they have plane tickets in hand, comfy beds (or at least beds at all) to sleep in, and food in their tummies.

WE CAN DO THIS! Let's represent Canada!

WE CAN DO THIS! Let's represent Canada!

story:
These cards are still available at http://unique3ddigital.com/cart/home.php?cat=319

This project is to raise funds for the next playing cards art project. Plus, I'd like to get your input on what that art should be. So now only will you receive gorgeous Arthur Rackham Fairy Tale art playing cards, posters, prints and more, you will also be very influential in directing the future works of our little company's playing card division. So what do you think I should do next? A friend suggested more Arthur Rackham, specifically Wagner's Ring. Someone else suggested more Fairy Tale art (Alice in Wonderland was one idea). I'd also like to do some fine art cards like Henri Rousseau's work - or Georgia O'Keefe's or some of the Impressionists or DaVinci's sketches...

 

About These Cards and Prints

Arthur Rackham's (1867-1939) haunting and dreamlike illustrations enliven famous works such as Wagner's The Ring of Nibelung, Midsummer Night's Dream, Twilight of the Gods, Peter Pan in Kensington Gardens, Alice in Wonderland, Mother Goose, Undine, Wind and the Willows, Gulliver's Travel King of the Golden River and more.  Some of Arthur Rackman's most famous works also adorn these stylish playing cards.

 

The Impact

 

For every thousand dollars raised I can begin a new card project. And your input can help determine what art will grace the card faces of the next project.

What You Get

 

Features of the Deck:

   *  56 Poker Playing Cards with fairy tale illustrations
   *  Unique full color illustration for each Joker and Face Card
   *  Fairy tale illustration Tuck Box
   *  Fairy tale illustration Card Back

CARD SIZE: Poker size card deck (2.5” x 3.5”) (63 mm x 88 mm)
CARD FRONT and BACK: 4 color process You can watch the print process in action here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cUBorxosoyk
RADIUS CORNERS: Standard
CARD STOCK : 305 gsm, smooth Linen Embossed black core playing card stock from Arjowiggins Italy
FINISH: aqueous base plus UV overcoat
CUT: cards cut through automatic punch process (best cutting process)
NUMBER OF CARDS: 52 cards + 4 Jokers + 1 ad card


Card Back


"Tuck Case" Card Box

The Fairy Tale Art playing cards come in a Tuck Case card box with Fairy Tale art motiff.  PACKAGING: full color printed tuck box 15 PT C1S with cello wrapping and opening tear tape.


Uncut Sheets

Printed on card stock at the factory, uncut sheets measure approx 23"x27". 
 

Signed Queen of Clubs Art Prints in 6 sizes


Ranging from $19-$100 (USA/Canada shipping included, add  additional amount for international shipping as indicated below). To get both card decks and prints select the card decks, add the amount for the print(s) and send me a message stating which print(s) you want.

44x 58.7 = $100  add $12 international shipping
36 x 48 = $72  add $10 international shipping
24 x 32 $44  add $8 international shipping
16 x 21.3 = $28  add $6 international shipping
11 x 14.7 = $22  add $4 international shipping
7.5 x 10 = $19   add $2 international shipping

Paper: Enhanced Matte
For artists and photographers seeking a flat matte surface this paper is perfect for images that do not require gloss. It yields highly saturated images, while maintaining excellent highlight and shadow detail. Professional photographers, digital artists and amateurs alike will find Enhanced Matte Paper a remarkable choice for any project.

Thickness: Heavyweight Paper – 10 mil (250gsm)
Finish: Flat Matte Finish
Permanence: This classic matte poster paper received a lightfast permanence rating of 76 years under glass and 110 years with UV filter, from the Wilhelm Imaging Research Institute

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to getting your own art card decks, get 1 or 2 more for presents for your friends. They are beautiful and lts of folks have been gushing over them.  You can also spread the word on Facebook and Twitter or just send an email message to a friend. Finally, please don't forget about the IndieGoGo share tools!
