story:
Exclusive wallpapers for PERKS/DONATONS

Table Soccer Fan

Get Messi or Ronaldo caricature wallpaper. Decorate your computer screen with an 1024x768 pixels wallpaper, plus, get a facebook cover photo.
Also, you will get a 10 EUR G-Coupon towards purchasing a copy of the game, after the pre-order period on our website ends.

Contribute now! Only 3 EUR

 

Big Table Soccer Fan

Get Messi, Ronaldo, Ibrahimović, El Shaarawy or Rooney caricature wallpaper. Decorate your computer screen with an 3425x2569 pixels wallpaper (A2 for printing), plus, get a facebook cover photo.
You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball.
Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ....

Contribute now! Only 35 EUR

 

Heavy Table Soccer Fan (only 300 customers)

Choose ANY player you and we will have a professional caricature of him done especially for you! Can be Kaka, Tevez, Hart or any player you really, really like! You will get a 3425x2569 pixels wallpaper (A2 for printing) and also a facebook cover photo.
You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball.
Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ... We help you take the fun to the next level, and give you another 20 G-Codes to invite your friends to play Sector Ball with you in tournaments.

Contribute now with 100 EUR

 

Table Soccer Community Member (only 100 customers)

Choose ANY player you and we will have a professional caricature of him done especially for you! Now the fun bit! Send a photo of yourself and you'll be right next to your favorite player in the caricature! It's going to be you and Persie, Hagi, Balotelli or any other player you'd like to have as a friend! The wallpaper with the caricature will come in a 3425x2569 pixels (A2 for printing) size and you'll also get a facebook cover photo.
You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball.
Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ... We help you take the fun to the next level, and give you another 20 G-Codes to invite your friends to play Sector Ball with you in tournaments.

Contribute now with 300 EUR

  • The pre-made drawings (Messi, Ronaldo, Ibrahimovc, El Saarwy or Rooney) will be sent only after the payment is processed and after the person confirms the chosen player.
  • Customers who chose 100 Euro or 300 Euro contributions, will need to email their favorite player and a personal photo (applicable for the 300 Euro contribution) and we will send the caricature back, by email, within 2-7 days from confirmation. The number of participants is limited so avail of this offer while it is still available.

Would you like to have your very own dream team? FC Barcelona, AC Milan, Manchester United can now be your teams with the help of our football game, Sectorball. Apply the stickers on your players and voila! Your team is ready!

A little taste of history

Some of our most cherished stories start with the phrase “Once upon a time “ and come to a more or less abrupt conclusion. This is not the case with our story. It refuses to end because it is a story about football, passion, tradition and human nature in general. It connects continents and is a tale more than a 100 years in the making…

Somewhere in a far off land, our ancestors invented a way to reduce the craving for playing football during the cold winter months. It was the year 1900. The game was coined “Gombfoci”, a rather self-explanatory term, which describes a game played with buttons from coats upon a kitchen table. It spread like wildfire and soon came to be well known in such far off lands as Spain, USA or Brazil. These people changed the rules and by this created a new game called “12 Touches”, which later became an even greater success than its predecessor. (Geraldo Cardoso Décourt’s, in 1928).

Detailed history on wiki page: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Button_football

The path from amateur to professional game playing and sportsmanship took some time, until the early championships were established in the Americas (in 1950’s Brazil), as well as in Europe, where the first European championship took place in 1958, in Hungary. The Brazilian Football Table Game laid the foundation, and was on a collision course with its sibling, Sector Ball, the original Hungarian version. Both of them had Federations, shared almost identical game pieces, but were strikingly different when it came to their rules.

Have you ever met someone who has been playing this game for more than 50 years? We did! Don’t be mistaken! We aren’t talking here about a game which is purely for the older generation. It is a game cherished by a universal age category, starting from the young to the old. There are thousands and thousands of registered players and the numbers are going to go through the roof after we will succeed in making this project happen. This is a project that will be remembered for quite some time to come, by players who will have been charmed by it… And the best thing is that you can play an active part in writing this game's history.

The project

Our mission and vision is to unify the two games in one box. Same board game, two approaches. East meets West on the same "soccer pitch": Sector Ball Table Soccer game vs. 12 Touches Brazilian Game. Pretty awesome, if you ask us!

Why? After talking to some of our members from our local board game club, where table soccer competitions are held regularly, we discovered that people like both games but expressed a desire to experience a board game which combines both of them. Playing at professional level is very difficult and involves a lot of training and is sadly not possible in the majority of cases to train at home. The main reason for not being able to practice at home is the size of the table, which is 180 cm long by 120 cm wide. Our idea is to give them the means to practice wherever they choose to, given the smaller size of the board, and when the moment comes; they will effortlessly conquer their completion in tournaments.

This project is designed for home users. Many of us remember playing an older version back in the day. The quality of its components was quite bad but nevertheless, we played a lot, and occasionally it even happened that our parents joined in. We organized championships in the neighborhood and we had a lot of fun. Days upon days of endless joy!

We want to revive these times and build a community. People who want to play this game at home are the people who want to have fun by competing with their friends face-to-face, share real emotions! It is destined for those who choose to do this instead of playing in front of the computer.

PLEASE don't forget to tell your friends about this so we can keep the momentum going and make these as awesome as they can be!

The project is set up to offer the “offline” players diversity by giving them an alternative to computer games. We also aim to provide clubs with another reason to organize good championships with skilled players. We strive to bring different generations together by engaging parents and children in sharing the passion of playing this game, thus creating excitement and joy around the table and giving them the opportunity of playing soccer even in winter time. This will give supporters the chance of playing the role of their favourite players on the pitch.

The G-CODE or the online system ...

H3N6-MJKL-5645-KPGT - decoding ... decoding ... please go to the F.A.Q. section, point 5 ...

STRETCH GOALS!

The current pricing is for 2000 boardgame with a complete tournament manager website.
We would like to reach our goal, but wait and see what we'll do with every 5000 EUR!
We will still release the game even if we have to do it from our own budget we will keep up the fight until we succeed!

So here we go!

5,000 EUR: We will randomly select 10 Romanian orphanages and give away one SectorBall game to each one of them.

The goals ...

Our primary goals are to produce the first board games and to build the online community for social reasons. We set the goal of producing 2.000, corroborated with ample actions in at least 5 countries. In this way we can get the ball rolling and initiate the movement.

The online system provides an environment where people can register, create tournaments, upload results, make comparisons, interact with other communities, exchange collectibles, and inform themselves about the official competitions - advanced or professional tournaments, organized by the International Sectorball Federation (ISBF).

"SECTORBALL is a football game that you can play from dawn til dusk."

Our expectations are high for the future, that’s why we need 30.000 euro to fund the design, online software, concept, prototypes, marketing, commercial, production of initial games and the creation of the online community. We are totally dedicated towards this project, because it is real and it is happening as you are reading these lines. We need to raise funds to create and accelerate the making of this new community. A brief summary business plan can be available upon request.

Commercial and marketing strategy ...

At first glance, you might ask yourself “How can you be sure that you can really make this happen?”. We will give our best to succeed or die in the attempt (metaphorically speaking of course)! We possess the needed know how because we are in a constant dialog with gamers, because we track the gaming habits and trends through countries, because we work with very talented designers, programmers, copywriters and creative people. It is also important to note, and should not be overlooked that most of us are confident businessmen with over 15 years of experience. In the worst case scenario, the game will be made and will follow a steady development. Not depending upon primary marketing fail or success, the Game will exist and we need you beside us! You will be proud to say that you gave a chance to a unifying concept that is quickly spreading around the world.

The idea is pretty simple – if people play, the game is required. And people play! 

How the money will be spent.

No doubt you've noticed the surprisingly large sum we're requesting to finish SectorBall. Believe it or not, this is actually cheap for a boardgame, and the only reason it's even this cheap is because we will also cover some costs.

Here's the breakdown of how the money will be spent:

3000 EUR: Staff Salaries - 3 people for 2 months
1500 EUR: Desiger team for all the design elements
12000 EUR: Printing 2000 boardgame, paper part
10000 EUR: Website with complex database system behind for tournaments organizing, etc.
10000 EUR: Plastic parts of the game, players, ball, etc for 2000 games
1500 EUR: QA Testing
500 EUR: Bar codes and CE code
2700 EUR: IndieGoGo and Payment Processing Fees for 30000 EUR
1000 EUR: Shipping the games
3000 EUR: Advertising online
1000 EUR: Other unknown expenses

The game ...

Inside the box, there will be two games containing:

• 2 teams for a total of 10 players
• 4 goalkeepers, 2 for Sector Ball and 2 for 12 Touches
• 2 type of soccer ball, one for Sector Ball and one for 12 touches
• The board, 60 x 90 cm (we still dream about 100 x 70 cm)
• The score board
• 4 mm margin for the board, plastic, to keep the players and the ball on the field
• Hour glass for measuring 10 minute
• 10 unique codes for registering on our website, for you and your friends
• Rulebooks for Sector Ball and for 12 Touches
• Stickers for each player

The board is the same, only the rules are different. The rulebook will be translated into 6 languages at the beginning (English, Spanish, German, French, Hungarian, Romanian), with the help of the community, the soccer fans.

Aren't you curious about a few rules? There are 2 x 10 minute game periods, no offside, players can mark valid goals only from opponent side, and the rest is like in real soccer.

Sector Ball: Each player has one turn. If he can pass the ball from the button to a valid "sector", 4.5 cm, not touching other button, there is an extra move. If he can again pass to the next button in the same way, again he has an extra move. This can continue until he fails to pass or have a valid sector and the ball is on the opponent side, where he can shoot. The player asks the opponent to place the goalkeeper and then he shoots to score.

12 Touches: Here we talk about maximum 12 touches per player. This means if a button touches the ball and the ball does not touch the opponent button, then he can continue again with the same button or with another button. One button can pass maximum 3 times, then you must play with another button. Once the foe fails, by the ball touching the opponent button, he loses the next move. But if the ball is on the adversary’s side, he can ask to shoot a goal! Opponent can place the goalkeeper!

F.A.Q.

1) I just made my contribution on a perk with more than one options. How will I know when the box will arrive?

Once our funding goal is met, we will contact you via email to verify your postal address and to let you know when we will ship.

2) When will you release the game?

We scheduled to have the game ready to be released at Spiel 2013 in Essen-Germany in October 2013.
The production of the game will be done by Germany's largest manufacturer ensuring the highest quality of the components.

3) Shipping Cost for perks or for pre-order?

The game will be dispatched to EU delivery and very soon will be available in stores in EU. For USA and Canada the game will be delivered via postal services. We have a flat shipping cost for EU, USA and Canada which is included in the Perk levels.

4) How can I pay?

Payments are processed through Paypal which ensures the security of your transaction. That does not mean that you need to have a Paypal account or that you have to create one. You can use any Credit Card. All of the payment will go through this website.

5) How will the online registration work?

Yes, that is a good question. We will try to give you an answer as short as possible, but that may take some time. There will be G-Codes (unique codes) in the game. There will be 10 codes, 1 Master Code and 9 Friend Codes. The person, who will buy the game and will handle the championships with his friends, will register with the Master Code, and this is the moment when he becomes a "tournament organizer". He is the one who will register his own friends, who will become his own players. 

The tournament organizer will be able to create championships (group based, rounds based, swiss) and to add the scores, the markers (optional), the minute of the goal (optional) and other details that will be important in a game. At the end of the championships he will have the possibility to print out a diploma for the 1st-6th place. 

The system will award experience points (XP) for each tournament in which a player can participate. For ex.: If you play a tournament with your friends, you receive 1XP for the game and 1XP for each point in the competition. If you have won 6 times and had 2 ties, you get 6x3 + 2x1 = 20XP, meaning a total of 21XP points. 

These points will accumulate in time and you may reach, let’s say, 250XP points. The system will monitor the points and we suggest groups from the same areas to meet and organize larger contests.
Each year a European championship will be held where the best players in Europe will be invited. This contest will be the basis for the invitation. In the same time the best players will be invited to learn the professional version of the game and to participate in professional championships.

6) This game is same as Subbuteo?

Subbuteo is an another style. We play with buttons (somewhere in 1900-1950 the game used to be played with coat buttons).
Initially it was in 1905 the game GOMBFOCI - a hungarian style, then in time it became widespread all over the world. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Button_football)
From this version people in Brazil made the 12 Touches (most popular), 3 Touches, 1 Touches Fotbal de Butao, which started somewhere in 1920 or around.
Also in time Subbuteo was made together with and other soccer game. Why? Because people like to play soccer and so do I :)
I have played SectorBall since I a was child, and since then 30 years have passed. Then it was a period when I did not play at all, but I started again in 2010.
I play it at a professional level. But as our main problem is that we do not have any new players, I thought it was time to get out a smaller version for home playes. The goal is to teach new people to play, to organize tournaments for them, to meet them online using a well structured website and then invite the best boardgame players to bigger tournaments to get professionals. This is behind this game and I hope we will succeed. Of course is a hard investment which I don't have (it is more then 30K) but I believe I will find people who will support this game.

COMMENT PLEASE!

I want to hear everything about what you want from this game!

Feel free to contact us at info@boardgamesoccer.com or visit our website at www.boardgamesoccer.com
story_txt:
Exclusive wallpapers for PERKS/DONATONS






Table Soccer Fan
Get Messi or Ronaldo caricature wallpaper. Decorate your computer screen with an 1024x768 pixels wallpaper, plus, get a facebook cover photo.   Also, you will get a 10 EUR G-Coupon towards purchasing a copy of the game, after the pre-order period on our website ends.
 Contribute now! Only 3 EUR 
 





Big Table Soccer Fan
Get Messi, Ronaldo, Ibrahimović, El Shaarawy or Rooney caricature wallpaper. Decorate your computer screen with an 3425x2569 pixels wallpaper (A2 for printing), plus, get a facebook cover photo.   You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball.  Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ....
 Contribute now! Only 35 EUR
 






Heavy Table Soccer Fan (only 300 customers)
Choose ANY player you and we will have a professional caricature of him done especially for you! Can be Kaka, Tevez, Hart or any player you really, really like! You will get a 3425x2569 pixels wallpaper (A2 for printing) and also a facebook cover photo. You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball. Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ... We help you take the fun to the next level, and give you another 20 G-Codes to invite your friends to play Sector Ball with you in tournaments. 
 Contribute now with 100 EUR
 






Table Soccer Community Member (only 100 customers)
Choose ANY player you and we will have a professional caricature of him done especially for you! Now the fun bit! Send a photo of yourself and you'll be right next to your favorite player in the caricature! It's going to be you and Persie, Hagi, Balotelli or any other player you'd like to have as a friend! The wallpaper with the caricature will come in a 3425x2569 pixels (A2 for printing) size and you'll also get a facebook cover photo.  You will still get, of course, your Sector Ball/12 Touches Table Soccer Game, with a set of **EXCLUSIVE** stickers for the players! These stickers will not be included in the initial package, you can only get them now, while our fund raise period is still on. So contribute now and we will include these personalised stickers along with your copy of Sector Ball. Oh, and not to forget, here is a G-Coupon code for your friend ... We help you take the fun to the next level, and give you another 20 G-Codes to invite your friends to play Sector Ball with you in tournaments.
 Contribute now with 300 EUR



The pre-made drawings (Messi, Ronaldo, Ibrahimovc, El Saarwy or Rooney) will be sent only after the payment is processed and after the person confirms the chosen player.
Customers who chose 100 Euro or 300 Euro contributions, will need to email their favorite player and a personal photo (applicable for the 300 Euro contribution) and we will send the caricature back, by email, within 2-7 days from confirmation. The number of participants is limited so avail of this offer while it is still available.

Would you like to have your very own dream team? FC Barcelona, AC Milan, Manchester United can now be your teams with the help of our football game, Sectorball. Apply the stickers on your players and voila! Your team is ready!
A little taste of history
Some of our most cherished stories start with the phrase “Once upon a time “ and come to a more or less abrupt conclusion. This is not the case with our story. It refuses to end because it is a story about football, passion, tradition and human nature in general. It connects continents and is a tale more than a 100 years in the making…
Somewhere in a far off land, our ancestors invented a way to reduce the craving for playing football during the cold winter months. It was the year 1900. The game was coined “Gombfoci”, a rather self-explanatory term, which describes a game played with buttons from coats upon a kitchen table. It spread like wildfire and soon came to be well known in such far off lands as Spain, USA or Brazil. These people changed the rules and by this created a new game called “12 Touches”, which later became an even greater success than its predecessor. (Geraldo Cardoso Décourt’s, in 1928).




Detailed history on wiki page: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Button_football
The path from amateur to professional game playing and sportsmanship took some time, until the early championships were established in the Americas (in 1950’s Brazil), as well as in Europe, where the first European championship took place in 1958, in Hungary. The Brazilian Football Table Game laid the foundation, and was on a collision course with its sibling, Sector Ball, the original Hungarian version. Both of them had Federations, shared almost identical game pieces, but were strikingly different when it came to their rules.
Have you ever met someone who has been playing this game for more than 50 years? We did! Don’t be mistaken! We aren’t talking here about a game which is purely for the older generation. It is a game cherished by a universal age category, starting from the young to the old. There are thousands and thousands of registered players and the numbers are going to go through the roof after we will succeed in making this project happen. This is a project that will be remembered for quite some time to come, by players who will have been charmed by it… And the best thing is that you can play an active part in writing this game's history.
The project
Our mission and vision is to unify the two games in one box. Same board game, two approaches. East meets West on the same "soccer pitch": Sector Ball Table Soccer game vs. 12 Touches Brazilian Game. Pretty awesome, if you ask us!
Why? After talking to some of our members from our local board game club, where table soccer competitions are held regularly, we discovered that people like both games but expressed a desire to experience a board game which combines both of them. Playing at professional level is very difficult and involves a lot of training and is sadly not possible in the majority of cases to train at home. The main reason for not being able to practice at home is the size of the table, which is 180 cm long by 120 cm wide. Our idea is to give them the means to practice wherever they choose to, given the smaller size of the board, and when the moment comes; they will effortlessly conquer their completion in tournaments.
This project is designed for home users. Many of us remember playing an older version back in the day. The quality of its components was quite bad but nevertheless, we played a lot, and occasionally it even happened that our parents joined in. We organized championships in the neighborhood and we had a lot of fun. Days upon days of endless joy!

We want to revive these times and build a community. People who want to play this game at home are the people who want to have fun by competing with their friends face-to-face, share real emotions! It is destined for those who choose to do this instead of playing in front of the computer.
PLEASE don't forget to tell your friends about this so we can keep the momentum going and make these as awesome as they can be!
The project is set up to offer the “offline” players diversity by giving them an alternative to computer games. We also aim to provide clubs with another reason to organize good championships with skilled players. We strive to bring different generations together by engaging parents and children in sharing the passion of playing this game, thus creating excitement and joy around the table and giving them the opportunity of playing soccer even in winter time. This will give supporters the chance of playing the role of their favourite players on the pitch.
The G-CODE or the online system ...
H3N6-MJKL-5645-KPGT - decoding ... decoding ... please go to the F.A.Q. section, point 5 ...
STRETCH GOALS!
The current pricing is for 2000 boardgame with a complete tournament manager website. We would like to reach our goal, but wait and see what we'll do with every 5000 EUR! We will still release the game even if we have to do it from our own budget we will keep up the fight until we succeed!
So here we go!
5,000 EUR: We will randomly select 10 Romanian orphanages and give away one SectorBall game to each one of them.
The goals ...

story:
First Look Access: Contributors at all pledge levels will now receive first-look access to the new version of the site, before it goes live. You’ll be able to preview, navigate, and even leave comments and feedback directly on the preview version.

Unlocked at $4,000: A 6th surprise token by Inkwell Looter will be included in the Populate, Entwine, and Soulbond Packages.

Drive a Tranquil Bargain 

Over the years, I've met some people who have quit playing Magic because they couldn't afford it.  We all know it: these cards can be pretty expensive.  Crazy expensive, even. 

As the game grows in popularity and price, for many people it becomes increasingly difficult to continue playing, and if you're on a budget it's not fun to feel like you lost to the deck that's just packed full of all the expensive stuff.

PucaTrade has already saved its members over $80,000 by completing more than 15,000 trades.

Our Innovative MtG Trading Solutions

  • Do you have a hard time finding people to trade with?   PucaTrade offers an Intelligent Trade-Matching system that automatically connects you with people who want the cards you're offering.  
  • Are you tired of arguing over card prices?  We were too.  Our Card Value Index has the prices of cards pre-loaded, so you'll enjoy a haggle-free trading experience, along with full-value for your cards.
  • Are you hesitant to trade by mail?  Our Trade Guarantee assures the success of every trade or you’ll be reimbursed in full for the value of your cards, so you can trade with confidence.

 

Beyond Beta: Our Goals for this Project

Our overarching goal for this project is to make this free-trading service self-sustainable by developing crucial features and tools that will help make the site instantly understandable and accessible; especially to people who are visiting for the first time.  We also hope to create branded PucaTrade merchandise that will help to increase the site's membership and thus help to cover the costs of operations.

  • GOAL #1: PucaTrade Swag — We've designed great stuff with our logo on it, but we need help covering the cost of production.  Help spread the word with PucaTrade Card Sleeves, Playmats, T-shirts, Hoodies, and much more below!  If we achieve this goal, Team PucaTrade will also drive to major MtG events and conventions on the West Coast to get the word out.
  • GOAL #2: A Delightful User Experience — We will make PucaTrade instantly understandable to people that visit for the first time, and you’ll be able to start trading immediately upon signing up. 
  • GOAL #3: A Social Community — We’ll build ways to communicate with one another on the site, so that you can leave feedback and rate your experiences with other traders. This will also provide you with more control over who sends you cards.

 

Visual Elegance for an Intuitive Trading Experience

What happens if we exceed our goal?

Producing branded merchandise to help get the word out is just the beginning.  If we exceed our $8,000 goal, all additional funds will be used to continue to build the following features for PucaTrade:

 

What do I get for donating?

$12, SHROUD:  A 100ct pack of our custom card-sleeves emblazoned with the radiant PucaTrade logo. Printed on Legion brand high-quality sleeves. 

 

$15, POPULATE:  A set of 5 original tokens by Inkwell Looter.  Snake, Wolf, Plant, Beast (within), and Frog-Lizard. Printed on 16pt recycled cardstock.

 

$20, TRANSFORM:  Format buttons by Inkwell Looter.  Let everyone know what MtG you're into with 6 of these Legacy, Modern, Standard, Cube, Commander, and Trade buttons. 

 

$25, ENTWINE:  Why choose just 1 mode? Gimme the Sleeves, Buttons, and Tokens! 

$25, BUYBACK:  2,500 Trade Credits on PucaTrade.  Thinking about buying $25 of cards any time soon?  Why not get them on PucaTrade and support this project at the same time?

 

$30, FORTIFY:  Roll out to your FNM in style, and represent this new way to trade.  Designed by the delightful gent BeardyPlays.

$35, EQUIP:  Your choice of our Team PucaTrade T-shirt or the "Circle of Stuff: Green" T by Inkwell Looter.  Silkscreened by hand on American Apparel Ultra soft 50/50 poly-cotton T's in Men or Women's XS, S, M, L, and XL. 

 

$55, TOTEM ARMOR:  Your choice of our Team PucaTrade Hoody or the "Circle of Stuff: Black" Hoody by Inkwell Looter.  Silkscreened by hand on American Apparel Ultra soft Unisex California Fleece Pullover Hoody in XS, S, M, L, and XL.

 

$75, KICKER:  This package includes 2,500 Trade-Credits, our playmat, and your choice of either T.   

 

$90, MULTI-KICKER:  This package includes 2,500 Trade-Credits, our playmat, and your choice of either Hoody.  

 

$150, SOULBOND:  A cascade of Puca-Merch, along with a Lifetime Membership to the PucaPro Premium Membership Program. You and I are officially homies.

 

 $1,000, MIRACLE:  YOU are the real Miracle, and I'm yours for a day.  I fly to you anywhere in the US and hand-deliver everything from the SOULBOND package.  While I'm in town, we'll celebrate your major contribution to this project by playing some MtG with you and your friends, help play test the new competitive build you're working on, deck-tech all your decks, or whatever you want! (within reason).  OR you could come to the San Francisco Bay Area and I'll set up a day of MtG here. Thanks for helping keep the dream of PucaTrade alive!

 

FAQ

  • What is PucaPro? Our Premium Membership program is a subscription service that unlocks exclusive content and site-features.  PucaPro members help keep the site free-to-use and free of ads.
  • What will the new version of the site look like? Awesome.  Think "Web 2.0."  It will be incredibly visual, and our designer has some fantastic ideas about how to improve the PucaTrade experience.  Here's a sneak peak of the Send Confirmation screen:

  • Can I increase my pledge once it’s been made?  YES! Once you donate to our campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount. To do so, go to Indiegogo and sign in. Go to our campaign page and there, you can manage your donation. If you have any questions, email us.

 

Risks and Challenges

From a logistical perspective, we have everything we need, except capital.  We’ve created the designs, we have developers who are ready to implement them (and turn them into code), and our merchandise makers have all approved our designs.  

We feel really fortunate to be collaborating with extremely talented developers, like Topher White and Oscar Carballal (experienced veterans of front and back-end development), and Chris Chambers (a naturally gifted designer who, like me, has been playing MtG since around 1994).  

Our love for Magic the Gathering is much of what makes us the perfect candidates to accomplish this goal.  We all know what players want—because we’re all players. 

With your support, we'll achieve this goal and complete the best trading site the world could ever imagine.
story_txt:
First Look Access: Contributors at all pledge levels will now receive first-look access to the new version of the site, before it goes live. You’ll be able to preview, navigate, and even leave comments and feedback directly on the preview version.
Unlocked at $4,000: A 6th surprise token by Inkwell Looter will be included in the Populate, Entwine, and Soulbond Packages.
Drive a Tranquil Bargain 
Over the years, I've met some people who have quit playing Magic because they couldn't afford it.  We all know it: these cards can be pretty expensive.  Crazy expensive, even. 
As the game grows in popularity and price, for many people it becomes increasingly difficult to continue playing, and if you're on a budget it's not fun to feel like you lost to the deck that's just packed full of all the expensive stuff.
PucaTrade has already saved its members over $80,000 by completing more than 15,000 trades.

Our Innovative MtG Trading Solutions


Do you have a hard time finding people to trade with?   PucaTrade offers an Intelligent Trade-Matching system that automatically connects you with people who want the cards you're offering.  

Are you tired of arguing over card prices?  We were too.  Our Card Value Index has the prices of cards pre-loaded, so you'll enjoy a haggle-free trading experience, along with full-value for your cards.

Are you hesitant to trade by mail?  Our Trade Guarantee assures the success of every trade or you’ll be reimbursed in full for the value of your cards, so you can trade with confidence.
 
Beyond Beta: Our Goals for this Project
Our overarching goal for this project is to make this free-trading service self-sustainable by developing crucial features and tools that will help make the site instantly understandable and accessible; especially to people who are visiting for the first time.  We also hope to create branded PucaTrade merchandise that will help to increase the site's membership and thus help to cover the costs of operations.


GOAL #1: PucaTrade Swag — We've designed great stuff with our logo on it, but we need help covering the cost of production.  Help spread the word with PucaTrade Card Sleeves, Playmats, T-shirts, Hoodies, and much more below!  If we achieve this goal, Team PucaTrade will also drive to major MtG events and conventions on the West Coast to get the word out.

GOAL #2: A Delightful User Experience — We will make PucaTrade instantly understandable to people that visit for the first time, and you’ll be able to start trading immediately upon signing up. 

GOAL #3: A Social Community — We’ll build ways to communicate with one another on the site, so that you can leave feedback and rate your experiences with other traders. This will also provide you with more control over who sends you cards.
 
Visual Elegance for an Intuitive Trading Experience
What happens if we exceed our goal?
Producing branded merchandise to help get the word out is just the beginning.  If we exceed our $8,000 goal, all additional funds will be used to continue to build the following features for PucaTrade:
 
What do I get for donating?
$12, SHROUD:  A 100ct pack of our custom card-sleeves emblazoned with the radiant PucaTrade logo. Printed on Legion brand high-quality sleeves. 
 
$15, POPULATE:  A set of 5 original tokens by Inkwell Looter.  Snake, Wolf, Plant, Beast (within), and Frog-Lizard. Printed on 16pt recycled cardstock.
 
$20, TRANSFORM:  Format buttons by Inkwell Looter.  Let everyone know what MtG you're into with 6 of these Legacy, Modern, Standard, Cube, Commander, and Trade buttons. 
 
$25, ENTWINE:  Why choose just 1 mode? Gimme the Sleeves, Buttons, and Tokens! 
$25, BUYBACK:  2,500 Trade Credits on PucaTrade.  Thinking about buying $25 of cards any time soon?  Why not get them on PucaTrade and support this project at the same time?
 
$30, FORTIFY:  Roll out to your FNM in style, and represent this new way to trade.  Designed by the delightful gent BeardyPlays.

$35, EQUIP:  Your choice of our Team PucaTrade T-shirt or the "Circle of Stuff: Green" T by Inkwell Looter.  Silkscreened by hand on American Apparel Ultra soft 50/50 poly-cotton T's in Men or Women's XS, S, M, L, and XL. 
 
$55, TOTEM ARMOR:  Your choice of our Team PucaTrade Hoody or the "Circle of Stuff: Black" Hoody by Inkwell Looter.  Silkscreened by hand on American Apparel Ultra soft Unisex California Fleece Pullover Hoody in XS, S, M, L, and XL.
 
$75, KICKER:  This package includes 2,500 Trade-Credits, our playmat, and your choice of either T.   
 
$90, MULTI-KICKER:  This package includes 2,500 Trade-Credits, our playmat, and your choice of either Hoody.  
 
$150, SOULBOND:  A cascade of Puca-Merch, along with a Lifetime Membership to the PucaPro Premium Membership Program. You and I are officially homies.
 
 $1,000, MIRACLE:  YOU are the real Miracle, and I'm yours for a day.  I fly to you anywhere in the US and hand-deliver everything from the SOULBOND package.  While I'm in town, we'll celebrate your major contribution to this project by playing some MtG with you and your friends, help play test the new competitive build you're working on, deck-tech all your decks, or whatever you want! (within reason).  OR you could come to the San Francisco Bay Area and I'll set up a day of MtG here. Thanks for helping keep the dream of PucaTrade alive!
 
FAQ


What is PucaPro? Our Premium Membership program is a subscription service that unlocks exclusive content and site-features.  PucaPro members help keep the site free-to-use and free of ads.

What will the new version of the site look like? Awesome.  Think "Web 2.0."  It will be incredibly visual, and our designer has some fantastic ideas about how to improve the PucaTrade experience.  Here's a sneak peak of the Send Confirmation screen:

Can I increase my pledge once it’s been made?  YES! Once you donate to our campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount. To do so, go to Indiegogo and sign in. Go to our campaign page and there, you can manage your donation. If you have any questions, email us.

 
Risks and Challenges
From a logistical perspective, we have everything we need, except capital.  We’ve created the designs, we have developers who are ready to implement them (and turn them into code), and our merchandise makers have all approved our designs.  
We feel really fortunate to be collaborating with extremely talented developers, like Topher White and Oscar Carballal (experienced veterans of front and back-end development), and Chris Chambers (a naturally gifted designer who, like me, has been playing MtG since around 1994).  
Our love for Magic the Gathering is much of what makes us the perfect candidates to accomplish this goal.  We all know what players want—because we’re all players. 
With your support, we'll achieve this goal and complete the best trading site the world could ever imagine.

story:
Critical!: Go Westerly is an easy to run, lighthearted, funny fantasy game.

There is no dreary overhead here.  No charts with pithy skills.  No over-wrought spell lists with over-lavoured writing. This game is about you and yours bringing the funny to the table.  Be the swamp farmer who is a Master Scumm Sucker!  Be the Pointy Phallic Object Champion!  Be the Beautiful Bard who can do some Improvised Percussion!  In Critical!: Go Westerly you tell the Bartender your tale of glory and adventure!  A good tale will make him snicker, but a great tale will make her guffaw with glee.

If any beverage gets expunged through various orifices, it's all on you.  Wear it as the mark of honour that it is.

Critical!: Go Westerly is going to be launched under a creative commons license, that means that we're really giving the game to you.  You can take the rules and make your own game, or even write your own stories using the world of Westerly.  We want to hear everything you do because we think that's just plain awesome.

We've also got a bunch of other reasons why you should buy this game over Jonathan's blog.
[Why you should want this part 1]
[Why you should want this part 2]
[Why you should want this part 3]
[Why you should want this part 4]
[Why you should want this part 5]
[Kobold Moments 1]
[Kobold Moments 2]
[Kobold Moments 3]

Why are we doing this?

Well, making games costs money.  Money that you have.  We would like some of that money in order to help pay our amazing artist, Avery Liell-Kok, for her hard work and dedication, as well as the print run of the book.


What do you get out of this?

Well, first and foremost copies of the books and early access to the PDF.  The PDF will be ready for you on New Years Day, which means you have a great file of awesomeness to look forward to as you recover from the party the night before.  You'll also get signed copies of the books.  Some cool gear out of Hoggart's Castle's gift shop, some T-shirts, that are available in women's cut as well, and even some adventures and other written material you'll only find if you sign up.  You can also learn why you should leave Kobolds alone.

There may even be a ring involved, direct from the Queen Samantha's Collection.

UPDATE: We're adding 150 words in the book with The Adventurer level. So it's not just a case of getting listed as an adventurer, but you'll get a character and a description too!

UPDATE: You can download the sample here!

UPDATE: Here's the crest for the GSSC Alumni Shirts.  Only people who get in on this Campaign will get Alumni Shirts.

story:
Please click the Share Links Above:

Live Stream

We are going to be starting to do a Weekly Twitch.tv live stream every sunday at 6 PM -7 GMT. POur Twitch.tv Pbroadcast link is: http://www.twitch.tv/worldofeden

 

Free to Play & Free to Download

World of Eden Online will be Completely Free to Download and free to Play with VIP Mode Option

VIP Mode will provide:

  • 2 x Experience Point Gain
  • 2 x Drop Rate
  • VIP will only be $5.00 per month

What is World of Eden Online

World of Eden Online is a Strategical Conquest Action MMORPG that is set in a Futuristic Feudal Horror/Thriller setting on a distant alien planet in another galaxy.

  • Form Guilds
  • Research Technologies
  • Control Territory
  • Build Powerful Towns & Fortresses
  • Form Alliances
  • Develop Enemies
  • Hire Mercenaries
  • Sell Virtual Items & Characters via Integrated PayPal Marketplace to other players in the community.

Remember that World of Eden Online is an Evolving game that is completely based around guilds, crafting and technology trees.

How is World of Eden Online different from all other games on the market?

Almost every MMORPG on the market builds the game and then wraps a guild system around the game where world of eden is basing the entire game around the guild system. World of Eden Online allows you to make real money via the virtual economy.

If the game is Guild Centric, does this not take away from Solo Game Mechanics?

We have developed a system that allows people to support the guild mechanics via solo game play. This is done using the following:
  • Guild Controlled Job System
  • Mercenary Mechanics
  • Espionage & Stealth
  • Group Buffs & Benefits
  • Solo Buffs & Benefits

What is a Unique Item Token

Unique Item Token allows you to Convert a Crafted Item into a Unique Magic Item.

  • Unique Item Tokens will be Extremely Rare in the actual game.
  • Unique Items are Tradable

What is Early Access

  • Early access gives you access to the Test Server on World of Eden Online.
  • Early Access gives you Closed Beta Access

 

PHASE 1

 

What are the different packages & perks?

The different packages are as Follows:
 
  1. Early Access
    • Provides early access to all content before it becomes available to the rest of the community.
    • Provides access to the closed beta of the game
  2. Early Access + Token 5
    • Provides all Early Access Features & Perks
    • Provides 5 Unique Item Creation Tokens
  3. Early Access + Token 10
    • Provides all Early Access Features & Perks
    • Provides 10 Unique Item Creation Tokens
  4. Early Access + Early Land Grab + Token 5
    • Provides all Early Access + Token 5 Features & Perks
    • Allows 48 hours early access to the game world for early land grab compared to all other early access members.
  5. Early Access + Early Land Grab + Token 10
    • Provides all Early Access + Toekn 10 Features & Perks
    • Allows for 48 hours early access to the game world for early land grab compared to all other early access members.

 We are the top viewed project at https://community.heroengine.com/forums/index.php/board,10.0/sort,views/desc.html

POWERED BY WWW.HEROENGINE.COM

Crowdfund Milestones

Achieved:

 

Goals:

20'000 - Initial Goal

40'000 - Guild Politics

60'000 - Guild Emblem War Flags

100'000 - Orbital Space Defense

150'000 - Asteroid Belt Mining

250'000 - Persistant Vehicle System

350'000 - Space Fighter Research Tree & Crafting

500'000 - Offworld PvE Missions

750'000 - Additional Playable Race - Aileron (Feline Race)

1'000'000 - Offworld Colonizable Ocean Planet

1'250'000 - Additional Playable Race - Durei (Reptillian Race)

story:
Arrapha and the dark side of weird.

  My name is Amon 26, I've been developing games independently since 2008 and I'm responsible for the titles  All Of Our Friends Are Dead, Au Sable, Gyossait, MooD: Waist High In Hell, and Senora.  

 I'm currentley in the middle of developing my new title Arrapha.  A tale of high adventure in a dark weird world filled with terrible creatures.  It's been heavily inspired by both film and game classics like Castlevania, Army of Darkness, Ninja Gaiden, and The Addams Family.  It's meant to be both a comedic yet horrific romp through the surreal and hilarious.

 As this is my dayjob, and paychecks don't show up until after a publisher makes a bite, my money is running low.  I need help to make ends meet as I draw closer to the projected deadline.  After some number crunching I decided 3,500 will keep me solvent long enough to see Arrapha to completion.

That's right I need money!

  $3,500 is a magic bullet, it will cover me for about 3 months worth of rent and provide me with 2,000 left over for utilities, food and internet.  

In the event that I don't make the projected goal I'll still be able to use any and every penny I get to keep myself solvent and just go as long as possible.  Unfortunatley, that will mean I'll need to split my time between Arrapha and a day-job which will drastically hamper progress.

Each and every person who donates will be included in the credits of the game as financial supporters, even a dollar's worth.

$10+ gets you a demo of Arrapha featuring all of act 1 which won't be officially distributed online

$100+ gets you a package of wallpapers featuring characters, settings, and scenes from Arrapha scaled to fit desktop and phone/handsets.

$500+ gets you a set of 4 large posters featuring Arrapha characters, A mailing address will be required for this

$1000+ Gets you a hand-made laptop bag themed after Arrapha, each one designed to look like something owned either by Keith or Runira.  Again this will require a mailing address.

Something old, Something new.

Games today are either so heavily formulaic you lose track of which one is which, or fixated on shifting paradigms to a fault. I was raised by a wild pack of Nintendos circa 1982 and while I'm from the old-skool I'm also a strong believer in adopting the best of what's happened since then and doing my best to marry the past with the present in a way that's exciting to me.

By donating to the Arrapha project, you're standing up and saying "I want to have my cake and eat it too!"  You're helping to draw a line in the sand and putting on the grizzliest most depraved devil-rock leather-clad beast-slashing madness this side of a sprite-sheet.

Get Dirty!

Obviously I know money doesn't grow on trees, and sometimes no matter how much you want to donate, you need to eat and you're in desperate need for a new pair of underwear.  And that's cool!  (get the silk ones btw)

You have so much more power at your fingertips then you might know,  you can simply pass this along to other friends who might be interested, OR you could do something totally freakin' gonzo with the idea and help me publicize my project by means of your own personal tallents.

Do you draw?  Draw an Arrapha picture and put it on your deviant art/facebook/Twitter!  Do you write or blog?  Interview me!  Films?  Clothing? Needlepoint? Fine cuisine?  You get the idea.

Get creative and spread the word of Arrapha with the fire that keeps you going!  Let them know Amon 26 sent you and he wants to rock their face off! Tell them the tale of this strange, strange man who is making Chainsaws Rideable!!

story:
What is KINGramid?

KINGramid is a board game for two players. The rules of this game are unique and have a world novelty.

The game rules are simple but interesting. Kids can learn rules of this game in 2 to 4 minutes. It takes 10 - 30 minutes to play one game round. The game is designed for adults and children over 6 years. 
KINGramid helps to develop logical thinking. Due to its world novelty, KINGramid doesn't have of its theory of playing.Therefore, each game round will be full of creative discoveries for you.
Welcome to the world of the living logic!

Why do I offer you my game here

Seeing how my idea with my games can solve specific problems in my family, I wanted to share my experience with others. Try it yourself.

Opportunities provided by Indiegogo, are amazing:

  • Here I can find those who are really interested in my ideas and whom I can help. This is a  community of like-minded people.
  • I can make as many of my games as how many people will want to have them at a reasonable price. We save global resources together.  ))
  • I can quickly create new games that my friends are waiting for.
  • I can receive good feedback and suggestions from my supporters.

What product options are offered

KINGramid is a game in three dimensions. The level at which the game pieces are located is important. It is understandable that production of plastic multilevel game board is more expensive than the same from cardboard. The same is true for shipping of the product to the buyer. We offer a variety of manufacturing and assembling.

  1. The easiest option. We will send you one digital layout, which you can print yourself (for example, using a home printer). After reading the rules, you will learn what you need to buy in addition for the game (in stores). And you can play! This option is the fastest and the cheapest.
     
  2. Playing field is printed on cardboard, has a colorful appearance, is coated with a wear protection plastic. Image tiered pyramid is printed with special 3D effects that create a sense of depth. This is an economical option.

  3. Volumetric playing field, we manufacture from plastic. Appearance is very pleasant and unusual. For easy storage and transport, you can easily make out the pyramid. You can easily assemble it for playing.

Each game unit is equipped with instruction how to play it.

Shipping

Delivery of game units is available to Canada and the U.S. (domestic) and other countries (international). This is noted in our perks options. Be careful when choosing your perks. We initially tried to include the shipping cost in the price. Changes are possible only in exceptional cases.
This does not apply to digital layout.

So how will this work?

When the deadline came (and funds are received):

  • We begin to send digital playing fields to our customers at once (2-3 working days).
    If you chose a personalized  game board version, we will add your photo* to "Your personal area" on the layout of your playing field and will send it to you (it will take 3-5 days longer).

  • We are preparing a printed playing field and send you. Promised by our partner, manufacturing period for printed versions of the game is about 15 - 18 working days. 

    If you chose a personalized option ** of playing field, we will add your photo* to "Your personal area" on the layout of your playing field and will send it to you (it will take 5-7 working days longer).

  • We order the manufacturing of all ordered plastic playing fields. We send you your game units after that.
    Promised by our partner manufacturing period for plastic versions of the game is about 18 - 21 working days.
    Our partners-manufacturers playing fields are located in Canada, U.S. and Europe.

* - Please, send your personal photos before the date of deadline;
** - It's a good option for a personal gift to somebody.

What am I getting out of this? 

I'm curious to see how my game ideas can help others.
If you are financing this my project will allow me to accelerate the development of new exciting games. Then I'll able to realize a fast refresh of line of my games for you. Our team is ready for it.
Welcome to the world of the living logic and fresh ideas!

If you have ANY questions, please let me know.

Ads location on the printed playing field
story_txt:
What is KINGramid?
KINGramid is a board game for two players. The rules of this game are unique and have a world novelty.
The game rules are simple but interesting. Kids can learn rules of this game in 2 to 4 minutes. It takes 10 - 30 minutes to play one game round. The game is designed for adults and children over 6 years. KINGramid helps to develop logical thinking. Due to its world novelty, KINGramid doesn't have of its theory of playing.Therefore, each game round will be full of creative discoveries for you.Welcome to the world of the living logic!
Why do I offer you my game here
Seeing how my idea with my games can solve specific problems in my family, I wanted to share my experience with others. Try it yourself.
Opportunities provided by Indiegogo, are amazing:

Here I can find those who are really interested in my ideas and whom I can help. This is a  community of like-minded people.
I can make as many of my games as how many people will want to have them at a reasonable price. We save global resources together.  ))
I can quickly create new games that my friends are waiting for.
I can receive good feedback and suggestions from my supporters.
What product options are offered
KINGramid is a game in three dimensions. The level at which the game pieces are located is important. It is understandable that production of plastic multilevel game board is more expensive than the same from cardboard. The same is true for shipping of the product to the buyer. We offer a variety of manufacturing and assembling.

The easiest option. We will send you one digital layout, which you can print yourself (for example, using a home printer). After reading the rules, you will learn what you need to buy in addition for the game (in stores). And you can play! This option is the fastest and the cheapest. 
Playing field is printed on cardboard, has a colorful appearance, is coated with a wear protection plastic. Image tiered pyramid is printed with special 3D effects that create a sense of depth. This is an economical option.

Volumetric playing field, we manufacture from plastic. Appearance is very pleasant and unusual. For easy storage and transport, you can easily make out the pyramid. You can easily assemble it for playing.
Each game unit is equipped with instruction how to play it.

Shipping
Delivery of game units is available to Canada and the U.S. (domestic) and other countries (international). This is noted in our perks options. Be careful when choosing your perks. We initially tried to include the shipping cost in the price. Changes are possible only in exceptional cases.This does not apply to digital layout.
So how will this work?
When the deadline came (and funds are received):

We begin to send digital playing fields to our customers at once (2-3 working days). If you chose a personalized  game board version, we will add your photo* to "Your personal area" on the layout of your playing field and will send it to you (it will take 3-5 days longer).

We are preparing a printed playing field and send you. Promised by our partner, manufacturing period for printed versions of the game is about 15 - 18 working days. 
If you chose a personalized option ** of playing field, we will add your photo* to "Your personal area" on the layout of your playing field and will send it to you (it will take 5-7 working days longer).


We order the manufacturing of all ordered plastic playing fields. We send you your game units after that.Promised by our partner manufacturing period for plastic versions of the game is about 18 - 21 working days.Our partners-manufacturers playing fields are located in Canada, U.S. and Europe.

* - Please, send your personal photos before the date of deadline;** - It's a good option for a personal gift to somebody.
What am I getting out of this? 

I'm curious to see how my game ideas can help others.If you are financing this my project will allow me to accelerate the development of new exciting games. Then I'll able to realize a fast refresh of line of my games for you. Our team is ready for it.Welcome to the world of the living logic and fresh ideas!
If you have ANY questions, please let me know.
Ads location on the printed playing field

story:
Hello there, i am the lead developer of Private Infiltrator, a stealth game currently being sold on Desura, and i require your assistance to not only be able to finalise its development by allowing us to afford certain neccessary art assets and advanced software, but also make the game available for more people, supporting multiplatform indie releases. (Game summary directly taken from its Steam Greenlight page) (Note that the video is somewhat old as it was taken in the 0.78a version. At the moment, the game is in version 0.9a and it is quite more polished and optimised.)

Private Infiltrator is an arcade-like Stealth game that bears the Noir art style.

 In 1867, ASB was founded by a mysterious criminal figure. It was a private corporation and its sole purpose was global domination. Its intentions were masked to the public by the legitimate packaging business it had as a front. Another mysterious figure, rich, powerful and clever enough to deduce that ASB was behind the recent crime wave founded WEC, a corporation whose sole task was to prevent the ASB from achieving their goal. Since then, an invisible war was fought between these two private corporations. Over the years, WEC had been slowly disrupting the ASB's operations and preventing their plans from being materialised. After destroying most of the ASB's assets, WEC sent their best Agent to the heavily guarded ASB Base in order to destroy both it and what was left of the ASB once and for all.  Private Infiltrator tells the story of what happened in that mission.

The game's core mechanics are fairly simple and easy to pick up, yet difficult to master while also retaining a satisfying amount of depth. They revolve around the double-sided nature of light in stealth games enriched by the Noir art style's principles, hacking and bypassing electronic devices, as well as elegant evasion of detection.

 At the player's disposal are numerous gadgets such as sound-emitting decoys and poisoned coffee, as well as special abilities such as Blinking and Invisibility. Building on the core gameplay are extra mechanics such as a point reward system accompanied an in-game black market with a dynamic economy system from where the player can either purchase useful equipment, or exploit the fluctuating prices in order to gain profit by selling loot they can steal from the base.

The game also features a wide variety of unlockables such as new characters with their own special abilities, entirely new pieces of soundtrack and bonus maps. The game's difficulty level could be described as both diverse and brutal, offering awareness and resource management challenges amongst the classic stealth gameplay. There is also a relatively strong story element to the game, although in order to fully experience and understand the game's plot the player must rely on written text scattered, and some times hidden, throughout the base. Completing side-objectives also has an effect in the later stages of the game.

Included is also a Cat & Mouse themed multiplayer game, where players take turns in being the hunter or the hunted, while using their equipment to accomplish their objectives. Finally, the game never ceases to retain a humorous and slightly over-the-top attitude that is evident in little details such as the cheesy elevator music and the ridiculous pieces of equipment such as the music player that will make any guard who picks it up listen to music, effectively making them unable to hear the player.

 Even though the core gameplay was heavily inspired by titles like Metal Gear Solid, a lot of the game's mechanics were inspired by other titles such as Thief and Deus Ex, that combine into a unique experience that will highly entertain enthusiasts of the genre.

Free content updates have also been at the core of our focus (Besides easter eggs and deus ex references); ideas that derive from even the most minor of external influences have the possibility of becoming full-fledged mechanics available as updates. (For instance, someone mentioned that PI's difficulty resembled Thief's difficulty in terms of brutality, and simply that evolved into adding stealable loot throughout the levels and the full-fledged economy system)

       Note that the screenshots and videos portray a game that is still a WIP.


Features:

  • Simple Arcade-like Core mechanics that are easy to pick up but difficult to master.
  • A Unique Neo-Noir art direction.
  • Arcade-like level of difficulty that puts pressure on the player at all times and surprises them by punishing carelessness with traps or tricky setups such as turret mazes and careful resource management layouts.
  • A great number of security measures to bypass and sneak past, as well as equipment and special abilities that will enrich the stealth experience.
  • Multiple soundtracks to choose from including the option to import your own music.
  • Free, yet substantial content updates.
  • Points reward system enriched by an uncrating minigame for an extra gamble factor, and a full-fledged economy system.
  • A unique competitive Hide and Seek multiplayer mode.
  • A huge number of unlockables including entirely new soundtracks, bonus maps and hats.
  • NEW!: A mode with procedurally generated maps dubbed "The Binding of Infiltrator".
  • NEW!: A Map Editor! 

 

More information on the game can be found at its Steam Greenlight page and its Desura page.


The money that will be gathered will be used to improve and polish the game's art assets, allow us to use more advanced technologies for its making such as DX10/11 assets ,and allow it to be ported to Linux.

The game is currently in an alpha stage, although it is very close to being fully completed. However, it requires your assistance for such a thing to happen.

Feel free to contact me directly for any information or request for assistance at yeoldesnake@hotmail.com

story:
A Fun Family Game

Irresponsibility  is a family friendly card game for 2-4 players. Players take turns either helping Mr Toast be irresponsible by playing fun Recreation cards or by saddling your opponents with Responsibility cards to keep Mr Toast from having fun.  Mr Toast's friends also get in on the action as Buddy cards who add to your score, thanks Joe the Egg!  You also get to play Action cards which can let you draw more cards, play extra cards or even take over another players position.  The winner is the first person to get to 15 points worth of Recreation & Buddy cards!

Meet Mr Toast & His Friends

The star of the game is Mr Toast.  Also along for the ride is his best friend Joe the Egg.  Mr Toast's next door neighbor is the ever nervous Shaky Bacon.  Many of their other friends and acquaintances make appearances including Clem Lemon, Lemon Ed, Mope the Onion, Lil' Leif, Eugene and Roy the Mushroom.

Hasbro's Great Game Contest

One other aspect of this campaign is that Irresponsibility is one of 5 finalists in Hasbro's Great Game Contest!  Chosen from over 500 games, Irresponsibility is now vying with 4 other games to be the Grand Prize winner who receives $10,000 and a trip to Hasbro headquarters for advice, mentoring and assistance.  The success of this campaign will help Hasbro determine who wins the contest.  So it would be great if we could get a ton of backers to show how much people want this game!

But my main priority is to produce a fun game through this campaign.  And no matter what happens with the contest, this game is going to be in your hands!

How to Play the Game

What Is the Game

The game is a 90 card deck of high quality custom bridge cards, a rules sheet and a slipcase box.  I did all the design and art for the game (check out the Gallery to see all the images in the game).  I have been working on the game for the last 6 months and play testing it throughout that time.  So the GAME IS DONE.  All that needs to be finalized is the printing of the game, box and instructions.  We will be shipping finished, ready to play games by February 2016 at the latest.

The game is for 2-4 players, ages 7 and up.  It takes 5-15 minutes to play and about 10 minutes to learn the rules.  The game is fun for kids but with many different strategic options, game play will also be challenging for adults.

    PERKS

    Stretch Goals

    WE ARE FUNDED - Lets start hitting these STRETCH GOALS!

    Risks & Challenges

    I have been self publishing comics & producing toys for almost 12 years so I am well versed in producing products like this.  For production I am using the same company that has been producing all my samples and I have been super happy with the quality.  To get an idea of the products I have created you can check out my webstore: MR TOAST WEBSTORE

    Two years ago I ran a Kickstarter for another product, I was fully funded and fulfilled all of the rewards.  I am a one man business so in addition to doing all the art and I also take care of all of my own business affairs.  So I make sure everyone is happy, if there is a problem, I will take care of it.

    Where Does the Money Go

    The money goes into producing the game. I do all the art and design, so there is no one to pay.  I set the initial goal at $3500 which is the minimum amount needed to produce the game.

    Who Am I?

    My name is Dan Goodsell.  I am an artist living in Los Angeles.  I created Mr Toast while I was in college.  Then in 2003 I started doing a webcomic, this blossomed into a small business which included producing Mr Toast comics, dolls, toys, jewelry, posters & and now this GAME!  I show my original art at Gallery 1988, in Los Angeles, and other galleries all over the USA and world.

    Thanks

    I just want to thank everyone who helped me out with this.  The playtesters - Scott and Ashley, Harrison and Kayla, Johnny and Tony, Dan M. and his family, Judy,  Dan R. and Charlie and anyone else I have cajoled into playing the game with me.  Huge thanks to the legions of Mr Toast fans who make this all possible.  Thanks to the folks at Hasbro who saw a little game they liked and gave me an extra push to get it done.  And of course huge thanks to my wife and family for sticking with me through all this Mr Toast silliness.
