story:
Remember Steel Storm: Burning Retribution? The top-down arcade shooter developed by Kot-in-Action Creative Artel? Apparently it was pretty good. Now try to imagine a sequel set within the same universe, but adapted into a first person shooter with old school gunplay in the spirit of Doom and Quake with added adventure elements and a rewarding story.
 
This is Steel Storm 2.
 
Yes, unlike the original game, Steel Storm 2 will combine vehicle and on-foot action so that players will experience a more engaging and diverse tale from behind the eyes of its protagonist. With your gun facing forward, prepare to head into an action-packed shooting frenzy with discoveries that will send emotions running high.
 

WTF Is Steel Storm 2?

Steel Storm 2 is a multi-faceted FPS experience. Imagine the breadth of Rage’s gameplay - the vehicular exploration and enemy extermination - but add a storyline that actually rewards you; something more in line with Halo and Darksiders. Now let’s sprinkle in some of the classic features of older shooters: carrying all weapons, no cover, lots of ammo, fast movement, and so on. The visual style is inspired by Ghost in the Shell anime, with a blend of Blood+, Afrosamurai and Appleseed to a degree.
 
Steel Storm 2 will utilize the mighty idTech 4 GPL engine (the engine behind Doom 3 / Quake 4 / Prey / Wolfenstein / Brink ) and will be available for Linux and Windows, with a Mac release possible if enough funding is received. A release on Valve’s PC distribution store, Steam, has already been secured. A Fall 2013 release is planned.

Fast flowing FPS:
Infused with the ferocious pace of old school shooters, the meat of Steel Storm 2 is a chapter-based campaign across sprawling terrain accompanied by a harsh climate. Enemies come with various skills and need to be dealt with correctly and upon doing so you’ll witness the satisfaction of gibs! Big bosses, quests, key hunts, vehicular combat and plenty of weapons will keep you entertained from moment to moment.
 
Rich storyline:
Taking on the role of Aurora, a former hovertank pilot turned natural resource scout, your calling for adventure sends you to a remote corner of the Warbird galaxy, on a remote ancient planet. During your journey you will discover many wonderful places, cool weapons, awaken an ancient alien race and face separatist Union’s General Bova with his ruthless minions. The story is told with cutscenes, NPC interaction and through finding relics from Aurora’s past that have a profound effect on her.
 
Chapter-based adventure:
In order to mold the game as we hope and to ensure it appears on your monitors as soon as possible, we're releasing the game in four chapters. Think back to how Quake was separated into episodes and you’ll understand how this will function within the game. Releasing content in chapters also allows us to address feedback and tailor the game accordingly.
 
Manga-influenced artstyle:
Being fans of so many manga and their distinctive artstyle, it’s understandably making it across into Steel Storm 2. Specifically, we’re looking at Ghost in the Shell, Blood+, Afrosamurai, Appleseed and many other prominent animes for the majority of our art direction. These epics of their time serve as a great reference point for the game’s story too; which is charged high with emotion at times and is always action-packed.
 
Modding support:
Dedicating themselves to the project is a team of experienced Doom 3 modders using the idTech 4 GPL game engine. We’re keen to support the community and will do this by distributing the source code with the game as a part of the modding SDK, including all improvements to the game engine. This will allow much better modding capabilities than the previous Steel Storm game.
 
4 player online co-op:
Beat the game with up to four friends due to the online and LAN co-op capabilities. The aforementioned mod support is fully integrated with the co-op experience so when you’ve exhausted the campaign you can tweak gameplay to your liking, make your own levels and share new experiences with the global community.
 
Release on Steam:
As with Steel Storm: Burning Retribution, the sequel will be available to purchase on Steam across all three supporting platforms if the funding comes in. Of course, this carries all the usual benefits of releasing a game through Steam - playing with your friends with ease and the update system making it easy to add the content we’ve got planned for the game as well.
 

 

Why IndieGoGo?

Steel Storm 2 is an ambitious project and we are only mortals living in this world as you are. It’s the game we’ve always dreamed about making and so we’re determined to ensure it comes to fruition as best as we can make it. I’ve personally been working on the game by myself for 6 months and that includes a meticulous 3 months of switching engines, from Darkplaces to idTech 4. At last, the game is starting to come together and so a number of collaborators have been brought in to supply art, additional programming and music. All of these people need to be paid for their fantastic work and there are a number of other costs that need to be met for the game to truly come to life.
 
So far I’ve funded Steel Storm 2 with the money made from Steel Storm: Burning Retribution but that pot has since become empty. Undoubtedly there’s still a while to go, which is why it’s high time to get stuck into development so we can share it with players as soon as possible! Ideally we would need some extra members to collaborate on the game and software to boost productivity, but primarily the funding will be used to create plenty of art assets and all of the levels required for the game.

This is why we’ve come to IndieGoGo, with hopes that those interested will fund the game’s further progression and get involved as part of its surrounding community. To wrap it up more succinctly, here’s a quick breakdown as to how any money will be used:
 
Expanding the core team: 
Having the people already lined up to work on the game able to put their focus into it will make a huge difference to the quality and the speed at which we can get it on to your monitors. This includes:
  • 2 game logic programmers
  • an engine programmer
  • 2 artists
  • marketing/ PR
Contributing freelancers: 
As well as having a core team to work on the game, we’ll need to hire a few freelancers to fill in other parts of this audiovisual project. As in, we’ll be needing:
  • atmospheric music from Sven Gerlach
  • sound design from Drydock Audio
  • voiceover for protagonist and NPCs from Natalie Loftus
Listen to the one of the music tracks from the Steel Storm 2 OST by Sven right here: https://soundcloud.com/steel-storm-2/steel-storm-2-title-track
 
Software and Hardware: 
While we utilize various open source tools in production, some tasks require proprietary software and additional hardware to achieve desireable results in timely fashion.
 

Stretch Goals

 
If we manage to accumulate extra funds, we will channel them to achieve the following goals:

$105,000 - Apple Mac OSX Release

Unfortunately we don't have the capabilities at the current moment in time to create a Mac version of Steel Storm 2 due to a lack of Apple's hardware and license. We definitely don't want to leave a whole player base out though, so are hoping to gain enough funds to make a Mac version possible. 

$115,000 - Steamworks support

Bringing up Steel Storm 2's magnitude is a challenge in itself. Adding comprehensive support for Steamworks to the GPL engine without violating the terms of the GPL license and Valve's SDA is also a challenge. Thankfully we have developed a way so solve this issue. However it will require the work of a programmer who has a deep knowledge of Steamworks.

 

Rewards

$1 - Limited Edition Wallpaper

Thank you so much for funding the development of Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1. In return you will receive a Steel Storm 2 desktop wallpaper and our many thanks.

$5 - Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1 on Steam (limited to 200)

For those of you who are quick off the mark, you're able to grab a copy of Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1 on Steam at half price. Thanks for showing an early interest in our game!

$5 - Steel Storm 2: Prelude text adventure + mystery prize

To further immerse you in the Steel Storm universe and the main character in Steel Storm 2, Aurora Riley, we have a small text adventure for you to play. Once you get through it you'll be eligible for a mystery prize to be revealed some time in the future! Desktop wallpaper is included.

$10 - Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1 on Steam

Looking to grab yourself a copy of Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1 on Steam? Then this is the tier for you. You'll receive a Steam key when the game is released in Fall 2013. The text adventure and the desktop wallpaper are included.

$30 - Beta access + digital OST + previous non-limited tiers

Upping the ante a bit now are we? Well, we're going to make sure you're well looked after by giving you early access to the game during its beta phase and you'll also receive the game's full soundtrack when it is released. Obviously you'll get the full game on Steam when it's released, as well as the text adventure and the desktop wallpaper.

$50 - Digital art book + alpha access + previous non-limited tiers

One of the rewards we're most excited about is the digital art book. This will consist of all art materials produced for the game - from concept to final design. We'll make sure it's really pretty, promise! You'll also be among the first people to play Steel Storm 2 as you'll be invited to test out the alpha version. All previous tiers that aren't limited are included.

$100 - Extra copy of Steel Storm 2: Chapter 1 + pre-order of all four chapters + tag/picture in a room in the game + previous non-limited tiers

Wow! Thanks for being so generous! For this you'll receive an extra copy of the game on Steam that you can gift to a friend so that you can play co-op together. You'll also receive all four chapters of Steel Storm 2 as they are released at no extra cost. On top of that you'll be able to leave your mark on the game with your own tag or picture which we'll place in a special room in the game. All previous non-limited tiers are included.

$250 - Design a weapon or a vehicle for Steel Storm 2 (limited to 4) + previous non-limited tiers

This is one of the most exciting tiers for us as we want to work with you on designing a weapon or a vehicle that will make it into the final game! All previous non-limited tiers are included.

$400 - previous tiers (except $400 tier) +  3D action figure (20cm high, full color) + previous non-limited tiers

Bring a piece of Steel Storm 2 into the real world with your very own action figure. This is a 20cm high model of Aurora in an action pose in full color. We'll send this out to you with a great big hug! All previous non-limited tiers included.

$650 - Lend your voice to an NPC with your name (limited to 5) + previous non-limited tiers

Always wanted to be in a game? Now's your chance as we're offering those who are this generous to do some voice acting for us. Your voice and name will be attached to an NPC inside the final version of Steel Storm 2. That's something to show the grandchildren! All previous non-limited tiers included.

$10000 - Unique Steel Storm 2 collectible katana, hand-forged according to ancient methods + Associate Producer in credits + previous non-limited tiers

Woah! You're a superstar and probably the best person in the world. For such an extraordinary amount of money you can become Aurora with your own unique hand-forged Steel Storm 2 collectible katana. This is a restricted prize that is only valid to those in countries where sword ownership is legal. You'll also be listed as an Associate Producer in the game's credits and receive all of the previous non-limited tiers. You've blown our minds!

Help Spread The Word!

If you want to help us out then please tell as many people as you can about Steel Storm 2!
  • Use the Indiegogo sharing tools to get the word out on all the social media you use
  • Tell all of your friends, colleagues and family about the game
  • Ask us questions about the game for further information - we're happy to answer
  • Come talk to us and other players in our forums
story_txt:
Remember Steel Storm: Burning Retribution? The top-down arcade shooter developed by Kot-in-Action Creative Artel? Apparently it was pretty good. Now try to imagine a sequel set within the same universe, but adapted into a first person shooter with old school gunplay in the spirit of Doom and Quake with added adventure elements and a rewarding story.
 
This is Steel Storm 2.
 
Yes, unlike the original game, Steel Storm 2 will combine vehicle and on-foot action so that players will experience a more engaging and diverse tale from behind the eyes of its protagonist. With your gun facing forward, prepare to head into an action-packed shooting frenzy with discoveries that will send emotions running high.
 


WTF Is Steel Storm 2?
Steel Storm 2 is a multi-faceted FPS experience. Imagine the breadth of Rage’s gameplay - the vehicular exploration and enemy extermination - but add a storyline that actually rewards you; something more in line with Halo and Darksiders. Now let’s sprinkle in some of the classic features of older shooters: carrying all weapons, no cover, lots of ammo, fast movement, and so on. The visual style is inspired by Ghost in the Shell anime, with a blend of Blood+, Afrosamurai and Appleseed to a degree.
 
Steel Storm 2 will utilize the mighty idTech 4 GPL engine (the engine behind Doom 3 / Quake 4 / Prey / Wolfenstein / Brink ) and will be available for Linux and Windows, with a Mac release possible if enough funding is received. A release on Valve’s PC distribution store, Steam, has already been secured. A Fall 2013 release is planned.

Fast flowing FPS:
Infused with the ferocious pace of old school shooters, the meat of Steel Storm 2 is a chapter-based campaign across sprawling terrain accompanied by a harsh climate. Enemies come with various skills and need to be dealt with correctly and upon doing so you’ll witness the satisfaction of gibs! Big bosses, quests, key hunts, vehicular combat and plenty of weapons will keep you entertained from moment to moment.
 
Rich storyline:
Taking on the role of Aurora, a former hovertank pilot turned natural resource scout, your calling for adventure sends you to a remote corner of the Warbird galaxy, on a remote ancient planet. During your journey you will discover many wonderful places, cool weapons, awaken an ancient alien race and face separatist Union’s General Bova with his ruthless minions. The story is told with cutscenes, NPC interaction and through finding relics from Aurora’s past that have a profound effect on her.
 
Chapter-based adventure:
In order to mold the game as we hope and to ensure it appears on your monitors as soon as possible, we're releasing the game in four chapters. Think back to how Quake was separated into episodes and you’ll understand how this will function within the game. Releasing content in chapters also allows us to address feedback and tailor the game accordingly.
 
Manga-influenced artstyle:

story:
THIS IS YOUR CHANCE TO BE A PART OF THEARTRE OF LIFE ARTISTRY HISTORY

We need YOUR help to create our GREATEST EXPERIENCE GAME YET! It's time to give you a platform to EXPERIENCE the East Coast of Australia through a new and EXCITING medium. 'The EXPERIENCE GAMES! T.O.L.A. (Bob Gammage) has toured AUSTRALIA extensively painting countless performers and shows but nothing will be as EXCITING as this!


We have made it to our first goal!

(The Artworks took 20 years to produce!)

5 Experience Games Tournament Card Decks


This project spanning 20 years, by the artist Bob Gammage, produced a body of over 1000 original artworks, known as Live Event Performance Artscapes. In the creation of each Artscape, he encouraged musicians, organizers, staff, tourists and those in attendance to add brushstrokes of colour to each canvas. All performance artworks evolved from blank to finished Artscape within the set time frame of the event. This was the birth of Theatre of Life Artistry.

Now you have the opportunity to be a part of this exciting project! 



The artist, Bob Gammage, became known as T.O.L.A.  Australia's foremost live event performance painter.

We have also made it to our second goal!

Funding prior to our campaign allowed us to test the solidity of each component in the open market place. The card game, 'GIG CANCELLED',  has been widely accepted due to its variable player options.  We were able to produce five board game prototype templates and prepare all images, writings, poetry and layout for all five books. We have gratefully reached this goal through private funding and we would firstly like to thank the many investors who have assisted with their time and finances toward the complete creation of T.O.L.A.'s total concept.

Secondly, we can now offer you the opportunity to be a part of the EXPERIENCE Games and its Global Launch.


Now it's time to reach our third goal!

Creation of the interactive on-line tourism

tournament 'EXPERIENCE the Game'


This is where YOU CAN HELP.  When you pledge a PERK,  "EXPERIENCE the Game' is one step closer to being launched globally. We have PERKS to suit any budget. They start from as little as $5.  If you love Musicians, pledge a PERK, if you love Artists, pledge a PERK, if you happen to live in Eumundi, 1770, Gympie, Tamworth or Windsor and you love your town, pledge a PERK; If you're a business owner in one of these locations and would like to see increased business in your town, pledge a PERK. The artist has made it his life's work to weave a tapestry, a memory of the lives and the events of the beautiful people whose paths he has crossed. His works included the brushstrokes of many of you throughout Australia and abroad; Performers and the general public alike. Perhaps even your brush strokes are part of this beautiful tapestry. Beyond this, you may be a perfect stranger who believes in what the artist has created and you too, can be a part of the tapestry by pledging a PERK to assist in the global launch. If you find you can't pledge a PERK, then please make a lot of noise and share our Indeigogo campaign; That will help too.


Look to the Right for PERK packages number 1 and 2







Experience and Learn DVD's

Learning How to Paint DVD




Acrylic workshop DVD from the House of T.O.L.A.

  • Tips from Eumundi professionals
  • 1-2 and 3 point perspective revealed
  • Understanding the emotion of Colour
  • How to paint Van Gogh's Night Cafe
  • Reveals how you too can learn to see through the artist eye and paint amazing works of art in just a few short hours in the comfort or your own home


Video Postcard From Eumundi - 1st Edition

Join Cameron Covey on an historical journey through Eumundi's past, and into its present, featuring the world famous Eumundi Markets and meed some of it's characters along the way.



Boardgame with Cards and Book

The total gift package.

This perk is the epitome of 20 years of the Artist's work.

Can order 1 Series.

The Boardgame - 'MISS A TURN, MET A LOCAL'  (yes, that's "MET" a local, as in  "Sorry mate, got held up, met a local" ... not a mistake) has been designed around the layout of the town/event location it is associated with. ie; Eumundi, 1770, The Muster, Tamworth and the Sydney Blues Festival. It's played in real time, depicting real street locations and real venues. A fun game, until someone throws down the "Bastard Card" and cancels your GIG, at which point you'll be forced to reference the 'Experience Book' which will be of no help whatsoever; but a great pleasure to read and explore.

The EXPERIENCE the Game Book is a132 page, full colour, gloss, hard cover, burse bound, dust jacketed, ride through the artist's creativity. The book contains stories from the House of T.O.L.A., Alphabet Soup, (a challenge to get your tongue around), poetry relevant to the Series, and other literary works from the artist, Bob Gammage. The book also contains the card images with public comment.




Apprentice For a Day

You will experience a Live Event at the canvas as the Artist's apprentice for 6 hours.  This may be held during the day or evening. Transport is not included.







It's Your Identity

MUSICIANS and ARTISTS only. 

Personalise the back of 1 card game deck with your logo or album cover.  A little bit of shameless promotion for you. You will receive 50 decks of the location of your choice. eg; Choose one of the following;  Eumundie, 1770, Tamworth, Gympie Muster or the Sydney Blues Festival.






Live Event Fundraiser

Australia Only

For $990 the artist will present himself anywhere in Australia to paint, live, a charity event designated by you. The artwork will be Auctioned and 100% of the funds will be donated to your chosen charity/organization.  You will receive all of the PREVIOUS PERKS as mentioned above. 









An Original Artwork for $1500

Acrylic on 12 oz double primed canvas.


Original artwork featured in the Original card game decks.  These do not come framed.

Look at number on banner above to view artwork or click on links below.

1. Cleveland Blues - Live at the Agnes Water Blues Festival (1770 Deck)-Diamond shape - size - 600mm x 600mm approx.

2. Lisa at the Trains Station Stage - Eumundi Markets (Eumundi)

3. The Indian Fairy - Eumundi Markets - Face painter for 16 years (Eumundi)

4. The Mic James Show - Locomotive Hotel Tamworth (Tamworth)

5. The Spray Can Artist, Jared Lyell - Peel St Tamworth Country Music Festival (Tamworth) 

6. The Buskers Arrive - Peel St Tamworth Country Music Festival (Tamworth)

7. Jabaru at Gossips Circle - Eumundi Markets (Eumundi)

8. Farther's Day - Noosa Jazz Festival 2006 (Eumundi)

9. Geoff Achison and Doc Span - Live at Joe's Waterhole (Eumundi)




Heirloom Artscape


A unique and individual Artscape of the most important moments of your life, or a gift for that special friend who has everything.  Your Wedding, Birthday, Celebration, Corporate Launch or Milestone, almost any occasion is captured in real time by you, your family, your guests and the Artist during your event.










The Artist - Bob Gammage



The EXPERIENCE GAMES

IRONY - 1 player card game

IRONIC - 2 player card game

GIG CANCELLED - 2 or more player card game

MISS A TURN, MET A LOCAL - the Boardgame


Sample Game Boards


Eumundi



1770  - Board No. 1



1770 - Board No. 2




Thank You



Love Life

T.O.L.A.


















.

Video Postcard From Eumundi - 1st Edition
Join Cameron Covey on an historical journey through Eumundi's past, and into its present, featuring the world famous Eumundi Markets and meed some of it's characters along the way. 



Boardgame with Cards and Book
The total gift package.
This perk is the epitome of 20 years of the Artist's work.
Can order 1 Series.
The Boardgame - 'MISS A TURN, MET A LOCAL'  (yes, that's "MET" a local, as in  "Sorry mate, got held up, met a local" ... not a mistake) has been designed around the layout of the town/event location it is associated with. ie; Eumundi, 1770, The Muster, Tamworth and the Sydney Blues Festival. It's played in real time, depicting real street locations and real venues. A fun game, until someone throws down the "Bastard Card" and cancels your GIG, at which point you'll be forced to reference the 'Experience Book' which will be of no help whatsoever; but a great pleasure to read and explore. 
The EXPERIENCE the Game Book is a132 page, full colour, gloss, hard cover, burse bound, dust jacketed, ride through the artist's creativity. The book contains stories from the House of T.O.L.A., Alphabet Soup, (a challenge to get your tongue around), poetry relevant to the Series, and other literary works from the artist, Bob Gammage. The book also contains the card images with public comment.



Apprentice For a Day
You will experience a Live Event at the canvas as the Artist's apprentice for 6 hours.  This may be held during the day or evening. Transport is not included. 






It's Your Identity

MUSICIANS and ARTISTS only. 
Personalise the back of 1 card game deck with your logo or album cover.  A little bit of shameless promotion for you. You will receive 50 decks of the location of your choice. eg; Choose one of the following;  Eumundie, 1770, Tamworth, Gympie Muster or the Sydney Blues Festival.






Live Event Fundraiser

Australia Only
For $990 the artist will present himself anywhere in Australia to paint, live, a charity event designated by you. The artwork will be Auctioned and 100% of the funds will be donated to your chosen charity/organization.  You will receive all of the PREVIOUS PERKS as mentioned above. 








An Original Artwork for $1500
Acrylic on 12 oz double primed canvas.

Original artwork featured in the Original card game decks.  These do not come framed.
Look at number on banner above to view artwork or click on links below.
1. Cleveland Blues - Live at the Agnes Water Blues Festival (1770 Deck)-Diamond shape - size - 600mm x 600mm approx.
2. Lisa at the Trains Station Stage - Eumundi Markets (Eumundi)
3. The Indian Fairy - Eumundi Markets - Face painter for 16 years (Eumundi)
4. The Mic James Show - Locomotive Hotel Tamworth (Tamworth)
5. The Spray Can Artist, Jared Lyell - Peel St Tamworth Country Music Festival (Tamworth) 
6. The Buskers Arrive - Peel St Tamworth Country Music Festival (Tamworth)
7. Jabaru at Gossips Circle - Eumundi Markets (Eumundi)
8. Farther's Day - Noosa Jazz Festival 2006 (Eumundi)
9. Geoff Achison and Doc Span - Live at Joe's Waterhole (Eumundi)




Heirloom Artscape

A unique and individual Artscape of the most important moments of your life, or a gift for that special friend who has everything.  Your Wedding, Birthday, Celebration, Corporate Launch or Milestone, almost any occasion is captured in real time by you, your family, your guests and the Artist during your event. 










The Artist - Bob Gammage



The EXPERIENCE GAMES
IRONY - 1 player card game
IRONIC - 2 player card game
GIG CANCELLED - 2 or more player card game
MISS A TURN, MET A LOCAL - the Boardgame

Sample Game Boards

Eumundi



1770  - Board No. 1


1770 - Board No. 2




Thank You




Love Life
T.O.L.A.





















.

story:
Hello World!

My name is Daniel Steer, I founded Back To Basics Gaming in Jan of 2013, I have been working on 'Terra Incognita ~ Chapter One: The Descendant' ever since. 
Go over to Facebook and add my personal account if you'd like a chat :)


I will list some helpful links below:

Personal Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dan.steer3
Terra Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BackToBasicsGaming
Official Website: http://www.backtobasicsgaming.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DanPlanetTerra
Indie DB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/terra-incognita-chapter-one
Steam Greenlight! : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails


What stage of development is Terra at?

The game itself is currently at beta stage and is coming along nicely. The Windows beta is currently available for sale on the official website: 
http://www.backtobasicsgaming.com
 

Why do I need more funds for Terra?
I've hit a brick wall in the development of Terra, I still have to commission composers and graphic artists to help me produce the assets to properly finish Terra.  At this time, Terra has a nice selection of custom sound track/artwork (check the teaser video) It's all custom drawn, either by myself or has been commissioned. Terra has been funded this far by donations, pre orders of the game, beta purchases and out of my pocket. 
If the money is raised, it will cover the costs of the remaining artwork and music/sound effects for Terra. I have received quotes and the total cost of the remaining assets required are just under £2000, I have raised £1500 through beta sales, donations and from my pocket.
I need your help to finish Terra and create a truly nostalgic role playing game!


What will you get for supporting Terra?

  • Every single person that supports this campaign will get a Desura/IndieGameStand key and a Steam key(When Greenlit)
  • Your name in the game credits!
  • In game extras! *Weapons, Items, Armour, Characters
  • Please note *Limited offer perk rewards, only apply to that specific perk. Example ~ The art cards do not come with perks of higher value*

What platforms will Terra be on?

The initial launch will be on Windows. After the inital release, if all goes to plan Terra will be available for Mac, Linux and Wii U!
Terra runs two separate game engines at this time, one for Windows, one for everything else. The latter is still fairly unstable, but will be tidied up after the Windows release!


About Terra!

The world of Terra is a vast world, with a rich back-story and lore. 

As the player progresses through the main story, they recruit a large array of personality types to the party. Each character will have a history that be revealed through a series of side quests, some will be revealed through the main story.

The game uses a simple, addictive turn based battle system, loads of magic/skills/abilities to learn. Not all are learned just by levelling up, the player must explore, complete side quests/errands etc to get the best out of Terra!

Terra has a simple but fun inventory management system, with loads of loot to collect, again, along the main story arc OR through side quests and exploring

Explore Explore Exlpore!

The overall experience of Terra is a nostalgic one, reminiscent of early 90s/16bit role playing games!

I hope you enjoy Terra Incognita RPG

Daniel Steer
Back To Basics Gaming

Please support Terra on Greenlight!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=350497082

story:
Why The ChristWreath
During the Christmas season a number of years ago our pastor was lamenting that all we see is Frosty, Rudolph and Santa....Secularism and the American Atheist movement is being very effective in their war on Christmas.

The example below was a billboard placed in Time Square, N.Y. during the Christmas Season by the American Atheist Organization.


To say this billboard is disturbing to all  Christians is an understatement.

I was moved to stop just talking about what should be done and to DO SOMETHING about it.

While our Pastor continued I noticed a Cross adjacent to him and behind that a beautiful Christmas wreath.  Hmm... Why not bring together the CROSS, the universal symbol of Christ, and the Christmas  wreath, creating this NEW CHRISTMAS SYMBOL, the ChristWreath, to serve as an affirmation of the true meaning of Christmas, the birth of the Christ Child.

The ChristWreath will be a symbol of Christian Pride and what HIS values bring to our lives, our country and the world.            Our NEW Christmas Symbol.

 

   

                                                                                                                                                   

Most Christians place a round wreath on their home at Christmas.  How many would now display the ChristWreath on their home,

                                                      


or wear a beautiful ChristWreath Christmas Cross to affirm their Pride in Christianity and support for Religious Freedom and Christian Family Values?

             



Isn't it time that Christianity stand up for Jesus???   NOW is the time!!!

There are over 240,000,000 Christians in America.  If only 10% embrace the meaning of the ChristWreath, that means we have to produce and display 24,000,000 (that's MILLION) ChristWreath products.  How many JOBS could we also create in America if we had to manufacture 24,000,000 ChristWreath designed products.

We now have Christian Christmas gifts that bring the Cross of Jesus   into our Christmas Celebration. Will YOU support this message?

Keep Christ In Christmas-- Action required

Bring the Cross of Jesus, the ChristWreath, into our Christmas Celebration!

Here are 3 easy things YOU can do to show your active support for this Mission( It truly will make a difference), go to our Web   www.ChristWreath.com and simply:

1. "Register" your support that we bring the CROSS of Jesus  into our Christmas Celebration   by just adding your name as a ChristWreath supporter.

2.  Then, please "Share " this wonderful Christmas message  with your Family, Friends & Contacts through your e-mail contact list, Facebook,Twitter etc.

3. Display a ChristWreath design.

Join us to show this is a strong CHRISTIAN country that supports Religious Freedom for ALL.

This is OUR time to Celebrate HIS Birthday...It Is all about HIM...Will You Help?

                                          If not You...WHO??                 If not NOW...When??


Job Creation Opportunity--Become a ChristWreath Legacy Partner

Here is how YOU can also become an IMPORTANT part of our Mission to Keep Christ In Christmas NOW. 

Come Join us and in addition to a wonderful Mission, YOU can also help create JOBS in the USA .

Locate a manufacturers in YOUR geographic area to help create jobs locally..by manufacturing a ChristWreath Symbol product.


Our goal is to introduce this New Christmas Symbol, the ChristWreath, to the USA and the World.

 We need manufacturers in ALL states throughout the USA to be manufacturers of various ChristWreath designed products..

  • Wreaths( real and artificial),lighted wreaths,commercial sized wreaths etc.
  • Jewelry..the ChristWreath Christmas Cross jewelry collection. Necklace,bracelet ear rings etc. Jewelers, create your own  ChristWreath design product.
  • Artists..depict the ChristWreath Design in their particular craft......paintings,wood, metal, silver, glass, floral,diamonds,gold etc.
  • Clothing...Logo embossed to hats, scarfs, shirts, gloves,party goods etc.



Become a ChristWreath Legacy Partner by locating a manufacturer who will be licensed for a ChristWreath designed product and 10% of the Royalty received will be paid to a Charity  of your choice.

Help share a wonderful Christmas message. Help create jobs locally. Help support a Charity of your choice. BECOME a  CHRISTWREATH LEGACY PARTNER

               A..... WIN....WIN....WIN.....Result      YOU can BE THE DIFFERENCE


Our United States Patent and Trademark Office makes it work.

Millions of artificial Christmas wreaths and Christmas decorations are imported from China every year.  We Americans, unknowingly, send Billions of OUR  U.S. dollars to China to manufacture 95% of our CHRISTMAS products for OUR CHRISTIAN celebration.  Does this make economic sense? (And China is not a Christian country)

We were elated when we were notified by the United States Patent and Trademark Office that the ChristWreath has been granted a Design Patent, Trademark and a Copyright for the ChristWreath design.

                                                   


With having a Design Patent we now have the opportunity to make the ChristWreath, the NEW CHRISTMAS SYMBOL, a MADE IN THE USA product and help create badly needed JOBS in America. China can NOT take this design,The ChristWreath, and bring it into the USA .

Whitney Wreath Co, Whitneyville Maine, one of the largest wreath manufacturing companies in America, is manufacturing for us both the real and the artificial wreath. Roberto Arichi, Jewelry Designer, N.Y/L.A has created the beautiful ChristWreath Christmas Cross Collection.

Others also are anxious to join them in manufacturing a ChristWreath designed product.

We are starting in Ft Pierce, Florida. Pastor Trevor Banks  of the Resurrection Family Life Worship Center is helping to create a manufacturing company  to be a model for creating JOBS in a challenged community by manufacturing the ChristWreath and other ChristWreath Products..

Our plan is to then take this model and replicate it in other challenged communities throughout the USA.

This is the major project to which we are requesting your support. Help us create jobs here and then share this model with other communities in America.

The ChristWreath ,the New Christmas Symbol, is like a two edged sword, not only bringing a wonderful Christmas message, but also helping to create much needed jobs in America.

Fundraisers
We will work with Churches, Schools and other organizations  to use the ChristWreath as a fundraiser to help support their various Youth,Family and other Ministries.

Any organization is encouraged to use the ChristWreath and our new ChristWreath Christmas Cross Jewelry Collection plus other ChristWreath designed products to enhance their fundraising opportunity and share this New Christmas Symbol.

The Easy Fundraiser

What if your organization could simply register and share a link to our website Store, THE CHRISTWREATH CHRISTMAS STORE. with a portion of their members  shopping dollars going back to your organization. No more needing large committees to plan and execute a complicated fundraising campaign.

Just register on our Website  www.ChristWreath.com , you are assigned a code to share with your members and when they shop for a beautiful Christian Christmas gift,indicate the code and a portion of the sale comes back to your organization as part of your fundraiser. This continues all throughout the years purchases.

Please go to our website www.ChristWreath.com to register your organization for a ChristWreath easy  fundraiser.

ChristWreath Christmas Store.....Your on-line Christmas shopping .

Most on-line Stores         VS     ChristWreath Christmas Store   

Happy Holidays…                                 Merry Christmas

Made in China                                       Made In The USA

                                                                    Creating JOBS In America


HIS Birthday Celebration Plans

This Christmas help us plan the largest Birthday celebration ever with this banner as HIS invitation to each of us:

Aren't birthdays the very best times for all of us and our families every year??

Wouldn't it be wonderful to see this inviting message placed on our roadways, Schools and Churches all over America as a response to the billboards being placed by the American Atheists?

It is our time to celebrate HIS birthday!!


Please go to our web www.rsvpJESUS.org for information on this billboard and banner program.

Who We Are

We are the Austin & Kohuth Families and live in the Ft Pierce area of Fla., having moved here from the Northeast a number of years ago.

We have become very disturbed as many of you have,in seeing how our country is gradually loosing its moral compass. 

In stead of just complaining about it we have decided to take an active role and see if WE, all together as the Christian community,can make a difference.

This has developed into a wonderful journey.  Having retired a number of years ago I had not envisioned being at the threshold of a worthy mission as well as helping create much needed jobs in America.

My past business experience was in helping to build independent insurance agencies in Northeast Pennsylvania.

We would love to have the ChristWreath be the start of an example of how we can ALL help re-build AMERICA and provide individuals with additional opportunities.

We are pleased that Indian River State College's Entrepreneurship Institute is assisting as we move forward with our planning to help create jobs in America starting here in Ft. Pierce Florida. Saint Anastasia Church and the local Knights of Columbus is assisting in our marketing initiative plan for Churches and Schools. 

Pastor Trevor Banks of the Resurrection Life Family Worship Center is the first to be using the ChristWreath to be providing jobs in our  community by manufacturing  ChristWreath designed products.
Our objective is that this will spread as a National Campaign across America.

Christian Pride and Unity
The ethics and moral values are badly broken in our country and in our world today.
The degree of violence and brutality being exhibited throughout the world is unimaginable.

Is it not time to have a re-birth of Christian Values? Is it not time for Christians to join together to bring the Cross of Jesus as His symbol of Peace and Love to the world?
 
Will YOU help?  If Not You...WHO?  If Not Now...WHEN?

Please go to ChristWreath.com for more information of our ChristWreath Mission:

  Merry Christmas  It's My Birthday  Dec. 25th  Join The Celebration
                                                      rsvpJESUS.org


What We Need and What You Get
Contributions to our campaign will be used to share the message of the New Christmas Symbol... the ChristWreath... through the Marketing of the SYMBOL in order for it to become recognized throughout the USA and the World.

The funds raised will be used to create Jobs in many ways.

We will be using the funds to establish and enhance the entire E-Commerce network needed for the business. Customer Service, Marketing, fulfillment, Information Technology, ETC.

Phase l: Whitney Wreath Co will handle the fulfillment needed . As demand dictates, additional locations will be introduced.

Phase II :   To manufacture the ChristWreath here in Ft Pierce we will need to purchase many things:

Wreath making machines, wreath rings, wreath greenery material, decorations, packaging material, etc., injection plastic mold for plastic ChristWreath Symbol , machinery to embroider hats with the ChristWreath logo, the ChristWreath Christmas Jewelry Collection (necklace, earrings, bracelet, etc.)
Labor, accounting, administrative, and rental property cost.

Investment capital is the major challenge for all new business . This Indiegogo campaign will assist with that funding.

By supporting the ChristWreath “Keep Christ in Christmas" campaign, you not only will be able to express your pride in Christianity by displaying a ChristWreath design but also help create needed JOBS in the USA.

YOUR investment and becoming an ACTIVE participant will  make a difference.

Impact
Our Mission :

              To engage and challenge the Christian community to Keep Christ in Christmas.

               Reaffirm the PRIDE of what Christian Family Values bring to our lives, our country and the world.

              Assist in a Re-Birth of Christian Family Values in America, the Values which made the USA the envy of the world.


Manufacturing JOBS created through ChristWreath designed products will help build a bridge for the unemployed to become more successful members of America and meet their individual goals and aspirations.

The Christian community joining together, can place in motion a movement to return the USA to its prior righteousness. There are Christians all over this great country that can help take the lead to "KEEP CHRIST IN CHRISTMAS".

There are business leaders and manufacturers who could improve their profits by adding a ChristWreath related product to their offerings and at the same time create jobs in the in the USA..

                                                     a  WIN---WIN  combination!

Come join us


Other ways you can help
Please consider how you can help move this campaign forward.  Go to our website www.ChristWreath.com for some ideas and send us your ideas and your feedback.

We understand that some folks can't contribute, but we would love for you to join us and help in other ways. Ask others to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

Remind them to use their: CONTACTS... SOCIAL MEDIA... FACEBOOK... TWITTER... AND THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS


Share the Mission!  That's all there is to it!  Come join us on this wonderful journey!
     Now let's celebrate!!!              It's all about HIM!!!                 Jesus is born!!!
                                                                rsvpJESUS.org 

                                             

             Go to  www.ChristWreath.com to endorse the NEW Christmas Symbol.

We have become very disturbed as many of you have,in seeing how our country is gradually loosing its moral compass. In stead of just complaining about it we have decided to take an active role and see if WE, all together as the Christian community,can make a difference.This has developed into a wonderful journey.  Having retired a number of
years ago I had not envisioned being at the threshold of a worthy mission as
well as helping create much needed jobs in America.  My past business
experience was in helping to build independent insurance agencies in Northeast
Pennsylvania.
We would love to have the ChristWreath be the start of an example of how
we can ALL help re-build AMERICA and provide individuals with additional
opportunities.We are pleased that Indian River State College's Entrepreneurship Institute is
assisting as we move forward with our planning to help create jobs in America starting here in Ft. Pierce Florida. Saint Anastasia Church and the local Knights of Columbus is assisting in our
marketing initiative plan for Churches and Schools.  
Pastor Trevor Banks of the Resurrection Life Family Worship Center is the first
to be using the ChristWreath to be providing jobs in our  community by
manufacturing  ChristWreath designed products.
Our objective is that this will spread as a National Campaign across America.Christian Pride and Unity
The ethics and moral values are badly broken in our country and in our world
today. 
The degree of violence and brutality being exhibited throughout the world is
unimaginable. Is it not time to have a re-birth of Christian Values? Is it not
time for Christians to join together to bring the Cross of Jesus as His symbol
of Peace and Love to the world? 
Will YOU help?  If Not You...WHO?  If
Not Now...WHEN?
Please go to ChristWreath.com for more information of our ChristWreath Mission:
  Merry
Christmas  It's My Birthday  Dec.
25th  Join The Celebration
 
                                                    rsvpJESUS.orgWhat We Need and What You Get 
Contributions to our campaign will be used to share the message of the New
Christmas Symbol... the ChristWreath... through the Marketing of the SYMBOL in order for it to become recognized throughout the USA and the World. The funds raised will be used to create Jobs in many ways.We will be using the funds to establish and enhance the entire E-Commerce network needed for the business. Customer Service, Marketing, fulfillment, Information Technology, ETC.Phase l: Whitney Wreath Co will handle the fulfillment needed . As demand dictates, additional locations will be introduced. Phase II :   To manufacture the ChristWreath here in Ft Pierce we will need to purchase many
things: 
Wreath making machines, wreath rings, wreath greenery material, decorations,
packaging material, etc., injection plastic mold for plastic ChristWreath Symbol , machinery
to embroider hats with the ChristWreath logo, the ChristWreath Christmas
Jewelry Collection (necklace, earrings, bracelet, etc.)
Labor, accounting, administrative, and rental property cost. Investment capital
is the major challenge for all new business . This Indiegogo campaign will assist with that funding.
By supporting the ChristWreath “Keep Christ in Christmas" campaign, you not only will be
able to express your pride in Christianity by displaying a ChristWreath design
but also help create needed JOBS in the USA. YOUR investment and becoming an ACTIVE participant will  make a
difference.Impact
Our Mission :              To engage and challenge the Christian community to Keep Christ
in Christmas.              
Reaffirm the PRIDE of what Christian Family Values bring to our lives, our
country and the world.               Assist in a Re-Birth of Christian Family Values in
America, the Values which made the USA the envy of the world.

Manufacturing JOBS created through ChristWreath designed products will help
build a bridge for the unemployed to become more successful members of America
and meet their individual goals and aspirations.
The Christian community joining together, can place in motion a movement to
return the USA to its prior righteousness. There are Christians all over this great
country that can help take the lead to "KEEP CHRIST IN CHRISTMAS".
There are business leaders and manufacturers who could improve their profits by
adding a ChristWreath related product to their offerings and at the same time
create jobs in the in the USA..                                                     a  WIN---WIN  combination!Come join usOther ways you can help
Please consider how you can help move this campaign forward.  Go to our
website www.ChristWreath.com for some ideas and send us your ideas
and your feedback.
We understand that some folks can't contribute, but we would love for you to join us and help in other ways. Ask others to get the word out and make some
noise about our campaign. Remind them to use their: CONTACTS... SOCIAL MEDIA...
FACEBOOK... TWITTER... AND THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS

Share the Mission!  That's all there is to it!  Come join us on this
wonderful journey!
     Now let's
celebrate!!!              It's all about
HIM!!!                 Jesus is born!!!
                                                               
rsvpJESUS.org                                                            Go to  www.ChristWreath.com to endorse the NEW Christmas Symbol.

story:
short summary

Z-Horde is a 3D Real Time Strategy game for PC and Mac, about zombies fighting for a cause: human annihilation!


the game

Z-Horde takes place in an apocalyptic scenario where an unknown disease is seizing every human soul, turning them into blood thirsty and flesh hungry creatures.

But before you had time to plan ahead a survival kit, you were infected! The cure is a mirage. It is up to you to sit or fight back.

Take control over an army of zombies, each with special and unique  abilities. Lead them into the ultimate fight against what is left of mankind. Do not expect mercy, humans are everywhere, ready to attack you at sight, still believing they are the supreme race.

In this real time strategy game, you lead an army of zombies in the hunting for every human being left. Choose the right zombies, gather you hordes, play the right ability, destroy every single enemy in the way and maybe you will have a chance to live.

You already know how it feels to be a human. It is time to try something better…


    


the team 

Arrow Rooster’s team consists of five elements with backgrounds in Game Development Engineering and Design. Z-Horde is our debut game project.

At the moment, Z-Horde is at pre-alpha stage. Almost all features are already implemented and playable. The trailer is the product of the development stage the game is in. Everything was accomplished with teamwork, personal effort, time, know-how and fully developed with personal resources only.

We are committed to this project and believe that with help and better support we can achieve a new step that allow us to bring our project and ideas to life.


Tiago Ruão - Programmer
Júlio Coelho - Programmer
Filipe Machado - Programmer
Alzira Pacheco - Graphics Designer
Ana de Sousa - Graphics Designer

the technology we are using



Unity is a Game Engine, with full support for 2D and 3D game. It has a strong visual component that helps in the creation and development of the game. It allows development for PC, Mac, Linux, mobile platform and Web.

https://unity3d.com/



Mixamo is software for rigging and animation of characters. In a matter of seconds you can have any model full rigged and using a full pack of animations. It also has face-rigging and pre-made characters (Humanoids and animals).

https://www.mixamo.com/


RAIN is a Plugin for Unity, developed by RivalTheory. Its main purpose is simplifying the creation of Artificial intelligence with the use of Behavior trees. It allows any character to be fully controlled by an AI in minutes, for any game genre, be it a FPS, RTS, RPG you name it.  

http://rivaltheory.com/rain/


what are the funds for




what we need

As you know, a product intended for commercial purposes must meet legal requirements. This means that for a game to be publish or distributed, it needs to comply with these legal obligations. 

In order to accomplish these requirements we need your help! Licensing software is our next step as we have being developing the game with non-commercial licenses. Some of them are paid, even for non-commercial purposes. That is where we are standing.

Licensing software is our top priority. Commercial licenses are a big piece of this budget cake and without them one cannot publish this game nor future ones the way we are intended to.
At the same time, we want to improve many aspects of the game.


the goals

We are committed to develop the game as far as possible. The list below presents all the improvements we are willing to achieve, depending on the funding available.

           



Artificial Intelligence – improve the way how playable and non-playable characters behave in the game, programming them to be more action-oriented instead of reaction-oriented, giving them a more realistic feel. This is a key topic in the development.



Animations – improve animations to improve characters’ movements. In general, no one likes unsynchronized characters in games, we are no exception. We want to make our characters move smoothly and more accurate.




Scenarios - some maps will be at the dawn of the infection, others will be in a torn apocalyptic world. Expect a wide variety of landscapes, rural, industrial, urban, bridges, highways, secondary roads, and so on...





Characters – raise the amount of different playable and non-playable characters in order to avoid similarity among characters.

                                                                                                                                                           

                


Supporters – YES! That is our final goal. Build a community that can support our games and be critical about them and we are totally available to answer your questions and doubts as well as any questions about the development of the game. This game is being built for you, therefore your opinion matters!


                            


Join our communities at:


https://www.facebook.com/ArrowRoosterStudio

https://twitter.com/ArrowRooster

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd_MRSAmClaaLp5zwDEOahA

http://steamcommunity.com/id/ArrowRoosterStudio/

You can allways send an e-mail to:

arrowroosterstudio@gmail.com


what you get

If altruism does not make you happy enough, you will get a copy of Z-Horde, the amazing game where you have the chance to destroy mankind before it destroys itself. To see how you can contribute to this campaign, please take a look at the perks we have available for you.


                        


academic background

Our team is composed by 5 members, either graduated in Game Development Engineering or Graphics Design. This project started within the walls of an Academic institution, located in Portugal (Barcelos). We want to thank our teachers, which provided us the knowledge and the institution itself, IPCA, that allows us to have access to high tech facilities, providing us with high-end machines, sound recording  and motion capture rooms, inside the R&D building.


            

You can visit IPCA page in the link bellow:

http://www.ipca.pt/en/                    

the impact

We believe that games are a wonderful way to educate and entertain. We do strongly believe that entertainment is a crucial part in human development and happiness. Unfortunately, a game will not cease wars nor end poverty but it can make someone happy for a while. That is our goal. Making you happy for a while.

Your contributions and support will give us the resources we need to persevere in this task of going further and make better, in order to build momentum for future projects.

Thank you in advance,

Arrow Rooster Team

story:
12 year old Joseph is an aspiring chess champion and is in love with the game. Recently, he placed 3rd in his class (1200-1399) when he competed in the grade level chess nationals, and shows much potential.

There are upcoming out of state as well as in-state tournaments coming up in the near future, but we cannot afford both hotel accommodation/travel expenses, together with the registration fees. The next chess tournament is January 2-4th. There are three other chess tournaments state and nationals in Spring 2015, that also require hotel/travel expenses. Please help us in this venture so Joseph can compete and be part of these experiences.

story:
Follow the development of Prospect here on IndieDB, where there are regular updates including development news, media and downloads.

Latest Video


Preface

You are a Research Engineer aboard a large vessel named 'Aurora', with a crew of 130.  Aurora has been tasked with finding new worlds to colonize and develop, and one day she finds one.  This unknown planet showed some interesting scans, ship wrecks; many of them, too many to ignore.  Whilst in orbit, an unusual burst of energy comes from the planet and envelops the Aurora.  Aurora loses power, lights go off and the humming sound of the systems fade, Now without power and in a destabilizing orbit, the Aurora is lost and you find yourself boarding the nearest escape pod. You launch, you brace, and impact into the planet...

Gameplay

Your task is to explore the surface of the planet and find out what happened.  Ships have black boxes and logs for this very reason.  This unknown planets surface is a harsh environment; the atmosphere is toxic, the winds strong and the visibility is poor. 

Explore the environment, scavenge parts from other ships and pods.  You need to find a way off of this rock.  You'll need to find a supply of Food, Water and Oxygen; yours won't last forever.  As a research engineer, you know how to build and reverse engineer systems. Use this to your advantage. You're going to need this knowledge.

Research logs from each wreck provide you with an insight into the strange energy burst. What is it and how does it form?  Timing is everything, and those logs might just save your life.

Create a communications array, send a distress call and hope someone hears it.  Co-ordinate the rescue, set up beacons and make sure the energy burst doesn't hit the shuttle too,  You only get one chance.

Features

Prospect has planned features that you'd expect to see in a survival game and more, here's a short list.

- Beautifully crafted planetary environment.
- Inventory, Crafting and Reverse Engineering.
- Crafted items can dramatically change the way you view your surroundings, eg Scout Drones.
- Survival System; featuring Food, Water and Electricity & Oxygen.
- Dynamic Resources, scavenge from wrecks or find mineral deposits and mine them.

You build the tools, in turn the tools form your world.

Who am I?

Hi, I'm Chris and I'm a game developer.  I recently graduated from university, I studied Computer Games Design.  I have a great many skills, which is what makes this game a personal challenge more than anything.  I will be developing it alone.  I can 3D Model, Texture, Code and Write.  I have done for the past 5 years.

Portfolio: http://cbatihprogrammer.atspace.co.uk

I have always dreamt of making a game such as this, and until now, didn't have the skills to do so.  This is what makes this campaign special to me, giving life to an idea I've wanted to bring to life for many years.

I've already started development, sneak peek below (UI & Art subject to change):



You, the community can help me do this.

What do I need?

I'm hoping that you will help me raise £16,000 for 12 Months of development, I plan to reach Steam and Desura.  I aim to publish to PC, Mac and Linux.

I'm a hard-working developer, spending ungodly hours in-front of a screen and coding, much to the annoyance of my wife; but it's my passion, it's what I want to do, and I will do it.

The money will also go towards licencing and backer rewards.

Every single backer will receive their name in the credits and be a part of something extraordinary.  One man, creating one large-scale game, to fulfil a dream and allow you to share it with me. 

Risks & Challenges

With every development, there's going to be Risks and Challenges; the greatest for me is that I'm working alone; and you know what, I'm great under pressure.

Can't pledge, no problem!

Not everyone can pledge, but word-of-mouth is another great way to help me.  Know someone that loves sci-fi, go ahead, let them know about Prospect; just knowing that people could share this makes me happy.

- Thanks for reading, Chris.

story:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Target:                    For all ages and also family target.

Devices and OS:     It will be developed for tablets and                                 smartphones Android and Apple iOS.

"The babies" is an entertainment video game for all ages

The first ray of sunlight comes through the window, the baby wakes up and escapes from his crib because he is excited to start playing!

He's your baby and you'll have to take care of him, feed him, change him, wash him and play with him. If you are good enough, he'll become strong, handsome and, above all he will be happy.

You can customize your character in many different ways, choosing between a boy or a girl, changing his eyes color, hair style, skin type, dresses, accessories and much more.
In advanced levels of the game you'll be able to make him look like a "zombie", a "vampire", a "mummy" or dress him like a "fire-baby",  a “stone-baby ": your fantasy is the limit.

You can interact with him directly with your fingers and even tickle him.

He's able to repeat what you say in a variety of intonations and if you play some music he'll dance for you with your favorite dance moves. When you are happy with his performance you can record it on a video and share it with your friends.

We believe it's important that the game design contains educational issues for children and we'll create some mini-games with that purpose.

GAME DESIGN

Module 1: Take care of him!


This part of the game is the one with all the interactivity with your Baby. You'll have to address him properly to make him grow up happy. The game develops day by day so that you can't neglect of him because he needs eating, he needs to keep clean and more important he needs to play with you.

Leveling up, means spreading the opportunities to customize your character by accessing to new clothes, costumes and other elements that will make the game funnier and unique.

 

Module 2: Mini-games.

Here are several baby-related games. You'll play and collect stars and chocolate coins that will be traded for clothing, food, and other cool stuff. The mini-games will allow you to proceed over the game levels and unlock new game options.

These mini-games are: a Parachute Jump arcade game, a Dive under the ocean exploring game, a Fly in the outer space distressing game. Also we will make some cool card games with an educational aim because, as we said, we believe it's important to  include an educational role in games for kids.

SKYDIVING

UNDERWATER

SPACE

MEMORY CARDS

 

Module 3: Social Networks.

The game will integrate a live chat and an instant messaging module to share your experience with your friends.
You can record your voice and make the baby send your message for you to one of your contacts.

If you play some music he will dance and you will also be able to use his animations clips in different contexts.
Then you will share all of this with your friends over your favorite social networks.

 

Augmented Reality.

In a successive update we would like to implement augmented reality to integrate the Baby in real-time with your environment.

To make an example, if you play a song and make your Baby dance you can integrate him within a real scene with real persons using the camera of your device, record a video and create a live scene with a kind of choreography.

ART DESIGN

3D Model

                          

                                   Baby concept

                         

                              Baby model

                     

                              Baby colour  

        Baby render

Some Props

 

 

 

 

 

Lighting and texture tests.

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 1 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 1 -.

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 2 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 2-.

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 5 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 5 -.

 

DEVELOPMENT

We need four months to produce it, we will develop 3D animations, modeling accessories, and refining the final style to reach the goal to be high quality and modern.

We will keep you aware about the production process through our:

Website: http://psychstudio.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thebabiesvideogame

Tumblr: http://thebabiesvideogame.tumblr.com

 

We will really appreciate so much any comment and contribution to “The Babies”.

We think about transmedia project (focused on various media). Depending on the success of the game, we will expand the product in terms of versions, different formats for other platforms, merchandising, etc.
Our "backers" will remain taking profit of discounts and special offers for all of it.

 

MOTIVATION

After years of hard work involved in the 3D world, one day, we started talking about our own projects we had in mind. As much older we are, the more interested in own authorship and not from other ones creations.

We always have been passionate about audiovisual entertainment and we decided to get together to pool all our ideas.  After meetings ... meetings ... and more meetings ... Artilusion Studios (Barcelona)

Artilusion Studios and 3Val Studio are fundamental companies for us to be able to create our entertainment creative projects.

 

WHY US?

Artilusion Studios are composed of very experienced professionals in the audiovisual sector.

 Create and develop our own ideas is just the first step to control, enjoy and live of our own products.

We are passionate about our work, we believe blindly in what we do, and that’s the thing that adds the added value needed to produce high quality ideas and creations that can succeed with international impact.

 

THE TEAM

Javier de Manuel

Art and 3d animation

Creator of "The Babies". He has been working as 3D animator for 6 years.
He has participated in animation films like:
“Cher Ami”
“La Tropa de Trapo”

And also in animated series as:
“Asha”
“Lila”

 

Franc Vila

Technical Director

Wide experience in broadcasting, 3D animation and IT.

He has participated in:

 “L’illa del far”(Line Producer): TV3 Production

“Split/Second”(3D Art and 3D animation): Videogame for smartphone and tablet. Walt Disney and Digital Legends Entertainment production.

"Catalonia, Terra de Tots. Les Tres Bessones a la Catalunya Real”(3d Coordinator): Generalitat de Catalunya and Cromosoma production.

“Redes”(3D animation): TVE Production

 

Erik Podetti

Game designer and programmer

Experience in the field of IT and consulting gamification projects.

He has participated in:

 “Desafío Champions”: Kotoc

Bios Management: IT Consulting.

Seac02: Investigation and Software development.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have and experienced team developing this videogame that are sure there is no similar baby games with our art&animation quality.

Although We have done more than 60% we really need your help to finish it because there things like music, art design and others that we have to afford.
If you help us, it will be the push to be able to fulfill our deadlines and also if we get more funds than expected we are going to create more scenarios (park, school, etc), more mini-games, more characters, better Augmented Reality etc.

For example We would like to create an orchard were you could plant vegetables, cereals, fruits etc.

We could even create a pet for your Baby and many other things like this

 

Your contribution will be dedicated to:

1)      Programming

2)      Unity Pro license.

3)      Menus design.

4)      Music.

5)      Translations.

 

FAQ

Q: Will the game be free or paid?

A: There will be two versions: One Free Version and one Premium Version.
In both versions you will have a base set of objects to dress your baby, if you want to play with more varied stuff you will have to play The Babies Minigames to get chocolate coins and exchange them for objects you would like to play with.

The Premium Version will not have any advertising.

 

Q: How can I unblock all game’s content?

A: As we told you before, you have the way to play minigames to get the possibility to access game objects, but you will also be able to buy what you need.
Note that there will be some quality stuff that the only manner to use it will be in higher levels of the game. For example: Rock Baby, Zombie Baby, Mummy Baby etc.

 

Q: Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

A: Yes.
If you donate an additional amount to bring you up to another tier level, you will receive everything in that tier as well as all of the tier prizes below.
Leave information about it in the comments and we will confirm that everything is all right.

 

Q: Can I change color to my objects?

A: Yes.

You can change the color of all your objects, hair, skin and eyes.

 

Q: What are you doing with funds?

A: We will buy some software licences as Unity Pro. We also will spend money in music, graphic design, programmers etc.

If we get more than expected we want to invest it in more scenarios, more minigames and better augmented reallity.
story_txt:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Target:                    For all ages and also family target.

Devices and OS:     It will be developed for tablets and                                 smartphones Android and Apple iOS.
"The babies" is an entertainment video game for all ages
The first ray of sunlight comes through the window, the baby wakes up and escapes from his crib because he is excited to start playing!
He's your baby and you'll have to take care of him, feed him, change him, wash him and play with him. If you are good enough, he'll become strong, handsome and, above all he will be happy.
You can customize your character in many different ways, choosing between a boy or a girl, changing his eyes color, hair style, skin type, dresses, accessories and much more. In advanced levels of the game you'll be able to make him look like a "zombie", a "vampire", a "mummy" or dress him like a "fire-baby",  a “stone-baby ": your fantasy is the limit.
You can interact with him directly with your fingers and even tickle him.
He's able to repeat what you say in a variety of intonations and if you play some music he'll dance for you with your favorite dance moves. When you are happy with his performance you can record it on a video and share it with your friends.
We believe it's important that the game design contains educational issues for children and we'll create some mini-games with that purpose.

GAME DESIGN
Module 1: Take care of him!
 This part of the game is the one with all the interactivity with your Baby. You'll have to address him properly to make him grow up happy. The game develops day by day so that you can't neglect of him because he needs eating, he needs to keep clean and more important he needs to play with you.
Leveling up, means spreading the opportunities to customize your character by accessing to new clothes, costumes and other elements that will make the game funnier and unique.
  
Module 2: Mini-games.
Here are several baby-related games. You'll play and collect stars and chocolate coins that will be traded for clothing, food, and other cool stuff. The mini-games will allow you to proceed over the game levels and unlock new game options.
These mini-games are: a Parachute Jump arcade game, a Dive under the ocean exploring game, a Fly in the outer space distressing game. Also we will make some cool card games with an educational aim because, as we said, we believe it's important to  include an educational role in games for kids.

SKYDIVING

UNDERWATER

SPACE

MEMORY CARDS
 
Module 3: Social Networks.
The game will integrate a live chat and an instant messaging module to share your experience with your friends. You can record your voice and make the baby send your message for you to one of your contacts.
If you play some music he will dance and you will also be able to use his animations clips in different contexts. Then you will share all of this with your friends over your favorite social networks.
 
Augmented Reality.
In a successive update we would like to implement augmented reality to integrate the Baby in real-time with your environment.
To make an example, if you play a song and make your Baby dance you can integrate him within a real scene with real persons using the camera of your device, record a video and create a live scene with a kind of choreography.
ART DESIGN
3D Model
                           
                                   Baby concept
                         
                              Baby model
                     
                              Baby colour  

        Baby render
Some Props

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 1 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 1 -.

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 2 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 2-.

First test of color and lighting of Kinematics. - Camera 5 -.

Final design of Kinematics. - Camera 5 -.
 
DEVELOPMENT
We need four months to produce it, we will develop 3D animations, modeling accessories, and refining the final style to reach the goal to be high quality and modern.
We will keep you aware about the production process through our:
Website: http://psychstudio.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thebabiesvideogame

story:
FEEDBACK & PROJECT FORM

FAQ at bottom of the page Please read! Video is not final game look. Help us make it better give use feedback!

News & Updates: Considering this legal advice; Questria: Princess Destiny will now employ humor and make commentary based on the brony culture and My Little Pony to be considered under Fair Use. This would thrust the game into the same level of commentary that you have been accustomed to with Spaceballs, Garbage Pail Kids, Mad Magazine and EgoRaptor cartoons.

The project is very near funding end, final funding cost it is still possible! That said, alternatives to fully funded project will be discussed once the project expires;   will want to hear from all of you on how to proceed forward on future projects.

You can read more on this decision here 

http://questriadestiny.tumblr.com/post/58541451878/many-of-you-may-be-wondering-why-things-have-been

Or here 

http://questria.com/?p=88


 

For those who hate fun: Questria: Princess Destiny is Life Simulation Game for all age groups. Similar to the Princess Maker series; Princess Destiny will immerse you in the hectic world of growing up as a princess in waiting in a magical kingdom. With 60 Ending variations, character customisation as well as accommodating various play styles, Questria: Princess Destiny will surely satisfy many tastes. The game is PG (About the same entry level you would let your kid watch Who Framed Roger Rabbit)

We have spent tons of time and effort on crafting this game and with your pledges and our hard work we can bring the game to you and the rest of the world.

The game breaks up into 2 major components. Increasing your stats through daily activities and interacting socially with the residents of Questria. Discover how well you did and what you eventually become on your 20th birthday.

In case you weren’t paying attention: You do not directly control the main character in Questria: Princess Destiny. Instead you play as Sirelestia, ruler of Questria; you enact policies and decrees to help guide the princess-in-waiting’s choices. If you are too soft she’ll become lazy and belligerent. If you are too hard she’ll become resentful and perhaps even run away! (from your lame-ass)

Supergamedev is proud present Questria: Princess Destiny as its first official game. A collaboration of talented folks including game designers, artists, coders and sound engineers who’ve come together to create a truly lovable and endearing experience.

If you don’t have the funds to help out the project you can always share and announce it to others. A grass-roots campaign will really help push the games final deliverable to where we all want it to be!

This project is set to flexible funding. If we do not hit the 60k goal we will collect and use all funds collected to compensate those who worked on the demo. We will then collaborate with all supporters to get better direction on re-launching or redirecting the project.

 

 

FAQ

Q:What happens to my money if the project fails?
A:If we don't achieve our base goal of 60k, we'll most likely contact all supporters and discuss options. The most likely option is to take the engine, the content and build a much simpler game that can better fit into the support funds. An other option is to rebuild a new demo and pitch again as game variation or a new one (and maintain your support level). You will be part of this process. 

Q: Will this be okay for "insert age group"
A: If you are comfortable with "The Spice Girls" you will be comfortable with this game.

Q: Can I get a refund?
A: Absolutely. As soon as the project expires anyone who wants a refund can get one no questions asked!

Q: Is this how the game will look?
A: Video content is not final! We are very interested in working with supporters for the final look!
