story:
What is PLEASE STAY CALM?

Hello, we're Massive Damage, the team behind the hit iPhone and Android zombie apocalypse game, Please Stay Calm!

Everyone who's played Please Stay Calm loves our take on zombies and our kickass artwork so we figured that this would be a fun way to introduce our unique, satirical vision of the zombie apocalypse to more people worldwide.

We are using Indigogo to help raise some funding to finish off the amazing card designs that we've started and help pay for the printing costs.  Success in this campaign will also give us an opportunity to get working on further cool Please Stay Calm related stuff like board games, graphic novels and hopefully miniatures!

Add Zombies to Your Poker Nights!

We are looking for immediate funding to get these high quality cards printed. Each card is lovingly designed by our artist Ive Bastrash.

Our supporters will be the first to get the decks!

The cards are class bicycle playing card stock (Four colour, linen embossed finish, plastic coated paper), great for poker, magic tricks, anything!  Here's what they will look like:

Here's a description of each perk:

Perk: Basic Survivor Pack

1 deck of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards!

 

 

Perk: Survivor Essentials 2-Pack

2 decks of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards! 

 

 

Perk: Lone Wanderer 4-Pack

 4 decks of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards!

 

NEW PERK!  CUSTOM AVATAR + 2 DECKS

  

You'll get ONE custom thumbnail avatar at 200x200 pixels.  You can specify background colour and weapon of choice!

Or you can elect for a zombie avatar if you're inclined!



2 decks of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards! 

 

 

 

Perk: I AM A ZOMBIE!

One Signed Custom Portrait of YOU as a ZOMBIE! (Example above)
Both a High Resolution Digital copy and a Beautiful Print on 8.5" x 11" Premium Paper included!

  

4 decks of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards!

 

 

 

Perk: I AM A SURVIVOR!

One Signed Custom Portrait of YOU as a Zombie Slayer!  (Example above)
*Our lucky survivor model is Lauren from FreshWaterPenguin (http://www.etsy.com/shop/FreshwaterPenguin)


Both a High Resolution Digital copy and a Beautiful Print on 8.5" x 11" Premium Paper included!

4 decks of High Quality Zombie Apocalypse Playing Cards!

 

 

 

Please Help Spread The Word!

Tweet

Download Please Stay Calm for iPhone or Android

Follow us on Facebook.com/PleaseStayCalm for more zombie fun!

story:
Hello Indiegogo!

Meet Zepeel: a mobile app for iOS that uses video profiles, video messaging and a video storyboard to connect singles.

About Us:


I’m Steve Szikszay, founder and CEO of Zepeel.  I have an MBA and have spent over 10 years in the online dating space trying to completely understand and perfect how singles meet online. I also wrote an applied project and researched this topic in depth.  And now Zepeel has been born out of my experiences and research.

I’m David Billson, CIO at Zepeel and President at rtraction.  My software firm rtraction has a strategic alliance with Zepeel.  I have been in the software development business for over 20 years and believe this app will be a game changer for the online dating industry.

And I’m Josh Dow, Software Specialist at Zepeel and VP of Quality Assurance at rtraction.  Nothing goes live unless it goes through me and my detailed eyes.  So you can be certain only the best quality designs and app functions reach our members.

Together with our team members we are trying to change the online dating landscape through our new mobile video app, Zepeel.

About the App:

Each user is encouraged to record a brief video introduction.  Unlike photos, videos are fool-proof: real and up-to-date. You can actually hear as well as see exactly what the person will be like.  We’ve recently added different video categories for style, interest and daily updates, so you can get an even better understanding of a person.  We’ve also added a proximity feature, so you can see who is close by and our search function makes it simple to filter people by city or region.

Zepeel makes it simpler and safer than ever for you to browse, choose and message someone of your interest. We want to completely transform the online dating industry into a genuine and legitimate place.  With Zepeel, it’s easier and quicker than ever to detect who you feel a strong connection to.  By creating this safe and open virtual platform, we make meeting new people easier than ever.  

We Need Your Help:

To make our vision a reality, we need your help. Your funding will help create the needed exposure and subtle enhancements to make Zepeel a hit with singles.  It will spread awareness of Zepeel, a virtual place where people can feel safe and accepted.  The funds will be spent on development ($12,500) and marketing ($12,500).  This will give us an additional 250 hours to code some new features.  It will also give us 6 months of mobile banner advertising to populate more members in key cities.

If we do not reach our goal, the funds we receive will be divided equally and spent on development and marketing.  Our app is built, solid and in the market therefore the funds are now to enhance and create exposure.

How Zepeel Will Make a Difference:

If you are single this is a valuable app for you.  Once we gain traffic you will be able to find some to date through your video profile.  Our process will save you time and money.  Also if you are a programmer or designer you will know the hours that have gone into creating an app like ours and we are looking for your support.

We have a strategic alliance with a great software firm that has been in the business for over 15 years and back Zepeel 100% with support, maintenance and hosting.   

Our app is as real as it gets in this space.  A person cannot airbrush or photo shop a video.  You will be able to hear how they speak and their demeanor from their profile video, their clothing style and body type from their style video, their most recent experience from their status video, an activity they love to do from their activity video and a favorite or interesting video from YouTube from their interest video. 

If you think online dating deserves a clean slate, please support a great app and let's change online dating forever. You can check out the app for free on the App Store https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zepeel/id572057627?ls=1&mt=8 and leave a review of what you think.  Please share our campaign and help us revolutionize the way singles meet online. 

Thank you - we sincerely appreciate your contribution.  

Steve, David, Josh
And the Zepeel Team

 

Zepeel News Articles

Trend Hunter Tech: http://www.trendhunter.com/trends/matchmaking-apps

Global Dating Insights: http://www.globaldatinginsights.com/13092013-new-video-chat-dating-app-zepeel-released

MaRS: http://marscommons.marsdd.com/startupsblog/zepeels-welcoming-into-the-world

About the App:




Each user is encouraged to record a brief video introduction.  Unlike photos, videos are fool-proof: real and up-to-date. You can actually hear as well as see exactly what the person will be like.  We’ve recently added different video categories for style, interest and daily updates, so you can get an even better understanding of a person.  We’ve also added a proximity feature, so you can see who is close by and our search function makes it simple to filter people by city or region.

Zepeel makes it simpler and safer than ever for you to browse, choose and message someone of your interest. We want to completely transform the online dating industry into a genuine and legitimate place.  With Zepeel, it’s easier and quicker than ever to detect who you feel a strong connection to.  By creating this safe and open virtual platform, we make meeting new people easier than ever.   
We Need Your Help:
To make our vision a reality, we need your help. Your funding will help create the needed exposure and subtle enhancements to make Zepeel a hit with singles.  It will spread awareness of Zepeel, a virtual place where people can feel safe and accepted.  The funds will be spent on development ($12,500) and marketing ($12,500).  This will give us an additional 250 hours to code some new features.  It will also give us 6 months of mobile banner advertising to populate more members in key cities.
If we do not reach our goal, the funds we receive will be divided equally and spent on development and marketing.  Our app is built, solid and in the market therefore the funds are now to enhance and create exposure.
How Zepeel Will Make a Difference:





If you are single this is a valuable app for you.  Once we gain traffic you will be able to find some to date through your video profile.  Our process will save you time and money.  Also if you are a programmer or designer you will know the hours that have gone into creating an app like ours and we are looking for your support.
We have a strategic alliance with a great software firm that has been in the business for over 15 years and back Zepeel 100% with support, maintenance and hosting.    
Our app is as real as it gets in this space.  A person cannot airbrush or photo shop a video.  You will be able to hear how they speak and their demeanor from their profile video, their clothing style and body type from their style video, their most recent experience from their status video, an activity they love to do from their activity video and a favorite or interesting video from YouTube from their interest video.  
If you think online dating deserves a clean slate, please support a great app and let's change online dating forever. You can check out the app for free on the App Store https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zepeel/id572057627?ls=1&mt=8 and leave a review of what you think.  Please share our campaign and help us revolutionize the way singles meet online. 
Thank you - we sincerely appreciate your contribution.   
Steve, David, JoshAnd the Zepeel Team
 
Zepeel News Articles
Trend Hunter Tech: http://www.trendhunter.com/trends/matchmaking-apps
Global Dating Insights: http://www.globaldatinginsights.com/13092013-new-video-chat-dating-app-zepeel-released
MaRS: http://marscommons.marsdd.com/startupsblog/zepeels-welcoming-into-the-world

story:
A true game changer

The newest specialised simulator games might seem hip with their lack of gameplay, story, characters or sanity but they are seriously flawed. They don't have enough replayability or true open sandbox feeling (not even that Sandbox Simulator garbage...).

We decided to create the one true simulator where the phrase "The only limit is your imagination" is not just some marketing lie but the real core element. Our great game, the Empty Space Simulator 2014 will let you use your imagination to the fullest of its potential or even beyond!

With Empty Space Simulator 2014 nothing gets in the way of your imagination! you can imagine your own character(s), NPCs, enemies, scenery, missions, endgame content or even the achievements. With proper experience (80-90 hours by our experts calculations) you'll be able to use your imagination outside of the game just by staring at walls or closing your eyes.

The tutorial can be useful after all the hand-holding of modern games, but can be skipped if you ever read a book and enjoyed it

Outstanding features

We are sure the general idea is enough for your generous support but here are some real industry-unique features just to brag about them.

  • Seamless gameplay without any on screen info or even start menu, so nothing breaks your fun.
  • Co-op with Skype, mobile or landline support.
  • Free DLC in the future, no Season Pass needed ever.
  • Acorns you knock down from trees can grow into trees. Honest.
  • Real roguelike: no save game!
  • Play on your displays native resolution with very low minimum requirement.
  • Your parents won't be scared that this game makes you a serial killer (but might force you to take a drug test).

Our endgame possibilities is virtually endless

    Extended goals

    While the project is grandiose as it is, we have even more ideas for an even perfecter game. Of course we need more support to work on those.

    • 250 000 EUR: White version of emptiness for a little positive spin and diversity
    • 500 000 EUR: 4K resolution for the real hipster early adopters. Minimum requirements might change for both PC and brain
    • 1 000 000 EUR: Streaming support

    Other ways you can help

    Ask all your friend to support us. Share this page. Do not try to rip of this great idea or use your imagination without our game. Seriously, please.

story:
What do you think of when you remember your first mobile phone? Mine was a Nokia 5110, and my most vivid memories of using it have nothing to do with making phone calls. I spent far more time playing Snake. For much of my teen life, my mind was in two places at once: part of me was stood in the rain waiting for a bus home from school, and part of me was in a confined space with a restless serpent. It kept on growing, and kept on moving, all the while threatening to consume itself if it didn’t find some free space to roam.

This book is about the historical meaning of those moments. It is a history of games as personal unfolding labyrinths, co-created in the relationship between humans and technology.

Short Summary

Update: essays and oral history interviews are linked from the activity page!

I'm a historian of games. For the past couple of years I've been working independently, outside of the academy on self-published projects and on pieces commissioned by gaming magazines, as well as organising and speaking at games-related conferences. I'm proud of the work I do, and I've been thinking about how to get closer to being the kind of historian that I'd like to see in the world.

I've realised that I would benefit a lot from the supervision of specialists in science and technology studies. Navigating complex stories about people and computers isn't easy, so I'm seeking guidance from people who have spent their careers theorising the complex relationships between humans and non-humans in different times and places.

To get that supervision, and to help put my work in a larger context, I'm about to start a part-time, distance-learning PhD at the University of Lancaster (UK) in the Sociology department. There isn't much funding available for this kind of PhD, but blessedly, the tuition fees are just £1998/year. That gives me enough room to be a little bit creative.

This crowdfunding campaign is to cover at least one year's tuition fees. Ultimately, I want my PhD to be about mobile, social and indie games from the late nineties to the late noughties. This book is part one. For more information about the academic side of things, you can check out the documents below:

Personal Statement
Research proposal

What I Need & What You Get

  • I'm going to write my first two years' part-time research into a book. By backing this project, you are pre-ordering a copy of the book, and helping me to pay my tuition fees.
  • As a part-time student, the first year's tuition fees are £1998. I need to raise enough money to pay for at least this first year.
  • Print on demand comes at a bit of a premium. I'm anticipating printing and service costs to take up an average of 48p for every £1 that you spend. This is based on the figures for my existing book, Dreamcast Worlds. 
  • That means I need to raise at least £3400.
  • The book will take around two years to complete, but in the meantime you'll get regular updates and extracts.

Risks & Challenges

I've crowdfunded and completed a book based on my academic research before. Dreamcast Worlds took about two years to complete; the initial master's thesis took one year, and then after crowdfunding I spent a year expanding and rewriting it.

I'm expecting this project to have a similar scope to Dreamcast Worlds, and therefore my hope is that it will be finished by Autumn 2016. In the meantime, you'll get regular updates from me, with extracts from the work in progress.

Having said that, there are risks associated with this project. It's not at all normal to fund a PhD this way, and my hope to break the PhD into three parts doesn't align perfectly with the normal timeline that PhD students follow at Lancaster. It's possible that the timeline will have to change, either because of advice from the university or because of my own sense of how the research is going. I'll keep you informed about how this is going.

    Credentials

    Author or editor:

    • Dreamcast Worlds: a design history
    • Memory Insufficient: a games history ezine
    • Delay: paying attention to energy mechanics

    Freelance writer:

    • Contributor at magazines Hyper (Australia) and Comics and Gaming (Canada)
    • Deputy Editor at Gamesbrief
    • I've also written for The Borderhouse, Pocketgamer and others.

    Conferences:

    • Founder/Organiser of Critical Proximity Conference
    • Co-organiser of Queerness and Games Conference
    • I've presented or run workshops at GaymerX, GDC, DiGRA, and others.

    Can't give money?

    One of the best things about crowdfunding Dreamcast Worlds was having access to a small group of readers who were passionate about the subject I was researching. I was able to reach out and ask for perspectives and advice, and people taught me things that I still think about to this day. Even if you can't afford the lowest tier of this crowdfund, I'd really love to add you to my mailing list. Either donate £1, or just get in touch and I'll add you manually when the campaign is over.

    (The project image is a cropped and recoloured version of a creative commons image by Arvid Rudling)

story:
"Chaos dwarf is a tricky team, it has everything you need to play Fantasy football : 6 dwarf blockers make an strong defense line, a gorgeous Minotaur, 2 fast bullcentaurs and cheap hobgoblins. Add to the mix you can mutate with them and there is no team you can't defeat with them"

ABOUT US

Willy-Miniatures is a small company producing high quality miniatures for fantasy football and other miniature games. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams.
You can see our full catalogue and contact us here
http://willy-miniatures.blogspot.com.es/

Chaos Dwarf team is designed and sculpted by Sergus.
You can see more of his work
http://el-vademecum.blogspot.com.es/

WHY CROWDFUNDING ... AGAIN ? And AGAIN?

We had an amazing experience with our late campaigns, shorten the time to cast former teams in a incredible way. In addition, all our former campaigns founders are 100% satisfied with our service due to the fact that we care about communication with our customers, quick shipping, quality of our miniatures and best price possible. We still need you to rise funds, that helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures, obtain feedback from you and it gives us confidence to keep working on. You are essential, YOU make this team a reality.

GREAT MINIATURES FOR A GREAT TEAM

Staff (add-ons)



Miniatures will be casted in white metal.
She- Dwarf is a Indiegogo EXCLUSIVE miniature that can be exchanged for a Willy-coin. Below is explain how you can earn Willy-coins.

How do I can support this campaign?

Willy-coins (The more support, the more freebies)

story:
BIG THANKS TO : Honza Procházka

CLICK ON THIS :


If you cannot open the .swf file, you can simply move it to the place, where you write URL adresses of webs. It opens without Flash Player!



Why do we play games? The reason is simple, games are the funniest and most widely used method of interactive entertainment. For our generation, this is an excessivly used method to enjoy ourselves. In our age, every child that played at least one game dreamt about creating their own. We are beginning to fulfill this dream - and when it comes to interactivity directly in our game, we introduce new and creative methods of interactivity. Do not expect a perfect game without flaws, but an independent experimental project. So - boil a cup of coffee, sit down and think twice if you entrust us your money and we will try our hardest to reward you for doing so.

Kopula is not a game. It is only a half of the game, the second half (The Cube) we will create later. Why is it that we show you the concept of only a half of the game? Because half of the game is the game itself. We will try to explain it. Choose any game and divide it into 2 parts. Both part seem as absolutely different games, but everything is connected seamlessly. Does it seem impossible? Maybe. And therefore, we want to make it possible! We are creating a new kind of interactivity. The game we are making is very similar, yet very different.

Kopula is a 2D point-and-click survival adventure, where you have to find out how to get rid of the virus in a robot called BA-ET, who is also the protagonist. The story is taking part in two cities and the countryside around. In this way, the game will be divided into three basic color palletes and playable units. The first unit will be quantit city (Gron), where they are incurred. Basic color distribution will be black/red. Pure survival gameplay (you can die... almost everywhere). Another place will be the nature. Black stays (like everywehre else) and there will be green instead of red. The gameplay in the nature will be based on your perception. The last place will be kind of quality city (Urubnia) where the black mixes with blue. In this part you will need to think logically (there will be lots of puzzles around). We assume that the game will have 5-10 story levels,  if all goes according to plan. The game should have 5+ hours of game time.

As i have already said, the game will work mainly with black color. Black is the basis of everything in this game; items, characters, everything will be black and the contrast will create just the background and effects. And subtitles of course, will be white. For the items, we chose to be minimalistic. Therefore, do not expect perfectly sculpted and detailed items, the graphics won’t look godlike (yet). The graphic style is related to the level design.

Each level will contain several rooms. Each room will have an edgy, colored background with black walls interactive objects will break the aesthetics of the room (look at the picture in section Future, there is a room showcasing the effect). We have divided items into two categories. The main items, that are required to solve the puzzle in the room, and the side items, which will create effects in the background, so the room doesn’t feel so empty. When you finish the room, you move to the next room, which is usually harder and more complicated than the previous. When you finish all of them, on to the next level you go!


You can collect letters and objects, that will inform you about the world, achievement hunters won’t go empty-handed either, the arms of a robot are in your hands. The game is literally stuffed with achievements, as well as easter eggs. Letters will also contain codes for bonus levels and some texts with pictures. The bonus level will be closely related to the topic. In some letters you will also find cure against antiviruses in the robot’s body. But now we get to the basic principle on which our game works. It's the best for last.

Viruses in your body will attack by different means and functions, trying to sabotage the you in the nastiest way possible. Antivirus will be necessary to have the virus expelled from the system. Here is an example. If the puzzle of the room you are in is sight oriented, the viruses will try to hinder your sight, if you need sounds, your hearing sensors will be the target. While it may not exactly seem 4D, it will be made so you feel every change in BA-AT’s perception to the fullest possible extent.

 + Special graphic style combination of black and shades.

 + Interactive gameplay and restrictive virus attack.

 + Several specific music genres.

 + Help bar with main and secondary tasks and Ba-et's feelings.

 + A lot of (brutal) achievements...

 + Easter eggs.

 + Special and bonus levels.

 + Interesting minigames and puzzles.

 + Interactive environment.

 + Billions and billions of humorous and trolling subtitles/texts.

 + Probably interesting dubbing (in Czech and English).

 + A lot of other features that will be announced soon!

Sounds are another part of the game. We especially focused on sound effects. There will be none. Say goodbye to sounds as you know them, every single one will be portrayed via musical instruments. Dripping water? How about a soft, jazzy piano? Explosion? More like dubstep bass. We tried to reach out to the gamers that like challenge, but also those, who enjoy unique design. We tried to mix multiple music genres together, so they will not make your heads explode, and also not to feel repetitive. You won’t hear the same music twice, and no sound will sound as you would expect it to.



And one more important thing. Music in our game feels robotic. It's just a Kopula "style", so do not expect orchestral machine will play orchestral music etc. Just experimental Kopula. M'kay?


After Kopula, we will go on to make the second game of the Linked Pack project, The Cube. We said that we want to make an interactive game, and we decided to split it into two parts. We’re gonna finish the second part, and hop onto next stuff, we would like to make a project every half a year or so. We’re trying to set a solid ground in the gaming industry, and make games that people want based on feedback given by the fanbase. We want to stay independent and true to the core, keeping the games we make likable and wanted. For us, it is a dream we want to realize, and we want you to live it with us.

And who are we exactly? We’re just two guys working on the Linked Pack project, trying to break through. Dominik “DarknesS” Gottwald (design, sound and somewhat of a moneygrabber). Art student, has done some projects previously, so he’s no stranger. DarknesS is a great, capable, dependent-ish person. The second fellow is Jakub "Kubeeš" Profota (graphics designer, script writer and a madman). High school student. This is his debut in the industry, so he hopes to shine. Kubeeš is the kind of guy who works only when he wants to, but when he does, he gets the job done. DomBee Softworks was estabilished in late 2013, and since that time were thinking about the project we wanted to create. Since Kubeeš is well versed in Flash scripting, we decided to utilize it in the game. We’ve been working on Kopula since February 2014. That is all you need to know about us for now, we would like our games to speak on our behalf.


What happens if we get more money than we ask for? The game will take a turn for the better. The main stretch goal is 500 dollars. If we get this amount, the game will be finished in a years time. We will also make a webpage and a domain, and invest more time in social networking to listen to your feedback. We will also put some money to advertising, and turn to Steam Greenlight if everything goes smoothly.

 The main stretch, will be used for everything listed above, the game will be finished as intended.

 For a 1000 dollars we will finish the second part of the Linked Pact, The Cube, without delay. We will also design Kopula for Android and iOS, and make custom mouse cursors for PC!

 If we get here, the quality will rise tenfold. The game will be much more detailed and polished, we will get singers for the music to add variety, try to enhance the experience as much as we can. And don’t get us started about The Cube. The concept is still in diapers, so to speak, but this could lead to something much bigger than we intended.

Kopula can react in two impressions - art or madness. For me, it's a lifestyle... this experiment is the epitome of art. I am very happy to be associated with the development of Kopula. And i hope that you will help us... After all, you have nothing to lose.

-Dominik "DarknesS" Gottwald


This isn't a perfect game. This isn't a game without mistakes. This is only our dream. Independent dream, with new experimental elements. But this experiment needs your help - please, help us and you will be a part of this for ages...

-Jakub "Kubeeš" Profota

             ...thanks to Zbyněk  for translate! We are gratefull to you...

                   

          ...we´ll make another mails after we get a lot of money for it...

  • How many will it cost?
  •    It will cost 3 dolars. This project is not about earnings... It is about building a community. It is for players... :)
  • When will we create a website ?
  •    The website will be out 2 weeks after the end of this campaign. URL of the website will be www.dombee.cz. 
  • When will Kopula see the light of the world?
  •    Kopula will come out in 2015. Stay tuned on sites (writed below) for more informations.
  • When will I receive perks from my payment?
  •    As soon as it is possible. More complicated perks like comics, paper models, digital books etc. will be sent a little later.

The first unit will be quantit city (Gron), where they are incurred. Basic color distribution will be black/red. Pure survival gameplay (you can die... almost everywhere). Another place will be the nature. Black stays (like everywehre else) and there will be green instead of red. The gameplay in the nature will be based on your perception. The last place will be kind of quality city (Urubnia) where the black mixes with blue. In this part you will need to think logically (there will be lots of puzzles around). We assume that the game will have 5-10 story levels,  if all goes according to plan. The game should have 5+ hours of game time.As i have already said, the game will work mainly with black color. Black is the basis of everything in this game; items, characters, everything will be black and the contrast will create just the background and effects. And subtitles of course, will be white. For the items, we chose to be minimalistic. Therefore, do not expect perfectly sculpted and detailed items, the graphics won’t look godlike (yet). The graphic style is related to the level design.Each level will contain several rooms. Each room will have an edgy, colored background with black walls interactive objects will break the aesthetics of the room (look at the picture in section Future, there is a room showcasing the effect). We have divided items into two categories. The main items, that are required to solve the puzzle in the room, and the side items, which will create effects in the background, so the room doesn’t feel so empty. When you finish the room, you move to the next room, which is usually harder and more complicated than the previous. When you finish all of them, on to the next level you go!You can collect letters and objects, that will inform you about the world, achievement hunters won’t go empty-handed either, the arms of a robot are in your hands. The game is literally stuffed with achievements, as well as easter eggs. Letters will also contain codes for bonus levels and some texts with pictures. The bonus level will be closely related to the topic. In some letters you will also find cure against antiviruses in the robot’s body. But now we get to the basic principle on which our game works. It's the best for last.Viruses in your body will attack by different means and functions, trying to sabotage the you in the nastiest way possible. Antivirus will be necessary to have the virus expelled from the system. Here is an example. If the puzzle of the room you are in is sight oriented, the viruses will try to hinder your sight, if you need sounds, your hearing sensors will be the target. While it may not exactly seem 4D, it will be made so you feel every change in BA-AT’s perception to the fullest possible extent. + Special graphic style combination of black and shades. + Interactive gameplay and restrictive virus attack. + Several specific music genres. + Help bar with main and secondary tasks and Ba-et's feelings. + A lot of (brutal) achievements... + Easter eggs. + Special and bonus levels. + Interesting minigames and puzzles. + Interactive environment. + Billions and billions of humorous and trolling subtitles/texts. + Probably interesting dubbing (in Czech and English). + A lot of other features that will be announced soon!Sounds are another part of the game. We especially focused on sound effects. There will be none. Say goodbye to sounds as you know them, every single one will be portrayed via musical instruments. Dripping water? How about a soft, jazzy piano? Explosion? More like dubstep bass. We tried to reach out to the gamers that like challenge, but also those, who enjoy unique design. We tried to mix multiple music genres together, so they will not make your heads explode, and also not to feel repetitive. You won’t hear the same music twice, and no sound will sound as you would expect it to.And one more important thing. Music in our game feels robotic. It's just a Kopula "style", so do not expect orchestral machine will play orchestral music etc. Just experimental Kopula. M'kay?After Kopula, we will go on to make the second game of the Linked Pack project, The Cube. We said that we want to make an interactive game, and we decided to split it into two parts. We’re gonna finish the second part, and hop onto next stuff, we would like to make a project every half a year or so. We’re trying to set a solid ground in the gaming industry, and make games that people want based on feedback given by the fanbase. We want to stay independent and true to the core, keeping the games we make likable and wanted. For us, it is a dream we want to realize, and we want you to live it with us.And who are we exactly? We’re just two guys working on the Linked Pack project, trying to break through. Dominik “DarknesS” Gottwald (design, sound and somewhat of a moneygrabber). Art student, has done some projects previously, so he’s no stranger. DarknesS is a great, capable, dependent-ish person. The second fellow is Jakub "Kubeeš" Profota (graphics designer, script writer and a madman). High school student. This is his debut in the industry, so he hopes to shine. Kubeeš is the kind of guy who works only when he wants to, but when he does, he gets the job done. DomBee Softworks was estabilished in late 2013, and since that time were thinking about the project we wanted to create. Since Kubeeš is well versed in Flash scripting, we decided to utilize it in the game. We’ve been working on Kopula since February 2014. That is all you need to know about us for now, we would like our games to speak on our behalf.What happens if we get more money than we ask for? The game will take a turn for the better. The main stretch goal is 500 dollars. If we get this amount, the game will be finished in a years time. We will also make a webpage and a domain, and invest more time in social networking to listen to your feedback. We will also put some money to advertising, and turn to Steam Greenlight if everything goes smoothly. The main stretch, will be used for everything listed above, the game will be finished as intended. For a 1000 dollars we will finish the second part of the Linked Pact, The Cube, without delay. We will also design Kopula for Android and iOS, and make custom mouse cursors for PC! If we get here, the quality will rise tenfold. The game will be much more detailed and polished, we will get singers for the music to add variety, try to enhance the experience as much as we can. And don’t get us started about The Cube. The concept is still in diapers, so to speak, but this could lead to something much bigger than we intended.Kopula can react in two impressions - art or madness. For me, it's a lifestyle... this experiment is the epitome of art. I am very happy to be associated with the development of Kopula. And i hope that you will help us... After all, you have nothing to lose.-Dominik "DarknesS" GottwaldThis isn't a perfect game. This isn't a game without mistakes. This is only our dream. Independent dream, with new experimental elements. But this experiment needs your help - please, help us and you will be a part of this for ages...-Jakub "Kubeeš" Profota             ...thanks to Zbyněk  for translate! We are gratefull to you...                             ...we´ll make another mails after we get a lot of money for it...
How many will it cost?
   It will cost 3 dolars. This project is not about earnings... It is about building a community. It is for players... :)

When will we create a website ?

   The website will be out 2 weeks after the end of this campaign. URL of the website will be www.dombee.cz. 
When will Kopula see the light of the world?
   Kopula will come out in 2015. Stay tuned on sites (writed below) for more informations.
When will I receive perks from my payment?
   As soon as it is possible. More complicated perks like comics, paper models, digital books etc. will be sent a little later.

story:
Before we get started here, any questions or suggestions you have, please do not hesitate to contact us! We are not so foolish as to think we've considered everything. Indeed, we are certain your input will go a long way toward helping us provide a gaming environment we can all enjoy.

Of course we'd like to make a living at making games but we don't believe it can only be done by selling out the players.

Competing with the powerhouses out there won't be easy. They have their player base established and gamers have had years of conditioning; we all just accept that our information is being sold off, sitting through ads is just a part of life, spamming people with game requests is socially acceptable and the only way to get to the next level is to pay for it.

Yes, those are all excellent ways of making every possible dollar in this industry. However, we are gamers, not suits, so we are trying to use our passion to bring gaming back around to being about the players. Our first step is to try and shake gamers free of this acceptance that they are stuck with the way things have been.

We have advertisers, of course, but you will never have to wait on an ad. You will see ads here and there, some are clickable and some aren't, but we haven't filled every available pixel with them. Advertisers are not a bad thing when used properly. Once we've met our startup costs and are generating enough revenue to sustain operations, we'll be able to start building our prize pool. Our games and tournaments don't cost players anything so it's advertising dollars that will help build that prize pool.

We have no interest in your cookies or browsing history or anything else that isn't directly related to the gaming preferences you select. This industry standard is the most despicable practice of all. It's bad enough to sell info knowingly given but this is just stealing. This will not happen at Cassie's Table.

No more dealing with forums for adding game 'friends' or losing real friends to ceaselessly having to nag them for help. Your game progression will depend solely on you just playing the games. That's it. Old school style; play the game, get ahead.

Having said that, we are offering limited edition cheat packs.

OK, so we're allowing one exception to the old school approach.

These packs will only be available as perks to our Indiegogo contributors and they will have some restrictions. You won't be able to use them in most tournaments and you won't be able to use them in any game that has other human players if even one of them has selected the no cheats option. Lastly, only certain point multipliers will be useful with the vendor games and only because we can monkey around with their post game output a little bit. We could go in and customize them more to our needs but they would cost considerably more and require us to put off even further the release of our in-house games.

We set out some of the dates for perk delivery further than we'd like but we'd rather come in early than late.

The vendor games are available simply because we wanted to launch before New Year's Day ... 2050. They give players a chance to see what it is we're trying to do with the site while we work on delivering our custom games. It also gives players a little head start on leveling. These third party games alone will never get you to Decinillionaire by themselves, they just weren't built for it. In just one of our games you can rack up a score in the quintillions fairly easily. Did you know that in all of the known universe there are less than a millinillion particles? That's a 1 with 3,003 zeroes after it! At Cassie's Table, the top score is a decinillion, that's a 1 with 30,003 zeroes after it! We really weren't going for realism with this system, we just thought it was fun and different.

We decided to do a campaign here on Indiegogo because it felt like the right match up for us. Indiegogo is about getting people involved with projects that excite them and our work is powered by excitement over the prospect of changing how gaming sites are operated. As gamers, we're tired of being treated like the meat upon which advertisers gorge themselves. But we can't do it alone. We need your help in spreading the word that things can be done differently! We need your ideas to help drive solutions we don't yet realize we've overlooked! We need your help to raise the funds necessary to bring more coders on board.

We set our goal at $250,000, which is a whole lot of money, but if we can hit that mark, you will be helping create up to 8 much needed new jobs and fund them for their first three months. That would take a significant bite out of our development time. Even if we come up short of our goal, we may be able to raise enough to still hire people and pay for the hardware and software needed to get them up and coding. Any help we get will go a long way toward keeping the lights on and the coding going! Simply spreading the word to other game lovers that we don't have to be the merchandise will make a difference! Exceeding our goal, of course, means more coders coding and that means even shorter development time.

The Breakdown is a budget projection for our goal. This is what we need to start releasing games en masse by summer. To be fully staffed we need coders in Action Script, Java, Lightstreamer and PHP as well as a dedicated DBA, network admin and social media expert along with some professional graphics folks. Today, however, we're just asking for your help to build initial momentum. $250,000 is a lot of money but software development costs a lot of money.

We believe gaming can and should be done differently. We understand we are late to the party in the gaming industry and we have chosen browser games as our first battle. We also get that there be giants upon the field already but no good fight has ever been easy! With your help, we believe we can hit the reset button and put gamers back as the focus of gaming! This is where we've chosen to jump into the fray and your help is our best hope of moving forward!

Or you could just share the video of TownRootGuy getting beat with a board full of nails because it's funny.

IGG won't let us send messages to all the great people who have shared our campaign but we want to express our deep appreciation for your help!

Thank you all so much!!

story:
I'm raising money for my own youtube channel, and my own career. I moved out from home to pursue my dreams as a content creator and entertainer. And I left everything behind for this one chance. But I went through a series of problems that left me unable to do anything and will eventually ruin my dream and force me to move back home.

These problems were:

1: Our apartment had issues it shouldn't have, and more costs than it should.

2: The move costed us more than it should.

3: The internet is not what was promised and I can not stream anymore, resulting in a loss of one third of my income.

4: My new editing computer broke and I need money to fix it.

With this money I can get back on track with the channel and start making content again. I will also invest any money that goes to spare into my youtube channel, to get better gear, try to start new ideas and try to make my content even better than it already is.

story:
The Worlds Best $25 Hands-Free Virtual Reality 3D Headset for Smartphones.

The 4REAL3D is the world’s best Virtual Reality headset for consumers - for less than the cost of 2 movie tickets. The device stands for a simple but convincing technical approach to be able to dive into Virtual Reality: You use the processing power and the display of your smartphone instead of implementing electronics into a VR headset (like the Oculus Rift). You start the application on your smartphone, insert into the headset, adjust the lenses – and you are done.   With our optional bluetooth controller, you will have absolute control over your VR experience.

The basic idea is that Virtual Reality should become available for many people without a barrier – after all, most of us already have the “core” in our pocket: our Android or Apple smartphone.  The 4REAL3D works with Android or iOS smartphones that have a gyroscope, accelerometer, and up to 5 inch screen.  4REAL3D compatible apps and games can be found on our website, Google Play Store, Youtube, or just by searching online for SBS standard video or Google Cardboard apps.

TURN YOUR SMARTPHONE INTO A VIRTUAL REALITY 3D HEADSET

Peer into the Future

We believe that the next million virtual reality experiences will happen on smartphones — a device that’s already in your pocket. And we’ve now made it possible for people everywhere to explore virtual reality in a cost effective, easy way with our new Smartphone Virtual Reality 3D Headset.

Fly through the Grand Canyon, Play 3-D games, Walk the city streets of London or become a Character in an animated film. Even watch your home videos in 3D. With so many free apps available for Android and iPhone (and more coming), it’s as simple as downloading an app to your smartphone and inserting it into our headset  to experience virtual reality. The 4REAL3D headset contains everything you need to get started (smartphone not included).

Why is 4REAL3D more than just a fad?

Our headset will never be obsolete because it works with your smartphone.  The SBS standard is backed by Google and useful and fun apps and games are being developed and added every day.  Several FREE Apps even convert home videos, regular games into an awesome immersive 3D experience, 


What is 4REAL3D ?

The 4REAL3D is the world's best hands-free smartphone headset that allows you to get immersed into virtual reality. Custom made with high quality components by a top contract manufacturer, it is lightweight and comfortable. It's a bargain because you already have the expensive part of the system in your pocket – your mobile phone. Using a smartphone makes  it easy to use and allows you to wirelessly play games or stream movies.


How Does it Work ?

You just insert your smartphone, start the Google Cardboard or any compatible VR application and adjust the lenses to your eyes. What follows, is a 3D experience that will blow your mind.



Available Colors:

                                                                           BLACK



Stretch Goals ($75,000)


                                                                             RED

                                                                           BLUE


Resources Available on 4REAL3D.com:

Find the Latest apps, videos, movies, accessories to maximize your enjoyment.
 

Optional Accessories 

(Headphones and Bluetooth Game Controllers)

 Optional Controller

Optional Zipper Earphones with Microphone. (Answer calls without taking off the headset or headphones)

Stretch Goals ($150,000)

Who Are We?

4REAL3D was started by mobile device fanatics, users, and engineers to design and make products that we would use ourselves, and are affordable.  We have offices in Chicago and New York.
In addition to bringing the most innovative chargers to consumers, we also believe that 3D vision and 3D application usage is the future of entertainment.  We would love for you to be a part of our Journey in making this a reality. 
Our manufacturing partner is one of the top contract manufacturers in China, and will be building the 4REAL3D headsets with our choice of top quality components.


Questions and Answers (FAQ)

What is needed to enjoy virtual reality with the 4REAL3D?

All you need to experience new worlds by complete immersion with the 4REAL3D is a recent iOS or Android smartphone featuring an accelerometer and a gyroscope and a screen up to 5 inches. There are many 4REAL3D compatible apps already available for Android and for iOS.  You can go to the Google Play Store and search for 3D or simply find it on our website.




Can I also watch movies with the 4REAL3D?

Using a movie watching app, you can watch movies as supported by the app. A current app is the GoShow movie launcher available at Google Play that allows for watching 2D and 3D movies.  Regular videos (home or adult) can be converted to simulated 3D with apps like VR Cinema and other.  Other 3D movies can be watched after copying them onto the mobile phone.

Will there be more apps in the future? 

3D gaming and movies is the order of the day. A range of apps are being developed and released almost every day.   The 4REAL3D headset supports a wide variety of games and other applications.

Are there any dangers in using the 4REAL3D?

There are no direct dangers or harms known but users have reported being lost in another world. Use 4REAL3D in safe surroundings and take a break once in a while to come back to reality. Please make sure that your smartphone is inserted securely with the mini suction cups before using.

How can I buy the 4REAL3D? 

Currently, you can only get it by contributing to our Indiegogo Campaign. 

Other Ways You Can Help ?

Make some NOISE, SCREAM with us, SHARE, COMMENT and BACK us. Use the Indiegogo share tools and help us out! 

The Top 5 referrals will be rewarded in the end. And that's all there is to it.The images shown above are for illustrative purposes only.

There are no direct dangers or harms known but users have reported being lost in another world. Use 4REAL3D in safe surroundings and take a break once in a while to come back to reality. Please make sure that your smartphone is inserted securely with the mini suction cups before using.
How can I buy the 4REAL3D? 
Currently, you can only get it by contributing to our Indiegogo Campaign. 



Other Ways You Can Help ?


Make some NOISE, SCREAM with us, SHARE, COMMENT and BACK us. Use the Indiegogo share tools and help us out! 

The Top 5 referrals will be rewarded in the end. And that's all there is to it.The images shown above are for illustrative purposes only.

story:
Short Summary

Maybe due to the recent absurd events in Ukraine, or maybe due to the August 2008 Russian aggression in Georgia, we somehow feel the biggest enemy of today's world peace is Vladimir Putin So we decided to create a game called Putin-A.

But we think the problem lies not only in Vladimir, son of a...nother Vladimir. Counter actions taken by other leaders are usually far from effective. Maybe they were not brave enough, maybe they didn't see this coming, or maybe they are asses themselves - matters of debate. 

By this game we would like to show that Putin-A is willing to put an end to the peace and freedom and it's up to the other leaders whether he succeeds or not.

The Concept

The game-play will be made up of three steps: Kick, Flight and Fight. 

We start the game by kicking Putin-A with a giant foot, who then goes to a flight mode. After the unpleasant landing he confronts the local leader. It's up to the player how the local leader reacts and so it's up to the user who's going to win. 

To start a game we press Play and go to the Kick.


The Kick

  • Putin-A is ready to start
  • The giant foot is rotating

The player must touch the screen to fix the rotating foot and define the strength of the kick. 

The kick is immediately followed by the flight. 


The Flight

Now the player can sit back and enjoy the flight. Stronger the kick, longer the flight.

During this step we fly over all the locations we would have reached by a weaker kick and eventually start falling.


The Fight

So Putin-A has reached his destination. Right after landing, he faces the leader of the country he reached and asks him a question.

The player now plays for the other leader and has to choose the right answer in order to win. It's not always YES and it's not always NO, so you have to think twice before you act. Just remember, whatever he is asking, he has your country within Russian borders in his mind.

As soon as choice is made, they fight. The winner hits the looser and hits them hard.

And the game is over.

Why We Need Your Help

We want this game to be of a high quality, so we need your support to hire highly qualified developers and cover other associated costs related to campaign. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell people about our campaign, help us build an army! :)

story:
Paladin Enabling Technologies - Reflow Master 

Shield

The Reflow Master Shield from Paladin Enabling Technologies is an Arduino shield that turns your normal toaster oven into a reflow oven. A reflow oven is used in the production of electronics to change solder paste from a paste form to a liquid form and lastly to a solid form. This results in all your components being soldered for you in one run.

But let me share with you why I've created the Reflow Master Shield and why you would want one.

In 2012 I created my first project and I wanted to upgrade the project but soon realized that I required surface mount devices or components (SMD) to be able to do so.

The industry standard these days are to use SMD to populate boards. As you will notice from some of the following commercial boards:

Yes we can still make use of through hole components but their SMD cousins are often more feature rich and comes in at a more affordable price. Component sizes are also reduced which enables you to create a smaller circuit board which once again saves you money.

These facts lead me to get hold of a reflow oven controller.
 

I looked to purchase a model but didn't find a model that suited my needs and so I set out to create my own. The Reflow Master Shield is what I came up with. 

It is an Arduino shield that is cross compatible with the Arduino UNO and the Arduino MEGA. The user interface have been designed to be user friendly and feature rich. 

You are able to store your profiles and completely customize it as you would like to. This in other words doesn't limit you to reflow soldering. If you wanted to, you could use it to cook food, reflow solder or to powder coat metals. The shield enables you to have a stand alone unit that doesn't need a computer to run the show.


Connections:


The unit is designed to operate with a normal mechanical relay, a relay module (Using a high level trigger) or a solid state relay (SSR). 

From left to right, my own DIY relay board, a Solid State Relay and a relay module using a high level trigger.


I've managed to work through various prototype stages until I was happy with the final design. Here are the first official prototype after about 4 revisions

I have also insured that the temperature measurement of the unit is accurate. I've used a ISO traceable calibration rig to do so. This means that your measured temperature is very accurate.


I've also implemented a hysteresis functionality which enables the user to use any toaster oven to do the job. The hysteresis functionality prevents the unit from going into limbo if your PID parameters aren't set correctly.


Paladin Enabling Technologies need yours help!

The Reflow Master Shield have been designed, developed, prototyped and tested. I have a few boards ready to be sent out but I need your help to be able to provide larger quantities at an affordable price.

What you'll receive is the following:

  • Reflow Master Shield
  • Graphic LCD module
  • Awesome stickers 
  • Type K thermocouple.

What you'll need to provide:
  • Arduino Uno or Arduino MEGA
  • Relay module or Solid state relay
  • Toaster oven
  • Hacked extension cord. (Make your own - link)
Wiring of the shield to a relay module or to a solid state relay:


Here is a little video demonstrating how a Reflow Master Shield is put together.

Firmware and circuit diagram (Github - link)

    Risks & Challenges

    This was my first really big Arduino project and I've learnt everything as I went along. I must admit that when I started this project I thought that it would take me 6 months at the most - haha (So I learnt how to realisticly set goals). 

    Being new to the Arduino enviroment, it took considerably longer than that. I started the project back at the beginning of 2013 and steadily made progress. I also learnt a lot about Eagle CAD and how to have PCBs produced etc.

    There is a risk of being over funded but I foresee that I will be able to cope with demand. I will be able to outsource production should demand exceed expectations.


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please tell your friends who'd be interested and spread the word. This shield will enable you to do so much more with your electronic projects.

story:
Short Summary

Hey guys!

We're Wojtek and Bartek. You can find more about us on our homepages:
http://maxest.gct-game.net/
http://chomzee.gct-game.net/index.cgi?lang=en

We're making (actually we're close to finish) a cool shooting&racing multiplayer game inspired by the old-school Grand Theft Auto 2 game which some of you might still remember. We really loved playing it so we decided to make something similar but better :). Here comes Street Arena!

http://street-arena.com/

What We Need & What You Get

We need a little extra money to finish our hobby project. Its main problem has always been that we're both programmers so the artistic side has been lacking. Now, after 6 years of development we finally want to release the game but before we do so, we would like to polish it by hiring professional artists to create some more assets, that is meshes and, in particular, animations.

In exchange for help, every contributor will be granted a free copy of the full version of the game once it is released!

The Impact

It's not the game itself that lies in your hands right now, it is its quality that you have the chance to define.

Street Arena is so much part of us and we so much love playing it, and third-party people who had the occasion to test it with us often got to love it as well, that we just have to finish it. No matter how pompously it sounds, we owe this to ourselves.

So, all in all, you don't have to worry about the game being released. But with your help and support we can simply make it better.

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk. As we mentioned, that game is going to be released one way or another. But with your support and our experience we can really make the game shine and finally have this 6-years-long project off our heads and regain peace of mind :).

Other Ways You Can Help

Apart from donating money here you can also help us by giving the game thumbs up on Steam Greenlight right here:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...

story:
Hiyas! HELP!

Hi there. I'm Samuel Milne, an Independent Contract Instructor who live-streams for no profit. but lately, I've have a rush of bad luck. My Wii u died but was replaced by warranty, and my PS3 is now dying, and NOW on top of everything, I've had my 3DSXL Stolen. I'm looking to kind-hearted, generous people to help me fund-raise whatever I can to replace it, my games, and get the PS3 repaired to bring my viewers more entertainment, and interaction. Every cent will go towards the stream in some way, games etc, and many thanks. donate what you can, help a poor Game instructor out.

This is what i need from all of you people!

$500 to go towards replacing everything taken.

These funds will go towards:

  • A new 3dsXL.
  • Repair my PS3 for better streaming
  • Replace Pokemon Y, and other games That were taken
  • Buy steam games and other games to Stream for you all at

www.twitch.tv/Akiracrash

This will make a poorly paid instructor happy and sincerely thankful to replace what was wrongly taken.

The Impact:

By Donating to this cause, you're fighting to make another person's life better, and renew his faith in humanity. Gamers need to Stick Together, and there's funds out there that are just sitting, when they can really help. Contributors will be able to Choose any game I have, and I will play and explain it LIVE on stream. i just want the system back. I do travel a lot, and play my 3DSXL all the time. So much that this Theft hurts me to the core. even replacing the system won't bring back the data. my team, my work. but i just don't want to be left without. Sometimes That system is the only thing keeping me sane when coping with the world.
I just want it back...

If you can't contribute funds...

Please help and see what i do on stream, and tell others. this is a silly, yet heartfelt plea to just make one guy's life feel a little better.

Thanks so much, and spread the word!

story:
Hello guys,

I have been working on the development of KRUM - hack'n slash, action adventure game, for more than 5 years.  However, what is important now for finishing and polishing the game is funding.

I'm using Blender and Blender Game Engine as a development tool.The community there have been fantastic in giving great ideas and useful source of information for my endeavor. That is why I have decided to start this campaign to fund the last couple of stages of the game , and I'll be grateful if you support this project!

It's a third-person, single-player action game. KRUM has medieval settings, with some fantasy elements. I hope, it will be notable for its high-speed realistic, 1 to 1 combats, and remarkable gameplay.

You are a noble man living in a small and peaceful village.

One day you return from the forest with some woods and see your village ravaged in ruins. Your friends and family dead or taken in slavery. One of the few survivors, was able to tell you what happened in his last moments:Unknown demon forces came and destroyed everything without a reason, taking away the ones you love.

There is no other way for you but, go in a quest for saving them...

As you progress in your path, you realize that there is something more, something bigger, something terrifying behind this.


KRUM has a unique combat system that is simple to learn but tricky to master that’s unlike almost any other action video game out there. It’s nothing like a click-and-slash button masher. Button mashing will get you only killed. Each weapon has only a handful of simple to execute and yet brutal combos. 

The nature of the fights means that you’ll often be waiting your turn and planning your timing, whether that’s to strike or parry or roll out of the way.

The game, in other words, leans heavily toward action, but because combat is so perilous and gritty you'll often find yourself in what feels like a stand-off, whether battling monsters or common warriors, waiting with some trepidation for your “turn.”

But what is said is said, see it for your self.


Here are some of the enemies you will encounter in the game














And many more...

Making game from scratch, all by my self is not an easy task.

This project is my passion and the time I put in it, is the most valuable thing I've done in my life.

I need to raise €5,000 so I can finish the last world("The Wastelands") and polish the other ones. If I'm able to get a few more enemies created within that budget, I'll be more than happy.

Check the perks to the right to see what you'll get in return for helping me out.


The game will be available for :

Steam will be available if we get greenlit.(So help me out there)


It will be great, If I have the opportunity to create one or two more unique worlds, entire races of monsters and demons and create arena type multiplayer mode.

Here's how the money will be spend:

  • Game polishing and features(Optimization/GUI/Sound/Music)  
  • Additional enemy models and animations
  • Additional environment and new level designs
  • Multiplayer feature+server fees/New arenas made exclusively for this mode
  • Mac & Linux support
  • Translation of the game by professionals
  • Indiegogo/Paypal fees
  • Taxes 
  • Website, Greenlight, Marketing..
  • Me drinking a lot of beer!

That is exactly, for what I will use the excess money.

Thank you!

What kind of game is Krum - Edge Of Drakness?
KRUM is hardcore action RPG set in a fantasy world. The player goal is to survive and reach the end of the story by fighting his way through gruesome enemies  and blood-thirsty bosses await adventurers as he traverse through a devastated but still beautiful world.

Will there be a playable demo?
Yes! There will be link to the demo here, as soon as it is done.

Is KRUM support game controller?
The final version will support all major pc game controllers.

How much KRUM is going to cost?
There will be a fair based price on both - the target audience and the work effort I put in it.

What platforms are KRUM going to be released on?
I'll do everything within my power to release the game on Steam,GoG,Desura and of course on the game site.
Is KRUM going to be DRM-protected?
Apart from the Steam version (if the game get greenlit) there will be no required DRM to play it.

story:
We are SuperSaga Studios and we want to do the impossible – with your help!

We created a great mobile game, Heroes & Havoc, at our last job. The game came out on iPhone and iPad and was off to a great start, but the studio closed two days after our worldwide launch.

That just wouldn’t do.

The game’s destiny needs to be in the hands of its fans. So a few of us that built the game purchased it and are breathing life back into it. Heroes & Havoc lives!

Now we’re SuperSaga, and you can join us on our mission! The Ten Houses of Havoc will be restored. The epic story of our world will be told through the Tales, Legends, and Sagas of all our Heroes. We will reveal to you ALL of the Ultimate Ascensions and allow players to craft each Hero’s path. And completion of Tales, Legends, and Sagas will unlock a new kind of Ultimate Ascension – Mythics!

Best of all, this is just the beginning. We are adding more Heroes! We’re adding Havoc to the world! We’re adding events! We’re going to create the best card battle experience the world has ever known.

And who are we? We’re super experienced game vets. We’re not employees – we’re a crew. We don’t have jobs – we have a mission. And we don’t just want to make games – we want to make history.

Help us bring you the best!

 

What's so great about Heroes & Havoc? It’s Card Battle with RPG characters and strategy! Feel the power of your Heroes and their awesome abilities. Battles are quick and decisive, but YOU choose: Pick off the weak, whittle down the boss, or blast everything in sight. Become an Exalted Hero in battle to double your health and gain an extra turn. Level up and you may gain an Ultimate Ascension. Never before has Card Battle been so visceral.

We are building out the game’s narrative, so every Hero has a Tale, a Legend, and a Saga to play through. So less grind and more epic fantasy!

There’s no game on the market like Heroes & Havoc, and we need your help to take it to the next level.

 

 

SuperSaga needs funding to build out the the world of Heroes & Havoc. Your contributions bring us closer to the game as we have always imagined it, with all ten houses, a story for every Hero, the ability to craft your Hero’s path, multi-player events, Angels that can be recruited to your cause, and expansions that tell even bigger tales. 

Help us keep the development effort alive! We’ve done the early heavy lifting. The game is live now and you can play it on your iOS device. But it contains just a tiny fraction of the stories, Heroes, and Houses we’ve designed. Wait till you see the fighters of Alroc and Unduur! 

 

House Malakai

The Heroes of Malakai are the keepers of peace in the world of Havoc. These warrior priests are masters of healing and supressing conflict. As followers of Malakai, the God of Life, they lead monastic lives and forsake all worldy possessions to pursue the study of Malakai’s Laws.

 

House Kulrath


The Heroes of Kulrath are the bringers of death and destruction. They are more beast than man and celebrate their God by rampaging through Havoc, leaving only corpses and ruin in their wake. Kulrath, the God of Destruction, then descends from the sky in the form of thousands of vultures and feeds on the remains of their slaughter.

 

House Isha


The Heroes of Isha are the keepers of ancient secrets. They reside deep in the forests of Havoc and ruthlessly hunt down any who would seek to disturb their reclusive existence. Their patron Goddess, Isha, is said to hold knowledge that could unravel the entire pantheon and return the world to its primal beginnings. The Heroes of Isha are rarely seen, and those who catch a glimpse of their lithe forms in the moonlight are never heard from again.

 

House Tsadiki


The Heroes of Tsadiki are wild harbingers of change. They are highly evolved beings that consider other life forms to be inadequate attempts at perfection. Their shape shifting goddess Tsadiki never takes the same form twice and relentlessly seeks to perfect her biological creations. Her followers are able to adapt to any situation, evolving at alarming rates to match and overcome those lesser beings that would threaten their Mistress’s pursuits.

 

Coming Soon:

 

House Alroc

 

House Unduur

 

But that's not all...

In addition to adding new Houses and Heroes to the game, we are also making some MAJOR enhancements to gameplay and bringing limited-time, exclusive content to the players.

Your contributions will help us:

  • Add House Alroc and his four dwarven Heroes
  • Add House Unduur and his deadly toys
  • Build the campaigns and stories for every Hero in your collection. Each will have a Tale, a Legend, and a Saga that, upon completion, will unlock a new class of Ultimate Ascensions: Mythics!
  • Add the Ultimate Ascension screen that allows players to see each Hero’s path and sculpt it to their liking.

 

If we reach our funding goal, we'll even be able to add an ongoing Gauntlet event, with a chance to earn weekly prizes and rare battlers unlike ANY OTHER!

 

 

All of the passion is bottled up and ready to be unleashed on all of this and more. The crew has chosen to stick it out to make this game the greatest Card Battle RPG in history. We’ve worked on our own dime and need money to fund operations. That means server costs and paying these fine vets enough to buy their allotment of soup and crackers. Yes, the game is its own reward except for the food and rent and stuff we all have to pay.

Your contributions will help us breathe new life into our dream project, and will grant you the chance to enjoy the fruit of our labors (with extra fruit, of course). If we reach our funding goal, we’ll even sweeten the deal by opening up new perk tiers, including exclusive H&H-themed physical goods!

This isn’t just a game we’re building – it’s an adventure, and it includes YOU. 

 

Your contribution puts the team back in the game development saddle instead of under the yoke of consulting or a regular employment. We’re not lazy. We’re not too good for jobs. We just know the awesomeness that lies within this game and we’re not too proud to ask for your help to keep working to make it as great as it can be.

We’ve built dozens of web and mobile games, from the Kaijudo Trading Card Game for Wizards of the Coast, to award-winning games like Oasis, Resurrection, and Alien Logic. And these aren’t awards like “best intro sequence” either - they’re international awards for Game of the Year, Best Game Design of the Year, Strategy Game of the Year, etc. We’re pros who want to make a difference and give gamers what they crave – decisions that matter in a game THEY love.

We lost our jobs and have one chance to make it right for the game. Help give us this chance and we’ll give back to you with our hard work and great gameplay.

 

You can access the early iOS release build via iTunes here. The Android version is COMING SOON!

 

 

Don't have a smartphone that can access the game? Check out the game's intro movie for the backstory on YouTube, instead!  

 

 

 

Love what we’re doing but can’t contribute? No problem! You can still help us by spreading the word and raising awareness for the game. We appreciate all the help we can get - however big or small.

Happy playing from the team at SuperSaga – now go slay some Orcs!
story_txt:
We are SuperSaga Studios and we want to do the impossible – with your help!
We created a great mobile game, Heroes & Havoc, at our last job. The game came out on iPhone and iPad and was off to a great start, but the studio closed two days after our worldwide launch.
That just wouldn’t do.
The game’s destiny needs to be in the hands of its fans. So a few of us that built the game purchased it and are breathing life back into it. Heroes & Havoc lives!
Now we’re SuperSaga, and you can join us on our mission! The Ten Houses of Havoc will be restored. The epic story of our world will be told through the Tales, Legends, and Sagas of all our Heroes. We will reveal to you ALL of the Ultimate Ascensions and allow players to craft each Hero’s path. And completion of Tales, Legends, and Sagas will unlock a new kind of Ultimate Ascension – Mythics!
Best of all, this is just the beginning. We are adding more Heroes! We’re adding Havoc to the world! We’re adding events! We’re going to create the best card battle experience the world has ever known.
And who are we? We’re super experienced game vets. We’re not employees – we’re a crew. We don’t have jobs – we have a mission. And we don’t just want to make games – we want to make history.
Help us bring you the best!
 

What's so great about Heroes & Havoc? It’s Card Battle with RPG characters and strategy! Feel the power of your Heroes and their awesome abilities. Battles are quick and decisive, but YOU choose: Pick off the weak, whittle down the boss, or blast everything in sight. Become an Exalted Hero in battle to double your health and gain an extra turn. Level up and you may gain an Ultimate Ascension. Never before has Card Battle been so visceral.
We are building out the game’s narrative, so every Hero has a Tale, a Legend, and a Saga to play through. So less grind and more epic fantasy!
There’s no game on the market like Heroes & Havoc, and we need your help to take it to the next level.
 




 

SuperSaga needs funding to build out the the world of Heroes & Havoc. Your contributions bring us closer to the game as we have always imagined it, with all ten houses, a story for every Hero, the ability to craft your Hero’s path, multi-player events, Angels that can be recruited to your cause, and expansions that tell even bigger tales.

Her followers are able to adapt to any situation, evolving at alarming rates to match and overcome those lesser beings that would threaten their Mistress’s pursuits.

Add House Unduur and his deadly toys

Add the Ultimate Ascension screen that allows players to see each Hero’s path and sculpt it to their liking.
 
If we reach our funding goal, we'll even be able to add an ongoing Gauntlet event, with a chance to earn weekly prizes and rare battlers unlike ANY OTHER!

story: Hey guys recently on facebook I was talking about recording with my webcam and I got a plethora of suggestions regarding a capture card. A capture card would be fantastic but I have other bills to pay and I am unable to afford one at the moment. I'm perfectly fine with uploading with a webcam as you could see from my previous video, but like I said, many of you voiced your concern about webcam quality. A lot of you were okay with it but some of you guys suggest that I make a campaign to try and raise money for that. 100% of the funds would go into video making for my channel that way I can provide the best quality content for you guys. Honestly, even if you can't donate I sincerely thank you from the bottom of my heart just for all the support and love you guys have shown of the years. At the end of the day I couldn't have done any of this without my subscribers so thanks once again :]
