story:
Para ver la campaña en castellano pulsa aquí

Hi, my name is Steamboiler and I live on coal.

I've got lots of friends ready to enjoy a unique adventure, but first I will need your directions so I can achieve my goals.

While I have no embedded chips I've got loads of devices you can use on me to complete my adventure.


My world is what yours could have once became, but we took a different path...

My Steampunk World was born from all the things that never happened in my history but did in yours: the discovery of Science, Electricity, New Technologies...  The most revolutionary descovery to me was steam and coal.  We couldn't live if these didn't exist.  And they allowed us to upgrade our old and heavy duty machinery.  Our machines aren't factory-made nor do they work on an assembly line.  We reject that.  Instead we chose a hand-made production for our items.

My Retro-Futuristic world started in the 70' based upon the II Industrial Revolution (1850-1910) Science-Fiction.  This world came out of the mind of visionaries dreaming of voyages to the Moon, journeys to the Center of the Earth or going to the bottom of the Sea.

In summary, my world -unlike yours- is based on the improvement of steam machines rather than on the intellect through electronics...


With this FREE game we want all the players to enjoy a real platform game.  The Steampunk aesthetics of this game, its detailed illustrations together with state-of-the-art 3D technologies will immerse you in a magical world – although not at all impossible.

You will be learning first-hand the world of our character, Steamboiler, on the various worlds through which this game will take you.

You will play at different steam-set scenarios such as cities, factories, mines, aquatic sceneries where you will struggle with enemies created upon steam energy.

Along this journey you will see devices never thought of before and meet unexpected friends.

You will need to gather your vital strenght through COAL which you will feed Steamboiler in order to guide him in his journey.

This will be a user-friendly game: play it from your touchscreen mobile through a tactile controller using the buttons for directions and actions.  You can either use your remote or keyboard when you play the game on your PC.


Steam Chronicles will be free game.  You may also want to enhance it by buying new devices or new worlds.

The game will be first published in English and Spanish.  New languages will be added in the future.

This game will be available on the following platforms:

  • Mobile and tablet: Android, IOS and Windows Phone.
  • PC: Windows and Linux
  • Consoles: Xbox and Play Station (Indie version).

Approximate period for development : 15 months.



Steam Chronicles was born as one of the biggest projects of a group of 'crazy dreamers' in love with videogames development platforms.  We are trying to make the difference by introducing a completely unknown world in its genre.

Our team is made up of a group of creatives and developers with distinct technological profiles.  We are therefore a sound group bearing different points of view.  We pay attention to every detail – an important aspect within Steampunk- since this is a very meticulous world.

Passion for creativity and new technologies join us together with our enthusiasm and eagerness to acomplish this project.  Financing, though, is our main obstacle and therefore we ask for your help!!




  • Andrés C.: Programmer Analyst (Founder)
  • David C.: Programmer (Founder)
  • Laura H.: Graphic designer Marketing (Foundress)
  • Jose A.: 3D animator and audio editor
  • Manuel B.: Illustrator

Besides the already formed Steam Chronicles Game team we will be counting on other collaborations on the areas of illustration, 3D montage and development support.


  • To buy development licenses.
  • To buy licenses to publish the game in different platforms.
  • To pay for patents and registrations
  • To rent a musical studio for soundtrack composition
  • Taxes
  • Marketing Investment
  • Salaries (1 year)

$1

Fame steam walk (Bronze)

You will appear at the Fame Walk as bronze collaborator.

$5

Trick Guide

You will appear at the Fame Walk as bronze collaborator and receive a trick guide on the game.

$15

Desktop Background

Bronze Fame Walk + Trick Guide and an exclusive desktop background.

€25

Access to hidden levels

Bronze Fame Walk + Trick Guide + Exclusive desktop background and access to hidden levels.

€50

Gift Card

Bronze Fame Walk + Trick guide + Exclusive desktop background + Access to hidden levels and a $15 gift card to trade for devices and new screens.

$75

Survey Participation

Bronze Fame Walk + Trick guide + Exclusive desktop background + Access to hidden levels + $25 gift card to trade for devices and new screens + You will participate in surveys to choose new characters, enemies, screens...

$135

Poster

All the previous incentives + $50 gift voucher to buy devices and screens and a 39.37 x 31.5 inches poster signed by Steamboiler featuring all the Steam Chronicles characters.

$190

Mousepad

All the previous incentives + $75 gift voucher to buy devices and screens and an exclusive mousepad of the game.

$250

Exclusive T-shirt

All the previous incentives + Silver Fame Walk + $100 gift voucher + Exclusive Steamboiler T-shirt (Limited edition).

$320

Be the first to play the game!

All the previous incentives + $125 gift voucher and you will obtain the game two weeks before it's being officially published.

$550

Beta Tester

All the previous incentives plus a $170 gift voucher.  Your name will appear in the credits and you will also have access to the game at the development stage so that you can test all levels and give us your advice.

$1,400

Mobile and Android tablet Remote Control

All the previous incentives plus Gold Fame Walk plus honorable mention in the credits and a Remote Control for your mobile or Android tablet so that you can have a total control of the game.

$1,400

IOS mobile or IPad Remote Control.

All the previous incentives + Gold Fame Walk plus a special mention on credits and a remote for your IOS mobile or Ipad so that you can have a total control of the game.

$3,000

Premium Collaborator

All the previous incentives + $220 gift voucher to buy devices and new screens and you will appear as Premium collaborator on the game's initial charge.

$6,000

The Most!

All the previous incentives + $500 gift voucher + You will appear as collaborator on the game's initial charge.  If you wish we will include a link to your web or blog.

Steam Chronicles will be a game accesible to all and you will be able to download it for free at your APP Store, Play Store, PC or console with several screens.  For those who want more there will be several options to buy devices, new screens and worlds.  The voucher we provide as an incentive will bear a code. Once you have the code just enter it in the game and your balance will be accordingly recharged with the stated amount.

Estimated delivery dates:

  • Fame steam walk: 06/30/2014
  • Gift Cards: 01/05/2015 (game release date)
  • Desktop Background: 05/30/2014
  • Trick Guide: 01/05/2015 (game release date)
  • Survey Participation: since 06/01/2014
  • Beta Tester: since 10/01/2014
  • First game release: 04/15/2015 (two weeks before final game release)
  • Poster, Mousepad and T-shirt: 07/01/2014
  • Mobile remote control: 07/01/2014

story:
Myinforms.com
Synopsis

The Grian station, located on moon Dhara of the planet Marama, which main reason of existence is to work as a bridge for the space travels. The station has started to receive multiple attacks from native creatures of Dhara who were thought to be innocuous. 

As a member of the Defense Forces of Krysa government, your duty is to keep a group of investigators safe, since their job is to gather information about the creatures causing the attacks and determine what is the reason behind that behavior. However, as they move forward in the research they will find a particular pattern of learning in these creatures, which holds a terrifying secret.




Blind Edge is the combination of two genres of videogames: the fast and full of action Hack and Slash with the modifications and development of characters of the RPG genre. Created in a graphic environment of 2D videogame platform, that will remind us of old classics games such as Castlevania, Megaman and Metroid.

Due to the lack of bottoms in Android we succeeded in creating a way of making combos and variable attacks with just three bottoms. Tapping the screen for a period of time will determine the kind of attack you will execute and you will find different kinds of abilities in the character 

Your character will be in a constant process of growing as in any RPG game. You will be able to choose between three different kinds of combat: The first one is the Joggernaut, specialized in defense and stunning enemies. Second we have Striker, expert in unexpected attacks since are made from behind the enemy´s back and finally we have Engineer, this last one takes advantage of your gadgets to the fullest. You can switch from one to another at any time during the game, improve them and mix them whoever you want.

Each class has its own specific characteristics. This depending on the feature could increase the damage done to the enemy and the defense of your character. As an example, the majority of the abilities of the engineer class needs a big amount of energy to use the shield, that is why the updates of the equipment must be directed to improve the shield. This is also applied to the equipment updates of the Striker class, since the special features drains stamina. 


In just few days of star the campaign we have a lots of support of many games magazines, websites and people.


Websites:
OneAngryGamer RetroGamingMagazine THEGG Telkomgaming TheNeeds.com

Gamequiche



The content of the game will depend on this point, we have amazing ideas but this means more working time/cost.


Blind Edge in both platforms with all classes (Juggernaut, Striker and Engineer) with ten skills per class  also one weapon (Sword) In two languages English and Spanish.


We have a great story to tell but this means to develop the cinematics scenes and level sequences with this goal we can grow up the team of Babel Games to reach this new Story Mode including Boss Fights



New weapon: The Crossbow. Because the sword have good synergy with the juggernaut and Striker we will develop the Crossbow. Long range weapon able to push, lift or break your enemies with new abilities for each class also we add new looks for weapons and armors.

Create and personalize your character we will also work in the Orb this new weapon bring a different gameplay because it will be the most difficult to control with their respective skills for each class

Like lots of RPG we dream with the opportunity to create an open world which you have the possibility to explore the wild lands of Dhara to collet resources or find secrets chambers also new situations of story.


Each class was thought out to this goal because we don’t have an “OP CLASS” to defeat them all instead we always thought in the "rock, paper, scissor effect" for example: the juggernaut with a lot of physical defense is weak to the damage of the engineers but strong to Striker class. This awesome gameplay combined to pvp system will increase to lot the live time of the game.

????????




Arsiz is a company known as a pioneer in the intergalactic travels fields. It has discovered an amazing new concept in connections of resources between the 11 planets with habitants. This way Arsiz became the most valuable and powerful patrimony of Krysa.  Krysa, is the organization that has the political and military domain over 7 planets, being the largest and bigger state in 972 nations, among 6 planetary systems. After the recognition of the big improvement this was, the Association of Interplanetary Nations, (NICHT. In the official language of the habitants of Krysa) agreed to create a platform that would decrease the time between one space trip and another and they placed in Dhara. Planet Marama has several moons and Dhara is one of them, it has almost the same size of Marama and they are really close to The Sun of this planetary system. Although Dhara it´s close to the Sun it does not receive much radiation from it, thanks to the gravity of Marama it keeps it in a stable orbit which makes it the perfect place to position the new platform because of the environment and atmosphere conditions. With the realization of this universal bridge the frequency of the space travels will increase and will benefit the Krysa organization. Posterior to the creation of this platform, it is named officially after the particular place is located in, near a blind spot to the Sun of that system: Blind Edge.





Blind Edge Original Sountrack (WIP)







Babel Games is a small group of developers with a lot of potential, after a long journey of the first idea we are in this crucial step to reach this transcendental dream. Approximately about 2 years from the initial thought of the game with a lot of motivation and commitment we assume the risk to develop Blind Edge, process cost the investment of a lot of time, days and nights and economic resources to show this humble display of our idea, through Indiegogo and your support we can dedicate all of our time to complete this project to bring your this amazing videogame we also ask for your support and your opinion on this project. We want to make the process of creating Blind Edge as open as possible.

Why This Campaign?

Develop with passion and dedication expressing in this humble campaign which cost a lot of time and money which we no longer possess we took the risk idea to make a flexible campaign on Indiegogo.

We decide begin this campaign on august 20 commemorating 38 years of the Voyager II launch, space probe which was sent on a mission to study the planets: Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune addition to the investigations to be performed carries a message that would last 1 billion years. According to this historic event we decided deeply inspired to launch our campaign  that goes beyond entertainment game we want to created is a carrier of a message.

Why Flexible Campaign?

We are an unknown team developers, knowing this, is really difficult get the attention of many users, regardless of this, some passionate gamers decide give their trust to reach this dream, trust which impulse to dedicate all of our effort to complete this project. What happen if we don’t reach our goal? trying to be as transparent as possible to demonstrate all our commitment to realize this dream we will use the funds collected to dedicate full time job to develop Blind Edge to then we be able to make a new campaign with new features, gameplays demo, develop process and more. Our way of showing gratitude is reach the dream those helped us, do not participate in the next campaign and will receive special content to the people who trusted us initially.

Risk

We are a small group of developers which don't have the advanced equipment and workers to progress to speed we would like also we don't add the advertising cost to spread the creation of this project.

How can Help Us?

If you like and want this game to become reality, tell your friends, tell your family and tell the world! Help us to make this game, our dream, come to life. We are grateful for every support because without you, we wouldn’t even be here today.
story_txt:
Myinforms.comSynopsisThe Grian station, located on moon Dhara of the
planet Marama, which main reason of existence is to work as a bridge for the space
travels. The station has started to receive multiple attacks from native
creatures of Dhara who were thought to be innocuous. 
As a member of the Defense Forces of Krysa
government, your duty is to keep a group of investigators safe, since their job
is to gather information about the creatures causing the attacks and determine what
is the reason behind that behavior. However, as they move forward in the
research they will find a particular pattern of learning in these creatures,
which holds a terrifying secret.Blind Edge is the combination of two genres of
videogames: the fast and full of action Hack and Slash with the modifications
and development of characters of the RPG genre. Created in a graphic environment
of 2D videogame platform, that will remind us of old classics games such as
Castlevania, Megaman and Metroid.Due to the lack of bottoms in Android we succeeded in creating a way of making combos and variable attacks
with just three bottoms. Tapping the screen for a period of time will determine
the kind of attack you will execute and you will find different kinds of
abilities in the character Your character will be in a constant process of
growing as in any RPG game. You will be able to choose between three different
kinds of combat: The first one is the Joggernaut, specialized in defense and stunning
enemies. Second we have Striker, expert in unexpected attacks since are made
from behind the enemy´s back and finally we have Engineer, this last one takes advantage of your gadgets to the fullest.
You can switch from one to another at any time during the game, improve them
and mix them whoever you want.Each class has its own specific characteristics. This depending on the feature could increase the damage done to the enemy and the defense of your character. As an example, the majority of the abilities of the engineer class needs a big amount of energy to use the shield, that is why the updates of the equipment must be directed to improve the shield. This is also applied to the equipment updates of the Striker class, since the special features drains stamina. In just few days of star the campaign we have a lots of support of many games magazines, websites and people.


Websites:
OneAngryGamer RetroGamingMagazine THEGG Telkomgaming TheNeeds.com
Gamequiche




The content of the game will depend on this point, we have amazing ideas but this means more working time/cost.





Blind Edge in both platforms with all classes (Juggernaut, Striker and Engineer) with ten skills per class  also one weapon (Sword) In two languages English and Spanish.








We have a great story to tell but this means to develop the cinematics scenes and level sequences with this goal we can grow up the team of Babel Games to reach this new Story Mode including Boss Fights


New weapon: The Crossbow. Because the sword have good synergy with the juggernaut and Striker we will develop the Crossbow. Long range weapon able to push, lift or break your enemies with new abilities for each class also we add new looks for weapons and armors.



Create and personalize your character we will also work in the Orb this new weapon bring a different gameplay because it will be the most difficult to control with their respective skills for each class






Like lots
of RPG we dream with the opportunity to create an open world which you have the
possibility to explore the wild lands of Dhara to collet resources or find secrets
chambers also new situations of story.




Each class was thought out to this goal because we don’t have an “OP CLASS” to defeat them all instead we always thought in the "rock, paper, scissor effect" for example: the juggernaut with a lot of physical defense is weak to the damage of the engineers but strong to Striker class. This awesome gameplay combined to pvp system will increase to lot the live time of the game.

story:
So what is it?

Its a unique deck of cards designed by kinetic artist and designer, Dale Mathis. These 1st of its kind 3D Metal Card decks transform into functional fine art when not in use. The card decks back design is reliefed in metal with functioning gears.
 
Why?
Almost everyone on Earth has a deck of cards laying around their house or office. Its usually in a drawer full of stuff. When friends come over and want to play cards you end up shuffling through that drawer of stuff looking for those card decks. With the Dale Mathis 3D playing card deck you simply place the card deck in its mechanical frame and now the card deck instantly becomes fine art. Flip a switch on the frame and now your card deck becomes animated, flip another switch and now your kinetic fine art 3D card deck and frame illuminates in your choice of light colors. If your a card collector, the 3D card deck's uniqueness adds value to your collection. 


How does it work?


Each limited edition card deck comes with a stainless steel playing card inside its tuck box. When the 3D card deck is placed in your choice of mechanical frame, it then becomes magnetized to the frame back. By flipping a switch on the back of the mechanical frame, the gears in the 3D card deck begin to animate. There are 4 choices of mechanical frames to choose from and 3 deck design options. Watch the video below for detailed demonstration.

Who we are?

My name is Dale Mathis, my designs have elements of science fiction and elegance. I’d like to think that my designs make people think but they also make people smile, no matter if they like them or not. Me and my team of fabricators have been designing and fabricating all sorts of contraptions for close to a decade now from my studios in Las Vegas and the Philippines. My works can be seen around the world in finest art galleries. 

A few of my principal collectors and corporate collections include, but not limited to, The Prince of Qatar; Damon Wayans; Criss Angel; Teller (of Penn and Teller); Sunrise Children’s Hospital; and St. Jude Children’s Hospital. Additionally, my designs and artwork resides in galleries and private collections around the United States as well as in London, Italy, France, Russia, Turkey, Brazil, Philippines, Australia, Indonesia, New Zealand, Qatar, Dubai, Japan, China, India and Mexico.

My designs are usually acquired by the 1% of society. I created this deck of cards to give the 99% a chance at an entry level original Dale Mathis piece.

What you get?

Dale Mathis releases version two 3D metal mechanized playing card deck. This new deck features 3 new metal mechanism designs and 2 limited edition color variations. If you missed out on the 1st version, here is your opportunity to be a part of Playing Card History the second time around. If you purchased any decks or Mechanical frames from me in the past, you know how fast they go, the quality you are to receive and how highly collectible they have become.


Perk A-1

Limited Edition Deck.


                      

Perk B-2

                         

Perk C-3
Limited Edition Deck.

24k Gold/Bronze fused 3D deck.

                            

24k Gold plated gears on a gold foiled deck. Infused Bronze and Stainless Steel housing, inlaid with Jet Hematite Swarovsky Crystals.

Limited edition of 25. Only 17 available for this campaign.                                

                             

All Limited edition decks come with whats pictured below.

Prototype tuck box design.

       

Card Faces.      

 

                                          

  

Perk D-4

1st Gen Mechanical Frame.

Limited Edition.

(NOTE): Does not come with Deck, Die or Die holders.

                 

Perk E-5
3 Deck Mechanical Frame.
Limited Edition.
(NOTE): Does not come with decks.

          

Perk F-6
Mini Mechanical Frame.
(NOTE): Does not come with deck, Die or Die holders.

                         



Perk G-7

Double Deck Mini Mechanical Frame.

(NOTE): Does not come with decks.

                  

Assorted frames to choose from for every budget.

All Limited edition frames come standard with RGB LED lights. This includes the 3 deck card frame.


Perk H-8
Dale Mathis T-Shirt.


Risks & Challenges

I have been in the Art and manufacturing business for well over a decade and based on my experience I can not assure you that everything will happen as planned. Things happen occasionally especially when outsourcing. I will do my best to make sure you are taken care of based on my past experience.

story:
Playing Chess anywhere anytime!

605 million people in the world play chess regularly, meaning that chess players now make up one of the largest communities on the planet.  (See this link for more details http://goo.gl/N4Qudl)

The slogan of FIDE (World Chess Federation) is GENS UNA SUMUS (We are family)

This large family shares ideas such as peace, fraternity, fair play, respect, sharing, wisdom, solidarity, patience, work, the search for perfection and many other noble values.

The proposition is the create a mobile application and web service that allows better social connection between members of this global family.

Chess Family is more than a mobile application.  It is an actual worldwide network of chess lovers.  Chess Family helps members to make new friends and spend enjoyable time together by enabling them to easily meet at venues close to their location, whether they are at home or on holiday.  Our mission is to put mobile technology and virtual spaces into the service of human relationships.

Chess can be considered a universal language that establishes bridges of communication between minds and surpasses barriers (such as ethnicity, colour, language and ideologies).

Chess Family will make chess more accessible to everyone, anywhere and anytime for free.

Who can Register to this Network?

  • Chess amateurs and professional players
  • All chess institutions
  • The organizers of events
  • Coaches
  • Arbiters
  • Chess play areas

What are the Services Offered to Members?

  • Chess players available within 10 km
  • All current chess events within 50 km
  • Clubs in operation with 20 km
  • Chess play areas with 10km
  • Chess events that will take place in the next 10 days within 50 km

The Educational Benefits of Chess

The educational benefits of chess are many and varied.  They are well documented by a large body of research papers from around the world.

The most frequently cited general benefits include the development of:

  • Ethical sense:  Improvements in attitude and general behaviour are often noted.
  • Cognitive abilities such as attention, memory and logical thinking; essential skills for the development of the individual.
  • Creativity through problem solving.
  • Critical thinking:  Improving the ability to assess strengths and weaknesses, establish value judgements and make decisions.

“The main (benefit) being that it contributes to the development of strategic thinking as well as concentration, analytical skills and problem solving.” - President Jacob Zuma

What Chess can Teach us about Business

When considering the parallels between what happens of a chess board and what happens in a board room, there are many elements that these two environments share.

See this video entitled “Why you Need to Play Chess” - by business expert, Dr Donna Thomas-Rodgers https://youtu.be/243ITHhcpeQ


We would like to ask you for your support to enable us to offer this application for free to chess fans all over the world.

There are three ways in which you may support Chess Family:

  • Please donate so that we can develop this application and provide it for free to players all over the world.
  • Buy a Kids Membership, a very interesting and educational gift you can offer to your children and grandchildren (SAVE 60%). A special kid membership includes, a year for free:
    - Chess lessons for beginners
    - Brain games for kids
    - Mental capacity development exercises
  • Buy a year of Premium Level Membership, from when the application is launched (SAVE 60%). You receive a “Founding Member” badge on your profile and, of course, our eternal gratitude!
    Premium Level Membership gives access to:
    - Advanced and optimized search features
    - Reminders
    - Auto notifications
    - More than 200 high quality chess video lessons for all levels, about tactics, strategies, endgames and openings
    - More than 3500 Chess Tactics Training Puzzles

Project Timeline

We started the idea and feasibility study in March 2015. Following two months of intense work on concepts, collecting information, detailed design and analysis, now we are ready to offer this solution all over the world.

The first version will be available in two languages: English and French. The second one should be available in 13 languages.


Testimonies

"I guess everybody knows my experience in chess management as Turkish Chess Federation. I will not be modest to underline that the revolution in Turkish Chess had been based on working with experts, using the best methods of chess training and management, and also innovating and implementing the new Technologies and software.

Many firsts happened in the World by Turkish Chess Federation, as online team compositions in Olympiad, live results during the round, etc.

However, I have to admire that Chess Family is the what I was dreaming and we were missing in chess. If I had Chess Family in 2008, now Turkish Chess Federation would be 10 times bigger than current size and power.

A social network, joins all chess world to each other. Makes our common motto real in practice: “Gens Una Sumus: we are a family”

I have to say that as soon as I have downloaded and used Chess Family I became addicted to it. This was something missing in the World chess not as software or an online application, but the biggest umbrella assembling all ideas under it.

Thanks to developers, now we have Chess Family!" - Ali Nihat YAZICI

"I discovered this wonderful project recently! This application fills in a very useful gap as most chess applications are geared to playing chess on-line. Here is it just the opposite. This application will bring people together. It will help you make new friends! I wish this project the best of success!" - Stephen Boyd, International Arbiter, Fide Master, Echecs Club Montpellier, French Federation

Press articles
Chess Family – the chess social network in the making by Diana Mihajlova

A social

practice: “Gens Una Sumus: we are a family”
I have to
say that as soon as I have downloaded and used Chess Family I became addicted
to it. This was something missing in the World chess not as software or an
online application, but the biggest umbrella assembling all ideas under it.
Thanks to
developers, now we have Chess Family!" - Ali Nihat YAZICI
"I discovered this wonderful project recently! This application fills in a very useful gap as most chess applications are geared to playing chess on-line. Here is it just the opposite. This application will bring people together. It will help you make new friends! I wish this project the best of success!" - Stephen Boyd, International Arbiter, Fide Master, Echecs Club Montpellier, French Federation
Press articles

Chess Family – the chess social network in the making by Diana Mihajlova

story:
America's Retribution
The President of the United States is out to make America great again by any means necessary! Help the President take down the SJW Terrorists and celebrity elite while trying to decrease the deficit, destroy Isis and abolish Obamacare.

story:
About the game

Horror Story - Hallowseed is a Survival Horror Game with influences from classic 80s horror movies and Stephen King and Grimm Brothers  books, as well as various themes covered in the TV Series like SUPERNATURAL.

The Game is in development.
We are only 2 guys working on a big Project that requires time and hard work.
Now we don't have funds to keep working on it.
We need you to pre-order it to help us to keep working in the Project of our lives.
Thank you so much!

 

This is not just another Horror Game, but an ambitious project that yearns to be among big hits like Resident Evil, Outlast, Amnesia, and in the future may have a multi-title franchise under the Horror Story brand.

This game has been in development since 2017, initially being developed by one guy, Jeff Winner, the person who speaks to you.
This 2019, Ismael Renard, programmer, joined our small team to fight for this dream.
We're just two guys with a dream and a lot of dedication, working hard to complete the project of our lives.

The goal is to have this game finished in the first half of 2020, but this will only be possible if we get your support!

story:
It has been my dream to open my own gaming business where I could teach and share with others my love for gaming.  I am very close to making this happen, but I just need some extra help to make this venture a complete success.  If you love gaming and want a place to come feel welcome and at home, then this is your chance to make it happen.

Game Central Station will be your go to destination for all things gaming! (Picture above is a sample of what we will be offering for our hourly gaming).  We will be located in Middletown, Delaware.

SO what will Game Central Station offer??

-  Try before you buy gaming by the hour for all the latest gaming platforms (Xbox/PS4/Switch/WiiU).  Come try out that new game and see if you like it before you buy.  We will offer hourly rates/day passes and weekend gaming passes.  We will also be holding tournaments for all the top competitive games (COD/Madden/ Smash Bros. etc.)

-  Private gaming birthday/team building parties!  Rent our private gaming rooms for your child's birthday party or for your business's team building event. 

- Retro video gaming will also be available on classic platforms like NES/SNES/Atari.

-  A large spacious area for all table top gaming!  Magic the Gathering/ Pokemon/ War Hammer/etc... All standard tournaments for these games will be held in our location.  (FNM/PPTQ's/PreRelease etc.)

- Snack Bar with everything you need to fuel that gaming spirit.

Planned hours of operation:

Mon-Thurs  10am - 10pm

Fri-Sat  10am-Midnight

Sun 2pm-9pm

 

All money donated will be used to fund the opening of the first location.  If the store fails to open, we will refund all donations made to this campaign.

story:
Hi, my name is Roy Teo and thank you for your interest in this campaign.

I have been in the yoyo industry for over 20yrs and have been an international judge for over 10 years, traveling around the world to various international competitions.

I have seen the evolution of the new generation of playing styles and the requirement of a high performance BiMetal yoyo. Unfortunately performance comes with a price. Many of them are well beyond the means of many players with the top models going for hundreds of dollars.

I started this campaign because I’m seeing a missing gap in the market. I wanted to create a BiMetal yoyo that is not only competition worthy but also affordable to everyone. 

I decided to team up with YoyoRanger, a brand who shares the same vision as me. As an upcoming brand relatively new in the market, I feel that it is the perfect collaboration to fulfill this dream together.

I chose to use crowdfunding to keep the price as low as possible for this first batch before we hit the retail stores where the price will go up. With crowdfunding, there is no middle man in the picture so the price you pay is as low as it gets!


The Hertz Story

To achieve this goal of bringing a high performance BiMetal yoyo into the hands of every player, we need help with funding.

I need to raise USD1500 which will go directly into the production costs for tooling and machining of the first batch of Hertz.

2 colours are available for purchase, Silver and Black. Early Backers will be able to get them at an affordable price of only USD55 each. 

There will also be 10 Limited Edition Gold coloured Hertz, each individually serialised with a different logo.

*Image is a rendering of the Limited Edition Gold Hertz

Shipping is FREE worldwide for every order.


The Hertz Design

While designing this yoyo, I drew ideas from early prototypes and with feedback from top players in the region. I wanted it to be a player’s yoyo, designed by players for players.

There were several factors that needed addressing. The size, the weight, the material and the shape. Everything had to be perfectly in sync and up to date with market trends and requirements.

It also has to be able to perform new generation tricks like fingerspins and rejections with ease.


The final version of what I call the perfect players' yoyo, the Hertz. It has a diameter of 56.9mm and a width of 43.4mm which is an ideal size and the perfect weight of 66g. 

I used 6061 aluminium with a stainless steel rim for the perfect weight distribution for both horizontal and vertical styles. There were more expensive alternatives like 7075 aluminium but i felt the increased cost didn't justify any significant increase in performance. 

Specifications:

Wide 43.4mm 

Diameter 56.9mm 

Bearing Gap 4.4mm 

Weight 66 grams 

Material 6061 Aluminium body with Stainless Steel Rim 

Surface Treatment Bead blasted 

Bearing Type Size C Curve / Concave

Respond Pad Large Slim


Other Ways You Can Help

So help us spread the word and get this campaign funded and you too can be the next owner of an incredibly affordable yet high performing BiMetal yoyo in the market today.

story:
IRON MUSCLE - BE THE CHAMPION

You can download the public demo version from Google Play to see where the development is now! 


Play with the world's first story-based online bodybuilding game and develop along with your character. Compete in online bodybuilding competitions and show the world what you can do!

More than 7 million players have downloaded the three-part series that is Iron Muscle. Our success has inspired us to create the next installment in the franchise and make it bigger and better than ever.

In Iron Muscle, your ultimate goal is to win the IM Bodybuilding competition. In your noble quest, you will have to train, eat clean, and earn your way to the top!

Workout every day to increase your muscle mass while also paying attention to your diet to achieve the best results. Get a great job to make money to fuel your passion for exercise. Create delicious protein shakes to gain massive boosts. Purchase cool outfits, go to the barbershop and get a haircut to look your best. Get a tattoo, customize your ride and buy trendy stuff for your crib. Flex on the beach to win bodybuilding competitions and show everyone the results of your hard work. Remember, consistency is key. Working out every day will help you reach the results you want to achieve. The world of Iron Muscle is yours to explore!

The game isn't your typical simulation game, it's also an adventure game, an idle game, and a management game, all in one! The game has tons of cool customization, a funny storyline and several online mini-games that give it hours of gameplay value. It's the only game you need! Seriously, once you start you will be hooked! And on top of it all, we'll bring you new content updates on a regular basis and live bodybuilding events.
 

CUSTOMISE YOUR LOOK
 

In Iron Muscle, the only limits on your player are you.

One and a half years ago I discovered the Unity Multipurpose Avatar System or UMA for short. It is a free character creation and modification system with lots of cool features.

After I joined the UMA community, I started developing a character that would be very customizable, mobile-friendly and looks fantastic in general. In-game you will have the opportunity to customize every little detail of your character.

  • Skin tone
  • Detailed facial features
  • Hair and facial hair
  • Clothes, accessories
  • Tattoos
  • Increase muscle mass / diet / overweight

Upgradeable muscle groups: neck, back, shoulders, triceps, biceps, lower arm, chest, abs, glutes, quads, calves.
 

TRAIN HARD - EAT CLEAN
 

Create your character, set your height, weight, muscle mass as well as your body fat percentage and start your progress not only in-game but in real life as well! Do you go to the gym, are street workouts your thing or are you a couch potato? The Iron Muscle workout plan can help you reach your goals! You can choose where you would like to workout, what training level you are at and what your goals are!

They say you are what you eat. That is why we have Zsolt on the Team. He is a diet expert and a competitive bodybuilder. With his help, we have put together an assortment of meals the game will choose the most appropriate diet to achieve your goals. You can set notifications, this way character will tell you when it's time for your meal! These diets will be individualized. The goal is to have a varied, healthy diet plan!
 

REALISTIC ANIMATIONS
 

In order to realistically portray the various different exercises, we have built a cheap motion capture system that uses 2 Xbox Kinect to visualize the movements. With the help of this system not only are the exercise animations and movements digitalized, but even cut-scenes, poses, and mini-games(like arm wrestling or push up contests) are easily integrated into the game. Later on, we are planning to add facial capture to our system to make the game that much more realistic.



AND MANY MORE
 

You have a long way to go before you can take the title of champion(Be The Champion), but the game will always have something new to offer.

 EAT
Pay attention to your workouts and follow the instructions of the game. Unlock an assortment of supplements that gives you a boost while training! 

 TRAIN
Never skip leg day! Just like in real life, in Iron Muscle, every in-game workout will train a certain muscle group. The muscle-specific training methods give you the opportunity to build up the muscle groups that might be lagging behind compared to the others. The game constantly watches your characters stats and tells you when you have to do something differently.

❤️ LOVE
Don't just look, find your one and only! In the game, you will have a chance to flirt with the girls that show up in certain locations. 

 GEAR UP
Choose between hundreds of clothes and accessories to make your character unique

 CRIB
You will start out in a tiny apartment, but your goal is to have a beach villa. Decorate your apartment and you could even have your own personal gym!

 CARS
Don´t drive around the island in a rusty car! Buy luxury cars and customize them to your liking.

 MINI GAMES
On your journey, you will encounter countless mini-games. Try out the muscle-specific workouts, choose the right weights, practice your poses to compete in bodybuilding competitions. Start with the Beach Boy category, earn sponsors and step by step you will get closer to becoming the champion. Win the push-up and arm-wrestling contests to gain a reputation at the street workout park.

 

THE TEAM
 

Our team is made up entirely of Hungarians full of ambition!

   Andor Máté - CEO

It is not often you have exercising as your hobby when you are a full-time programmer, but this is what led to the idea to create a game where my work and my hobby come together. The successes and continuous developments are quite demanding. I have been working as a freelance mobile game developer for 5 five years now. The game has improved immensely since during that time, which the previous games stand a testament to.

  Gergő Rőder - Background artist

When we came up with the story, we were striving to create a game that would motivate people to exercise and live a healthy lifestyle not only in-game but in real life as well. Those who get immersed in the game will feel motivated by the progression of their character and know that they can achieve the results in real life just like their character! Besides that, we are trying to create a storyline that can later be continued and expanded upon! It was also a priority to give the game a certain trendy style to make it attractive to a wider audience!  

 

...Why Indiegogo?

This game is my dream project! But dedication is not enough when it comes to making a project of this scope a reality. I always invested the profits from the previous Iron Muscle games into the creation of sequels, but this time I ran out of money. I could release the game as it is now but I fear that the quality would suffer for it. In that case, a lot of features would be missing that I would love to have in the game. The animations would be choppy, the story would not be as intricate and the game would fall short of my vision for it. Which is to create the world's most immersive bodybuilding mobile game!

To achieve the goals we need:

$10,000 or more

  • Diets/Workout routines
  • MOCAP animations
  • Carrier Mode
  • Online competitions
  • Soundtrack

$​8,000

  • Diets/Workout routines
  • MOCAP animations
  • Carrier Mode
  • Soundtracks

$​5,000

  • Diets/Workout routines
  • MOCAP animations
  • Storyline

$​2,000

  • Diets/Workout routines
  • Realistic animations

We have built the groundwork, help us make the game happen, to truly make it the bodybuilding game we will all want to play!

Risks and challenges

We might be a small team and we will require time to create it, the Iron Muscle series is proof that when we want to get something done, then we will accomplish it. The groundwork is already finished so consider the game a low-risk project.

PERKS









Even if you can't support us...

...every little thing helps.
If the project has piqued your interest then please share it with your friends!

Follow on instagram

Like on facebook

story:
Watch live video from nesmarathon on www.twitch.tv


5th Annual NES Marathon Benefiting Children's Miracle Network Hospitals

Pat and Ian are back for another 24+ hours of LIVE classic Nintendo gaming as they raise money for the Children's Miracle Network! Watch them LIVE during the event as they play from a library of over 750 8-bit Nintendo games, interact with viewers, give away prizes, and host special guest cameos of other internet personalities who "stop by" via video. This year there will be events (exclusive videos, game challenges, etc.) that will be unlocked via donation amount goals reached! This page will be updated with those events as well as the giveaways as they are announced!

The live event begins Saturday, Nov. 8th at 3PM EST / 12PM PST! Tune in and watch the fun at NESmarathon.com!

Donating & Shaping the NES Marathon

All proceeds will go to the Children's Miracle Network, an organization that provides money to children's hospitals in need: 

Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than $4.7 billion—most of it $1 at a time—for 170 children’s hospitals across the United States and Canada, which, in turn, use the money where it’s needed the most. These donations have gone to support research and training, purchase equipment, and pay for uncompensated care, all in support of the mission to save and improve the lives of as many children as possible.

Any donation amount is greatly appreciated! As a thank you to donors at the $25 and above level, they will be able to help choose what games Pat and Ian play! Donors who select those perks have the option of making the donation in the name of any NES title released on the system, via Indiegogo's comment system. The more money raised in the name of any individual game, the more time will be allotted for Pat and Ian to play it! The NES marathon really relies on the input of the viewers so help out a great cause and help make the event what you want to watch! Another bonus in donating: since it is a charitable organization you are donating to, your contribution will be 100% tax deductible!

Note: All game-playing and time lengths are up to the discretion of Ian/Pat. Game-play lengths may not be exact and may be cut for time due to amount of games selected.

So that's what's going on! During the event, we'll have fun, prizes, and some surprises in store. This page will be updated in the near future with more perks and specific stretch goals that you can look forward to. 

Sponsorship Opportunities

Another way in which the NES Marathon is able to raise money is by offering visibility and advertising to websites, organizations, businesses, and individuals who wish to make a larger donation and help sponsor the event. In return for these generous donations the donor will receive exposure in the form of banners on the marathon's main page, radio style read-out ads, commercial spots during regular break times, and at the highest levels call-ins and dedicated hour blocks. Tens of thousands of viewers watched the 4th Annual event last year... here's your chance for your website/business to gain some great exposure while helping out a great cause with a 100% tax-deductible donation! Please check out the available package perks at the side for more details! If donating, all marketing pictures/materials must be submitted by November 1.

Spreading the Word

The NES Marathon's success is based largely upon others spreading the word via Twitter, Facebook, etc. Indiegogo.com can actually track how many donation referrals come in through your retweeting, posting the link, etc. To show our appreciation, we will reward the person responsible with the most donation referrals with a prize! We'll announce what this is later.

Thank You!

The NES Marathon has raised over $50,000 for hospitalized children in its first four years and we hope to continue strongly this year and into the future. Thanks to everyone for taking the time to read this page and all past/present donors and sponsors. Please help spread the word spread the word about this event on social media, twitter, etc. to help get the event more exposure and donations! We can't wait for Nov. 8th!

story_txt:
Watch live video from nesmarathon on www.twitch.tv
 
5th Annual NES Marathon Benefiting Children's Miracle Network HospitalsPat and Ian are back for another 24+ hours of LIVE classic Nintendo gaming as they raise money for the Children's Miracle Network! Watch them LIVE during the event as they play from a library of over 750 8-bit Nintendo games, interact with viewers, give away prizes, and host special guest cameos of other internet personalities who "stop by" via video. This year there will be events (exclusive videos, game challenges, etc.) that will be unlocked via donation amount goals reached! This page will be updated with those events as well as the giveaways as they are announced!The live event begins Saturday, Nov. 8th at 3PM EST / 12PM PST! Tune in and watch the fun at NESmarathon.com!Donating & Shaping the NES MarathonAll proceeds will go to the Children's Miracle Network, an organization that provides money to children's hospitals in need: Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than $4.7 billion—most of it $1 at a time—for 170 children’s hospitals across the United States and Canada, which, in turn, use the money where it’s needed the most. These donations have gone to support research and training, purchase equipment, and pay for uncompensated care, all in support of the mission to save and improve the lives of as many children as possible.Any donation amount is greatly appreciated! As a thank you to donors at the $25 and above level, they will be able to help choose what games Pat and Ian play! Donors who select those perks have the option of making the donation in the name of any NES title released on the system, via Indiegogo's comment system. The more money raised in the name of any individual game, the more time will be allotted for Pat and Ian to play it! The NES marathon really relies on the input of the viewers so help out a great cause and help make the event what you want to watch! Another bonus in donating: since it is a charitable organization you are donating to, your contribution will be 100% tax deductible!Note: All game-playing and time lengths are up to the discretion of Ian/Pat. Game-play lengths may not be exact and may be cut for time due to amount of games selected.So that's what's going on! During the event, we'll have fun, prizes, and some surprises in store. This page will be updated in the near future with more perks and specific stretch goals that you can look forward to. Sponsorship OpportunitiesAnother way in which the NES Marathon is able to raise money is by offering visibility and advertising to websites, organizations, businesses, and individuals who wish to make a larger donation and help sponsor the event. In return for these generous donations the donor will receive exposure in the form of banners on the marathon's main page, radio style read-out ads, commercial spots during regular break times, and at the highest levels call-ins and dedicated hour blocks. Tens of thousands of viewers watched the 4th Annual event last year... here's your chance for your website/business to gain some great exposure while helping out a great cause with a 100% tax-deductible donation! Please check out the available package perks at the side for more details! If donating, all marketing pictures/materials must be submitted by November 1.Spreading the WordThe NES Marathon's success is based largely upon others spreading the word via Twitter, Facebook, etc. Indiegogo.com can actually track how many donation referrals come in through your retweeting, posting the link, etc. To show our appreciation, we will reward the person responsible with the most donation referrals with a prize! We'll announce what this is later.Thank You!The NES Marathon has raised over $50,000 for hospitalized children in its first four years and we hope to continue strongly this year and into the future. Thanks to everyone for taking the time to read this page and all past/present donors and sponsors. Please help spread the word spread the word about this event on social media, twitter, etc. to help get the event more exposure and donations! We can't wait for Nov. 8th!      Marathon Milestones & Goals!(subject to change)

story:
IT'S OUT!

Hi, this is Melissa. If you're in the Lynnwood, WA area and you're hearing alternating "squee!" and "OMG!", that's us. NEXUS: The Zoraidian Oracle is finally out. At least, it is on Windows, and the other platforms will follow as we get them done.

You can download it for free, and play the tutorial + 6 games. We decided to go completely ad-free, and return to the old-fashioned notion of trial-ware. 

The backers have received their game codes now - if you're a backer and you have NOT received a game code as of Wednesday, May 20th, PLEASE CONTACT ME! Also, check your spam mail. :/

In other news, we'll be going to Crypticon - Seattle on May 22nd - May 24th, where we'll be holding our official Launch Weekend. Please come see us there.

This will be our last update here, and I'd like to thank everyone who helped us out here. Seriously, thanks - you rock.

After the Campaign Update:

Hi. This is Melissa, the president of Ætheric Worlds, coming in with a Really Late After Campaign Update.

First off, I'm incredibly sorry that this update is so late. We'd intended to get it in at the end of December, but, hey. Holidays. And then in January we moved offices. And you know what? Somewhere in there, we got out an Alpha Build of NEXUS! We're proud of ourselves for that, but it doesn't excuse the lack of update here.

So what happens now?

Well, obviously, if we got out an Alpha Build, we're still in production. We are, in fact, still producing NEXUS, to the best of our ability. We moved into a smaller office (better suited to us, actually); we've managed to acquire a few newer (not new, but not ancient) computers, and thanks to our backers from this campaign, we've renewed our necessary software licenses (project management, especially) and business licenses for the next year. 

Having survived until tax season, we're now figuring out what we can and cannot do in terms of art, and where it leaves us in our release schedule. We are, however, still in development. See the updates we release on our Website, or the Facebook, Twitter, and G+ accounts for more information (this campaign probably won't be updated again).

Thanks for watching here, and we hope to see you out in the world!

-- Melissa Kell, President, Ætheric Worlds LLC

Who is Ætheric Worlds and What is Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle?

Ætheric Worlds is a fledgling gaming company in Lynnwood, Washington, about 25 miles northeast of Seattle. We currently have over a dozen team members from a diverse set of backgrounds, including programmers, artists, business people, writers, and customer support specialists. We're constantly looking for more compatible people to bring on board as we grow into our dreams. We've all been around the block enough times to know that there's a lot of groundwork and details involved in running a business, and that's what Ætheric is. Well, partly.

The other part is - every single person on the Ætheric Worlds team is a gamer. We love games, and have been playing and designing them for years. Pen and paper role-playing games, card games, multi-user online games, console games, PC games, all of it. As long-time gamers, we know what we expect from gaming companies, and that's what drives us here at Ætheric - giving our customers not only what they want, but what they expect. A solid, quality, entertaining product and a player experience that leaves you wanting more.

Our president is Melissa Kell, who's been involved in several online role-playing projects over the years, most notably Tales of Ta'veren, based on Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time series, from 1995 to 2001. She's also familiar with small business administration, and has accumulated over 15 years of experience in business.

Michelle Travis is our director of writing and the lead designer on the Nexus project. She's also the videographer who put together our advertising video! In addition, she's an accomplished amateur fiction writer, a professional technical writer, and has 25 years of experience in designing and playing games.

Directing our Engineering group is JT Traub, who has over 20 years of experience in the software industry, including working on game engine development and AI development. One of his more recent game projects was as a co-developer of Legend of the Green Dragon.

Nexus is the first of the games Ætheric Worlds is planning. Based in the world of Tyanaphos, Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle provides a glimpse into the larger world that is waiting to be brought forward, while also providing an engaging game of itself. A strategic solitaire card game inspired by Hanafuda (a traditional Japanese flower card game similar to mahjong or rummy), Nexus can be either relaxing or challenging to your critical thinking skills, all based on how you approach it. As with any solitaire game, you can choose to go after the highest points available in any hand... but there are other options as well, and sometimes points aren't the final goal. In the end, it's all about the choices you make.

This campaign, too, is all about the choices you make. Ætheric Worlds is a small studio, and we're just getting started. Nexus is only the first of many games that we have planned – games that we want to share with you, games that we want to play with you. You're the key part to this; without you, this doesn't happen. This campaign allows us to bring Nexus to you, and also allows us to keep moving forward afterward, so we can bring the next game to you. And the next, and then the next. And if we reach our goal here... well, you get a little more than just the rewards listed to the right there. After all, you're not just helping out one game here, you're helping out the whole studio, and we want you to know we appreciate it. So as we go on, we'll let you know what we can do to show that.

Starting with Nexus. Because that's just the beginning. After all, we have to start somewhere.

All art on this page is concept art related to the world of Tyanaphos, which Nexus is based on. We'd love to show you the Nexus cards themselves, but that's part of what we're trying to get - the finished artwork.

So why that much?

Yeah, $50,000 is a lot of money. In her own words, Michelle Travis explains what it's all for:

Hello, my name's Michelle Travis. I'm the Director of Writing for Ætheric Worlds, and the lead designer on the Nexus project. I'd like to take a couple minutes to tell you about Nexus and how you can help bring it, and some of Ætheric's other projects, to fruition.

Over the next thirty or so days, we're aiming for a crowdfunding goal of $50,000. What's this for? Well, I'll tell you.

First, part of it goes to pay IndieGoGo and other administrative fees just for running this in the first place. And that also includes making sure that those of you who support this campaign of ours get your stuff. It's only fair.

Next, part of it goes toward the operational costs, software, and hardware for running Ætheric Worlds - this is stuff like rent, computers, accounting and office software, that sort of thing. Right now we're really doing this on a shoestring, and while that's a sort of good thing for costs, it kind of puts a damper on productivity. And we have a LOT of plans here at Ætheric Worlds.

But the biggest part is for Nexus itself. Specifically, the art.

There are 144 cards in the Nexus deck - all of which will have distinctly unique art. Even though Ætheric has concept artists on staff, with 144 separate cards, that's a lot of art. So, to get the art done more quickly, as well as with enough diversity to make it visually interesting, we're commissioning multiple artists to translate our ideas from concept to completion.

And even though we here at Ætheric all are currently working for free, we can't expect the artists we intend to commission to do so.

As a quick aside, if you are an artist and are interested in taking on one or more of the commissions for the Nexus project, please see the Nexus project page for more information on what we're looking for and how to contact us.

This also includes the sound assets for Nexus, such as sound effects and music. Incidentally, Nexus will be featuring entirely original music. Which is quite cool.

On the bright side, the fundamental design of Nexus, how it works, the rules, and that stuff is already done. And we've playtested this like mad (it's kinda brought out the competitive side of the folks in the office.)

---------------------

If you would like a further breakdown of what specifically we're spending the money on, please see the attached update. Please contact Melissa if you'd like to discus direct investing.

A few additional details

What platforms will this game work on? We're using the Unity 3d engine, which is allowing us a lot of flexibility. As a result, we'll be able to release the game onto Windows (7, 8, and probably Modern), Mac, iOS, Android, and Ubuntu Linux. At this time, we don't expect to make it available for other flavors of Linux (it depends on the... well, dependencies), but we'll see.

How are you handling overseas fulfillment? Since there's not a lot of shipping involved, even at the higher level, we simply factored in the probable price of overseas shipping. If you're an overseas client who would like one of the higher level perks, just go ahead and sign up for it. Once we're ready to fulfill the physical items, we'll contact you and work out how best to get your items to you, so that they arrive in the best condition. In all cases - national and international fulfillment - we're likely to try and minimize the number of shipments we have going out, simply to reduce the number of things that can possibly get lost.

But... what if Ætheric doesn't make the campaign goal? What happens to Nexus and Ætheric Worlds, and where does the money go?

Well, that depends on how far short we fall, actually.

We know that art is the most urgent need we have right now. For that, we need about $9,000 (including IndieGoGo's fees and the stuff for you guys). That will allow us to get the art started, although we probably won't be able to get all of it immediately, and we'll definitely have to figure out how to pay for a fair amount from our tax returns and credit cards. We'll also close our office space down to just a mailbox and a phone number, and we'll have to push the completion of Nexus out a few months. We'll also probably lose the contract to digitize another game that we're currently in the running for, since we wouldn't be able to get to it for nearly a year.

As soon as we reach about $18-20,000, the art is paid for and at that point, everything else is assigned to the areas of greatest need. For every thousand after that, we either set aside money for rent, purchase another computer, or acquire & update our software licenses, depending on which part is furthest behind.

There is no point at which Nexus will not be under development, no matter how little this campaign brings in. The only question is how slow or how fast that development is, and that is entirely up to you.

So why is Ætheric any different than other gaming companies?

At Ætheric, we believe that the gaming industry frequently isn't fair to the people who make games – in hours, wages, and turnover – and as long as that's true, it's difficult to form a community. We've seen that often, as soon as players start to bond with a developer, that developer is suddenly gone from the company, and the players become a little more jaded with the next developer to come along or in the next community they join. It doesn't have to be that way. We also all happen to be optimistic enough to believe that people are more than just replaceable resources inside the business machine, and that if we treat employees like people, and as if they are important to the success of the company (which they are!), then we will in turn get the type of people who value that treatment, and respond by giving their absolute best in return.

We want to support our employees, both on and off the job, with cross-training, professional development, and benefits that provide options to fit the employee's life. We want to encourage our employees to become a community within the company – and then to reach out to our customers, to help form a community with them. We have the shared interests already, so let's expand on that, and make it a place where we can find others to have fun with. We want you to play our games with your friends, your family, your spouse, your kids and your grand-kids. And we want you to play our games with us, too.

Starting with Nexus. We know where we're going; we have it all planned out. We've got so much more to give you. Thank you for helping us get there, and for coming along on our journey.

What if contributing isn't in the cards?

That's okay! You can still help.

  • Tell people about this campaign! That's the only way to get it out there.
  • Drop us a note and tell us that you're interested! You can do it off our website, and we'd like to know.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo 'share tools' – that helps get the word out, too.
  • "Like" us on Facebook or Google+, Follow us on Twitter.
  • Check our Careers page – maybe there's something you're interested in there!

---------------------

There are lessons to be learned in every moment of your life.
      --Zoraidia the Sage

The Story of the Zoraidian Oracle

To most people on the world of Tyanaphos, Zoraidia is nothing more than a mysterious figure in history; a reclusive Prophetess who guided her brother, the great leader and teacher Sang Aparo. To those who know both magic and history, however, Zoraidia is a figure that looms as large as her legendary brother, for it was through her hands that the Oracle Deck first came into being.

Half-Human, half-Forestborn, Zoraidia learned about the Tarot from her human relatives. In her hands, the deck helped her focus her untrained abilities, but because of its purely human history, she found it alien to her world and her understanding. Guided by instinct, she created a new, larger deck that encompassed all of the races within her world – the tall Forestborn, the amphibious Wavecalled, the nocturnal Stoneforged, and the diverse Starmade from so many other worlds and times. Over the course of years, images of these races were all gathered and divided into seven Lesser Arcana, each embracing an overarching concept. She also formed a Greater Arcana based on the Archetypes and Artifacts from legends and the conflicting Dualities that govern fundamental nature of all living things. When she was done with this great Master-work that consumed so many years of her life, Zoraidia fell prey to her gift, and began to prophesize the major nexus points for Tyanaphos for decades and centuries to come.

Scholars came to study Zoraidia's deck, and thus, slowly, copies were made and distributed. In the hands of the truly gifted, nexus points for the populous can be foreseen. Those with minor gifts may be able to see for others, while most can only discern the barest glimmer of their own path. However, for most people, regardless of race or ability, the Zoraidian Oracle remains only a game.

Nexus – What path does fate have in store for you?

Explain more about the perks?

Well, for one thing, all of the titles that you get for the first four levels will be granted to you for use on your Ætheric account, for use in our games where titles can be shown (future games, and if we can figure out how to manage it, in our forums). Plus, you get your name on a permanent Thank You page attached to the Nexus webpage, and we'll give you a shout-out on Facebook, Twitter or G+, too. One title and all that recognition just for a single dollar! Of course, if you give more than that, you get the game (once we have it ready for release) - and then we start tossing in artwork.

Now, as you might have guessed by the quality of our video, we're serious about the quality of our artwork. When we start offering an exclusive digital wallpaper, we're not talking about the card back blown up to 1280x800. We're talking about something nice, done by an artist with reasonably good name recognition (Michelle has a whole list of artists she wants to commission for this, we have to keep telling her she only gets one). But our featured perk is even better: you not only get the wallpaper, you also get, included, the additional background, card back, and original music options that won't be available for anyone else but our sponsors at game release (everyone else will have to purchase them separately when they're released later).

What if you want something even more original and collectable? Well, we have you covered – you (or someone you love) can be in the game. We have a limited number of places where people are able to be featured as characters on the cards. If you choose one of these perks, please feel free to contact us immediately to find out which cards are available.
